data.es: "Indeed, the husband is the greatest ornament for a married woman. Hence though deserving adornment she does not like it, bereft of her husband who is her only ornament.

data.v: दुष्करं कुरुते रामो हीनो यदनया प्रभुः । धारयत्यात्मनो देहं न दुःखेनावसीदति ।।
data.es: "Lord Rama had accomplished a difficult task in sustaining the body this way without allowing it to sink and perish during separation from her.

data.v: इमामसितकेशान्तां शतपत्रनिभेक्षणाम् । सुखार्हां दुःखितां दृष्ट्वा ममापि व्यथितं मनः ।।
data.es: Sita who is endowed with beautiful dark hair and eyes like a hundredpetalled lotus, who deserves to be happy is in sorrow. I grieve to see her in this state.

data.v: क्षितिक्षमा पुष्करसंनिभाक्षी; या रक्षिता राघवलक्ष्मणाभ्याम् । सा राक्षसीभिर्विकृतेक्षणाभिः; संरक्ष्यते संप्रति वृक्षमूले ।।
data.es: She who has beautiful eyes like lotus petals, was protected by the arms of both Rama and Lakshmna, who is tolerant like the earth and is guarded by the female demons of hideous appearance under a tree.

data.v: हिमहतनलिनीव नष्टशोभा; व्यसनपरम्परया निपीड्यमाना । सहचररहितेव चक्रवाकी; जनकसुता कृपणां दशां प्रपन्ना ।।
data.es: "Deprived of her charm, she resembles a lotuscreeper blasted by frost. This daughter of Janaka has reached a pitiable condition afflicted by series of calamities. She resembles a famale Chakravaka separated from her mate.

data.v: अस्या हि पुष्पावनताग्रशाखाः; शोकं दृढं वै जनयत्यशोकाः । हिमव्यपायेन च मन्दरश्मि;रभ्युत्थितो नैकसहस्ररश्मिः ।।
data.es: "The top branches of Ashoka trees bent down with blossoms and the Moon rising with thousands of cool rays at the end of winter (when spring sets in) beholding which she should be delighted intensfy her sorrow."

data.v: इत्येवमर्थं कपिरन्ववेक्ष्य; सीतेयमित्येव निविष्टबुद्धिः । संश्रित्य तस्मिन्निषसाद वृक्षे; बली हरीणामृषभस्तरस्वी ।।
data.es: Hanuman, the swiftfooted bull among monkeys, on his part waiting on the Simsupa tree thus reflecting concluded in his mind that she was Sita.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे षोडशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the sixteenth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: ततः कुमुदषण्डाभो निर्मलं निर्मलः स्वयम् । प्रजगाम नभश्चन्द्रो हंसो नीलमिवोदकम् ।।
data.es: Then the Moon shining like a bed of lilies rose stainless, ascended the clear sky and looked like a swan swimming through blue water.

data.v: साचिव्यमिव कुर्वन्स प्रभया निर्मलप्रभः । चन्द्रमा रश्मिभिः शीतैः सिषेवे पवनात्मजम् ।।
data.es: The Moon shed clear lightas if with his brightness and his cool rays he wished to refresh the son of the Windgod.

data.v: स ददर्श ततः सीतां पूर्णचन्द्रनिभाननाम् । शोकभारैरिव न्यस्तां भारैर्नावमिवाम्भसि ।।
data.es: Then he saw Sita whose face shone like the fullmoon. But she was as though sinking under the burden of sorrow, like a boat with heavy load sinking in water.

data.v: दिदृक्षमाणो वैदेहीं हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । स ददर्शाविदूरस्था राक्षसीर्घोरदर्शनाः ।।
एकाक्षीमेककर्णां च कर्णप्रावरणां तथा । अकर्णां शङ्कुकर्णां च मस्तकोच्छ्वासनासिकाम् ।।
अतिकायोत्तमाङ्गीं च तनुदीर्घशिरोधराम् । ध्वस्तकेशीं तथाकेशीं केशकम्बलधारिणीम् ।।
लम्बकर्णललाटां च लम्बोदरपयोधराम् । लम्बौष्ठीं चिबुकौष्ठीं च लम्बास्यां लम्बजानुकाम् ।।
ह्रस्वां दीर्घां च कुब्जां च विकटां वामनां तथा । करालां भुग्नवस्त्रां च पिङ्गाक्षीं विकृताननाम् ।।
विकृताः पिङ्गलाः कालीः क्रोधनाः कलहप्रियाः । कालायसमहाशूलकूटमुद्गरधारिणीः ।।
वराहमृगशार्दूलमहिषाजशिवा मुखाः । गजोष्ट्रहयपादाश्च निखातशिरसोऽपराः ।।
एकहस्तैकपादाश्च खरकर्ण्यश्वकर्णिकाः । गोकर्णीर्हस्तिकर्णीश्च हरिकर्णीस्तथापराः ।।
अनासा अतिनासाश्च तिर्यन्नासा विनासिकाः । गजसंनिभनासाश्च ललाटोच्छ्वासनासिकाः ।।
हस्तिपादा महापादा गोपादाः पादचूलिकाः । अतिमात्रशिरोग्रीवा अतिमात्रकुचोदरीः ।।
अतिमात्रास्य नेत्राश्च दीर्घजिह्वानखास्तथा । अजामुखीर्हस्तिमुखीर्गोमुखीः सूकरीमुखीः ।।
हयोष्ट्रखरवक्त्राश्च राक्षसीर्घोरदर्शनाः । शूलमुद्गरहस्ताश्च क्रोधनाः कलहप्रियाः ।।
कराला धूम्रकेशीश्च रक्षसीर्विकृताननाः । पिबन्तीः सततं पानं सदा मांससुराप्रियाः ।।
मांसशोणितदिग्धाङ्गीर्मांसशोणितभोजनाः । ता ददर्श कपिश्रेष्ठो रोमहर्षणदर्शनाः ।।
स्कन्धवन्तमुपासीनाः परिवार्य वनस्पतिम् । तस्याधस्ताच्च तां देवीं राजपुत्रीमनिन्दिताम् ।।
लक्षयामास लक्ष्मीवान्हनूमाञ्जनकात्मजाम् । निष्प्रभां शोकसंतप्तां मलसंकुलमूर्धजाम् ।।
क्षीणपुण्यां च्युतां भूमौ तारां निपतितामिव । चारित्र्य व्यपदेशाढ्यां भर्तृदर्शनदुर्गताम् ।।
भूषणैरुत्तमैर्हीनां भर्तृवात्सल्यभूषिताम् । राक्षसाधिपसंरुद्धां बन्धुभिश्च विनाकृताम् ।।
वियूथां सिंहसंरुद्धां बद्धां गजवधूमिव । चन्द्रलेखां पयोदान्ते शारदाभ्रैरिवावृताम् ।।
क्लिष्टरूपामसंस्पर्शादयुक्तामिव वल्लकीम् । सीतां भर्तृहिते युक्तामयुक्तां रक्षसां वशे ।।
अशोकवनिकामध्ये शोकसागरमाप्लुताम् । ताभिः परिवृतां तत्र सग्रहामिव रोहिणीम् । ददर्श हनुमान्देवीं लतामकुसुमामिव ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जमनत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरनभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसजभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसमज]

data.es: She deserves to be with Rama, but had fallen under the sway of shedemons. Sitting in the midst of Ashoka grove she was like a creeper without blossoms. Immersed in the ocean of sorrow the noble lady was like the star Rohini surrounded by unpropitious planets.

data.v: सा मलेन च दिग्धाङ्गी वपुषा चाप्यलंकृता । मृणाली पङ्कदिग्धेव विभाति च न भाति च ।।
data.es: Even though she was daubed with dirt, and had no ornaments on her, she looked bright like a lotus fibre smeared with mud.

data.v: मलिनेन तु वस्त्रेण परिक्लिष्टेन भामिनीम् । संवृतां मृगशावाक्षीं ददर्श हनुमान्कपिः ।।
data.es: Hanuman saw the fawneyed lady clad in crushed and soiled clothes with a pathetic face. She felt no dejection when she thought of her husband's prowess. The blackeyed beauty was protected by her own chastity.

data.v: तां देवीं दीनवदनामदीनां भर्तृतेजसा । रक्षितां स्वेन शीलेन सीतामसितलोचनाम् ।।
data.es: Hanuman saw the fawneyed lady clad in crushed and soiled clothes with a pathetic face. She felt no dejection when she thought of her husband's prowess. The blackeyed beauty was protected by her own chastity.

data.v: तां दृष्ट्वा हनुमान्सीतां मृगशावनिभेक्षणाम् । मृगकन्यामिव त्रस्तां वीक्षमाणां समन्ततः ।।
data.es: Seeing the fawneyed Sita, a frightened female deer looking all around (as if for some help) sighing hot breath, was as though burning the trees having tender leaves with her hot sighs. She looked like a collective mass of all sorrows, a high tide of suffering.

data.v: दहन्तीमिव निःश्वासैर्वृक्षान्पल्लवधारिणः । संघातमिव शोकानां दुःखस्योर्मिमिवोत्थिताम् ।।
data.es: Seeing the fawneyed Sita, a frightened female deer looking all around (as if for some help) sighing hot breath, was as though burning the trees having tender leaves with her hot sighs. She looked like a collective mass of all sorrows, a high tide of suffering.

data.v: तां क्षामां सुविभक्ताङ्गीं विनाभरणशोभिनीम् ।।
data.es: She was a tolerant lady. She had beautiful limbs which looked splendid even though she was not wearing ornaments. Hanuman experienced immeasurable joy on seeing Mythili.

data.v: प्रहर्षमतुलं लेभे मारुतिः प्रेक्ष्य मैथिलीम् । हर्षजानि च सोऽश्रूणि तां दृष्ट्वा मदिरेक्षणाम् । मुमोच हनुमांस्तत्र नमश्चक्रे च राघवम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जसमय], अज्ञातम् [१२: मसजभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतभत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसतर]

data.es: Seeing that lady with eyes intoxicating, Hanuman shed tears of joy. At once he paid obeisance to Rama. (thinking he could trace Sita at last).

data.v: नमस्कृत्वा च रामाय लक्ष्मणाय च वीर्यवान् । सीतादर्शनसंहृष्टो हनूमान्संवृतोऽभवत् ।।
data.es: Heroic Hanuman felt happy when he saw Sita. He offered salutations to Rama and Lakshmana at heart and covered himself (with the leaves of the Simsupa tree) and waited.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे सप्तदशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the seventeenth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तथा विप्रेक्षमाणस्य वनं पुष्पितपादपम् । विचिन्वतश्च वैदेहीं किंचिच्छेषा निशाभवत् ।।
data.es: The night came to a close while Hanuman went searching and looking for Sita at Ashoka grove full of flowering trees.

data.v: षडङ्गवेदविदुषां क्रतुप्रवरयाजिनाम् । शुश्राव ब्रह्मघोषांश्च विरात्रे ब्रह्मरक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: At dawn sounds of recitation of Vedas and the six auxillary sciences, (i.e .grammar, prosody, etymology, phonetics, astronomy and the science of rituals) by the brahmins among demons wellversed in performing exalted sacrificial ceremonies were heard.

data.v: अथ मङ्गलवादित्रैः शब्दैः श्रोत्रमनोहरैः । प्राबोध्यत महाबाहुर्दशग्रीवो महाबलः ।।
data.es: By that time the strongarmed, powerful, tennecked Ravana was awakened by the delightful sounds of auspicious musical instruments.

data.v: विबुध्य तु यथाकालं राक्षसेन्द्रः प्रतावपान् । स्रस्तमाल्याम्बरधरो वैदेहीमन्वचिन्तयत् ।।
data.es: The chivalrous lord of demons woke up as usual.His raiment and garland were still in disarray and he thought of Vaidehi.

data.v: भृशं नियुक्तस्तस्यां च मदनेन मदोत्कटः । न स तं राक्षसः कामं शशाकात्मनि गूहितुम् ।।
data.es: The demon king who was unable to hide his great passion and control his senses was drawn towards Sita, in his state of intoxication.

data.v: स सर्वाभरणैर्युक्तो बिभ्रच्छ्रियमनुत्तमाम् । तां नगैर्विविधैर्जुष्टां सर्वपुष्पफलोपगैः ।।
data.es: Adorned with all ornaments and glowing with excellent splendour he went through the path filled with trees flourishing with all kinds of flowers and fruits.

data.v: वृतां पुष्करिणीभिश्च नानापुष्पोपशोभिताम् । सदामदैश्च विहगैर्विचित्रां परमाद्भुताम् ।।
data.es: Ponds covered with a variety of beautiful flowers and colourful birds always cheerful looked very wonderful.

data.v: ईहामृगैश्च विविधैश्वृतां दृष्टिमनोहरैः । वीथीः संप्रेक्षमाणश्च मणिकाञ्चनतोरणाः ।।
data.es: Watching the garden filled with trees, gateways ornamented with gold and gems, he entered through the pleasant pathways in the Ashoka garden. There were wonderful wolves and several herds of animals in the garden. Fruits dropped from trees were strewn all over.

data.v: नानामृगगणाकीर्णां फलैः प्रपतितैर्वृताम् । अशोकवनिकामेव प्राविशत्संततद्रुमाम् ।।
data.es: Watching the garden filled with trees, gateways ornamented with gold and gems, he entered through the pleasant pathways in the Ashoka garden. There were wonderful wolves and several herds of animals in the garden. Fruits dropped from trees were strewn all over.

data.v: अङ्गनाशतमात्रं तु तं व्रजन्तमनुव्रजत् । महेन्द्रमिव पौलस्त्यं देवगन्धर्वयोषितः ।।
data.es: Ravana, son of sage Paulasti, was followed by a hundred women, just as Indra is trailed by the females of gods and gandharvas.

data.v: दीपिकाः काञ्चनीः काश्चिज्जगृहुस्तत्र योषितः । बालव्यजनहस्ताश्च तालवृन्तानि चापराः ।।
data.es: Some women carried golden lamps, some held yalk tail fans in their hands while others bore palmleaf fans.

data.v: काञ्चनैरपि भृङ्गारैर्जह्रुः सलिलमग्रतः । मण्डलाग्रानसींश्चैव गृह्यान्याः पृष्ठतो ययुः ।।
data.es: Some moved ahead of him carrying water in golden pitchers. Others followed him carrying circular couches (to be used as seats).

data.v: काचिद्रत्नमयीं पात्रीं पूर्णां पानस्य भामिनी । दक्षिणा दक्षिणेनैव तदा जग्राह पाणिना ।।
data.es: One glorious and compassionate lady carried in her right hand a gemstudded jar filled with wine.

data.v: राजहंसप्रतीकाशं छत्रं पूर्णशशिप्रभम् । सौवर्णदण्डमपरा गृहीत्वा पृष्ठतो ययौ ।।
data.es: Another shedemon moved behind him holding an umbrella with a golden handle which was white like a royal swan and bright like the fullmoon.

data.v: निद्रामदपरीताक्ष्यो रावणस्योत्तमस्त्रियः । अनुजग्मुः पतिं वीरं घनं विद्युल्लता इव ।।
data.es: The chief wives of Ravana with eyes dizzy with sleep and drinking followed their heroic husband like streaks of lightning follow a thunder cloud. (Ravana who was dark looked like a cloud and the women with dazzling golden complexion appeared like lightning.)

data.v: ततः काञ्चीनिनादं च नूपुराणां च निःस्वनम् । शुश्राव परमस्त्रीणां स कपिर्मारुतात्मजः ।।
data.es: Then Hanuman, son of the Windgod, heard their jingling golden girdles and anklets.

data.v: तं चाप्रतिमकर्माणमचिन्त्यबलपौरुषम् । द्वारदेशमनुप्राप्तं ददर्श हनुमान्कपिः ।।
data.es: Then Hanuman, the Vanara saw Ravana of extraordinary deeds, and of unimaginable strength and valour at the entrance (of Ashoka garden)

data.v: दीपिकाभिरनेकाभिः समन्तादवभासितम् । गन्धतैलावसिक्ताभिर्ध्रियमाणाभिरग्रतः ।।
data.es: Hanuman saw him in the glow of lamps wet with fragrant oil carried by many shedemons all over.

data.v: कामदर्पमदैर्युक्तं जिह्मताम्रायतेक्षणम् । समक्षमिव कन्दर्पमपविद्ध शरासनम् ।।
data.es: Hanuman saw him, who was possessed of lust, arrogance and intoxication. He appeared like Cupid setting aside his quiver and arrows with his curved, big, red eyes.

data.v: मथितामृतफेनाभमरजो वस्त्रमुत्तमम् । सलीलमनुकर्षन्तं विमुक्तं सक्तमङ्गदे ।।
data.es: He was playfully pulling up his upper garment that slipped and stuck to his armlet. This excellent unsoiled robe was looking like the foam of churned nectar.

data.v: तं पत्रविटपे लीनः पत्रपुष्पघनावृतः । समीपमुपसंक्रान्तं निध्यातुमुपचक्रमे ।।
data.es: Hanuman seated on a leafy branch (of the simsupa tree) thickly covered with leaves and flowers started scanning the identity of Ravana who was drawing nearer.

data.v: अवेक्षमाणश्च ततो ददर्श कपिकुञ्जरः । रूपयौवनसंपन्ना रावणस्य वरस्त्रियः ।।
data.es: The leader of the monkeys started gazing at the chief wives of Ravana endowed with youth and beauty৷৷

data.v: ताभिः परिवृतो राजा सुरूपाभिर्महायशाः । तन्मृगद्विजसंघुष्टं प्रविष्टः प्रमदावनम् ।।
data.es: Surrounded by beauties, the glorious king entered the grove meant for women, reverberating with the sounds of beasts and birds.

data.v: क्षीबो विचित्राभरणः शङ्कुकर्णो महाबलः । तेन विश्रवसः पुत्रः स दृष्टो राक्षसाधिपः ।।
data.es: The brilliant vanara looked at the son of Visravas (Ravana), the demon king adorned with wonderful ornaments. He had long tapering ears. He was intoxicated with drink. Encircled by damsels, he was looking like the Moon surrounded by stars.

data.v: वृतः परमनारीभिस्ताराभिरिव चन्द्रमाः । तं ददर्श महातेजास्तेजोवन्तं महाकपिः ।।
data.es: The brilliant vanara looked at the son of Visravas (Ravana), the demon king adorned with wonderful ornaments. He had long tapering ears. He was intoxicated with drink. Encircled by damsels, he was looking like the Moon surrounded by stars.

data.v: रावणोऽयं महाबाहुरिति संचिन्त्य वानरः । अवप्लुतो महातेजा हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः ।।
data.es: The brilliant vanara (Hanuman), son of the Windgod recognising the strongarmed Ravana got down a little, saying 'This is truly the strongarmed Ravana.'

data.v: स तथाप्युग्रतेजाः सन्निर्धूतस्तस्य तेजसा । पत्रगुह्यान्तरे सक्तो हनूमान्संवृतोऽभवत् ।।
data.es: Hanuman, possessed of extraordinary energy, was taken aback at the might of Ravana. He remained hiding covered over with leaves.

data.v: स तामसितकेशान्तां सुश्रोणीं संहतस्तनीम् । दिदृक्षुरसितापाङ्गीमुपावर्तत रावणः ।।
data.es: With the desire to see Sita endowed with black hair, beautiful hips, plump breasts and dark sideglances, Ravana returned (to Ashokavana).इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे अष्टादशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the eighteenth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तस्मिन्नेव ततः काले राजपुत्री त्वनिन्दिता । रूपयौवनसंपन्नं भूषणोत्तमभूषितम् ।।
data.es: On just seeing Ravana, the lord of demons from a distance, adorned with the best of ornaments the charming, young, blameles princess Vaidehi of beautiful waist trembled like a banana plant shaken by a strong wind.

data.v: ततो दृष्ट्वैव वैदेही रावणं राक्षसाधिपम् । प्रावेपत वरारोहा प्रवाते कदली यथा ।।
data.es: On just seeing Ravana, the lord of demons from a distance, adorned with the best of ornaments the charming, young, blameles princess Vaidehi of beautiful waist trembled like a banana plant shaken by a strong wind.

data.v: ऊरुभ्यामुदरं छाद्य बाहुभ्यां च पयोधरौ । उपविष्टा विशालाक्षी रुदन्ती वरवर्णिनी ।।
data.es: Largeeyed, faircomplexioned Sita seated there with her belly, thighs and breasts covered with arms cried.

data.v: दशग्रीवस्तु वैदेहीं रक्षितां राक्षसीगणैः । ददर्श दीनां दुःखार्तं नावं सन्नामिवार्णवे ।।
data.es: The tennecked Ravana, too, on his part saw Sita, tormented with grief, guarded by the shedemons like a boat sunk in the sea.

data.v: असंवृतायामासीनां धरण्यां संशितव्रताम् । छिन्नां प्रपतितां भूमौ शाखामिव वनस्पतेः । मलमण्डनदिग्धाङ्गीं मण्डनार्हाममण्डिताम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: तसजज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जमनम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यततर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जमतम]

data.es: She looked woeful seated on the bare earth like the broken branch of a tree cut and fallen down on the ground.

data.v: समीपं राजसिंहस्य रामस्य विदितात्मनः । संकल्पहयसंयुक्तैर्यान्तीमिव मनोरथैः ।।
data.es: She was as though moving towards the knower of the self, the supreme king, Rama with the horses of her resolution yoked to the chariot of her mind.

data.v: शुष्यन्तीं रुदतीमेकां ध्यानशोकपरायणाम् । दुःखस्यान्तमपश्यन्तीं रामां राममनुव्रताम् ।।
data.es: She was emaciated, absorbed in thought of Rama alone and crying and unable to find the end to her grief.

data.v: वेष्टमानामथाविष्टां पन्नगेन्द्रवधूमिव । धूप्यमानां ग्रहेणेव रोहिणीं धूमकेतुना ।।
data.es: Sitting in that manner she resembled a coiled serpent queen, the star Rohini overshadowed by a smoking comet (that is Ravana).

data.v: वृत्तशीले कुले जातामाचारवति धार्मिके । पुनः संस्कारमापन्नां जातमिव च दुष्कुले ।।
data.es: Though born in a traditional righteous and virtuous family, she was as though passing through a purificatory process like a lowbred woman.

data.v: सन्नामिव महाकीर्तिं श्रद्धामिव विमानिताम् । प्रज्ञामिव परिक्षीणामाशां प्रतिहतामिव ।।
data.es: She was like great fame grown dim, faith slighted, worship meddled and hope frustrated.(Note: Sita's condition is being compared with abstract concepts such as fame, faith, reverence and hope which are hit by reverses in fate. She was the personification of all such suffering.)

data.v: आयतीमिव विध्वस्तामाज्ञां प्रतिहतामिव । दीप्तामिव दिशं काले पूजामपहृतामिव ।।
data.es: She was like a prospect blasted, command flouted, entire direction set on flames at the time of catastrophe and articles of worship abducted by evil forces at the sacrificial ceremony.

data.v: पद्मिनीमिव विध्वस्तां हतशूरां चमूमिव । प्रभामिव तपोध्वस्तामुपक्षीणामिवापगाम् ।।
data.es: She was like a lotuscreeper blighted, an army with its gallant warriors killed, radiance of light blocked by darkness and a stream run dry.

data.v: वेदीमिव परामृष्टां शान्तामग्निशिखामिव । पौर्णमासीमिव निशां राहुग्रस्तेन्दुमण्डलाम् ।।
data.es: (She was) like the altar of worship defiled, blazing fire extinguished, and the Moon eclipsed by Rahu in the full moon night.

data.v: उत्कृष्टपर्णकमलां वित्रासितविहंगमाम् । हस्तिहस्तपरामृष्टामाकुलां पद्मिनीमिव ।।
data.es: (She appeared) like a lotuspond the excellent leaves of whose lotuses surrounded by frightened birds are destroyed by the trunks of elephants.

data.v: पतिशोकातुरां शुष्कां नदीं विस्रावितामिव । परया मृजया हीनां कृष्णपक्षे निशामिव ।।
data.es: Stricken with grief caused by separation from her husband, she appeared like a river gone thin and dry, not fit for ablution, like a night during dark fortnight of the month deprived of all its glow.

data.v: सुकुमारीं सुजाताङ्गीं रत्नगर्भगृहोचिताम् । तप्यमानामिवोष्णेन मृणालीमचिरोद्धृताम् ।।
data.es: A delicate lady with beautiful limbs who deserved to be in a gemcrusted house was (now) like a lotus stem just plucked out and scorched by the Sun's heat.

data.v: गृहीतामालितां स्तम्भे यूथपेन विनाकृताम् । निःश्वसन्तीं सुदुःखार्तां गजराजवधूमिव ।।
data.es: She was sighing heavily in intense grief like a royal female elephant tied to a pillar and separated from her lord, the leader of the herd.

data.v: एकया दीर्घया वेण्या शोभमानामयत्नतः । नीलया नीरदापाये वनराज्या महीमिव ।।
data.es: She was lovely even with a single braid of unkempt hair like the earth with a single row of dark trees covering its surface at the end of the rainy season.

data.v: उपवासेन शोकेन ध्यानेन च भयेन च । परिक्षीणां कृशां दीनामल्पाहारां तपोधनाम् ।।
data.es: She was wasted and emaciated through fasting and grief, depressed due to brooding and threatenings. She ate very little but was rich with austerities.

data.v: आयाचमानां दुःखार्तां प्राञ्जलिं देवतामिव । भावेन रघुमुख्यस्य दशग्रीवपराभवम् ।।
data.es: Tormented with grief, Sita looked like a goddess begging Rama, the foremost of the Raghu family with folded hands in her mind to destroy Ravana, the tennecked demon.

data.v: समीक्षमाणां रुदतीमनिन्दितां; सुपक्ष्मताम्रायतशुक्ललोचनाम् । अनुव्रतां राममतीव मैथिलीं; प्रलोभयामास वधाय रावणः ।।
data.es: Blameless Mythili with clear, large eyes and beautiful eyelashes with a reddish tint at the corners was looking around, crying. Ravana tried to allure Sita who was deeply faithful to Rama and threatened to kill her (when he found her unflinching).इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे एकोनविंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the nineteenth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: स तां परिवृतां दीनां निरानन्दां तपस्विनीम् । साकारैर्मधुरैर्वाक्यैर्न्यदर्शयत रावणः ।।
data.es: Ravana expressed his intention in sweet words to the depressed and griefstricken ascetic Sita surrounded by demon guards:

data.v: मां दृष्ट्वा नागनासोरुगूहमाना स्तनोदरम् । अदर्शनमिवात्मानं भयान्नेतुं त्वमिच्छसि ।।
data.es: "On seeing me, Sita, you want to conceal your thighs, belly and breasts through fear of me. I think you do not want me to see you.

data.v: कामये त्वां विशालाक्षि बहुमन्यस्व मां प्रिये । सर्वाङ्गगुणसंपन्ने सर्वलोकमनोहरे ।।
data.es: "O largeeyed one you are endowed with beauty in all limbs. You are the delight of all worlds. I desire you, dear Oblige me.

data.v: नेह केचिन्मनुष्या वा राक्षसाः कामरूपिणः । व्यपसर्पतु ते सीते भयं मत्तः समुत्थितम् ।।
data.es: "O Sita no human or demon. who can take any form at their will can relieve your fear born of me.

data.v: स्वधर्मे रक्षसां भीरु सर्वथैष न संशयः । गमनं वा परस्त्रीणां हरणं संप्रमथ्य वा ।।
data.es: "O timid lady having an unrighteous approach to wives of others or their abduction by force is natural to demons, There is no doubt.

data.v: एवं चैतदकामां च न त्वां स्प्रक्ष्यामि मैथिलि । कामं कामः शरीरे मे यथाकामं प्रवर्तताम् ।।
data.es: "Mythili let passion hold its sway over my body as it will. But I shall not force you or touch you since you do not love me.

data.v: देवि नेह भयं कार्यं मयि विश्वसिहि प्रिये । प्रणयस्व च तत्त्वेन मैवं भूः शोकलालसा ।।
data.es: "O reverend lady, fear not me on that account. Have confidence in me. Show your love. Do not be swayed by grief .

data.v: एकवेणी धराशय्या ध्यानं मलिनमम्बरम् । अस्थानेऽप्युपवासश्च नैतान्यौपयिकानि ते ।।
data.es: "O Lady, to wear a single braid, sleep on the ground, brooding, wearing soiled clothes and fasting without proper occasion does not suit you.

data.v: विचित्राणि च माल्यानि चन्दनान्यगरूणि च । विविधानि च वासांसि दिव्यान्याभरणानि च ।।
data.es: "O Mythili having secured me, you get all these comforts wonderful garlands, sandal, incense, garments and beautiful ornaments, rich drinks, beds and seats.You can enjoy songs, dances accompanied by musical instruments.

data.v: महार्हाणि च पानानि यानानि शयनानि च । गीतं नृत्तं च वाद्यं च लभ मां प्राप्य मैथिलि ।।
data.es: "O Mythili having secured me, you get all these comforts wonderful garlands, sandal, incense, garments and beautiful ornaments, rich drinks, beds and seats.You can enjoy songs, dances accompanied by musical instruments.

data.v: स्त्रीरत्नमसि मैवं भूः कुरु गात्रेषु भूषणम् । मां प्राप्य तु कथं हि स्यास्त्वमनर्हा सुविग्रहे ।।
data.es: "You are a, a jewel among women. You should not remain like this. You should adorn yourself properly. How can you remain deprived after having me?

data.v: इदं ते चारुसंजातं यौवनं व्यतिवर्तते । यदतीतं पुनर्नैति स्रोतः शीघ्रमपामिव ।।
data.es: "Your charming youth should not pass away (uselessly). A past event does not come back like a current of stream.

data.v: त्वां कृत्वोपरतो मन्ये रूपकर्ता स विश्वकृत् । न हि रूपोपमा त्वन्या तवास्ति शुभदर्शने ।।
data.es: "O lady with auspicious looks Me thinks, the creator must have retired after creating your beautiful form. For there is no one comparable to you in beauty.

data.v: त्वां समासाद्य वैदेहि रूपयौवनशालिनीम् । कः पुमानतिवर्तेत साक्षादपि पितामहः ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi you have (extraordinary) beauty and (exuberant) youth. Who would not lose his balance of mind even if he were Brahma the grandsire himself after getting you?

data.v: यद्यत्पश्यामि ते गात्रं शीतांशुसदृशानने । तस्मिंस्तस्मिन्पृथुश्रोणि चक्षुर्मम निबध्यते ।।
data.es: "O one with a face like the cool fullmoon, with heavy hips. I am unable to extricate my eyes from any limb (of your body) I see.

data.v: भव मैथिलि भार्या मे मोहमेनं विसर्जय । बह्वीनामुत्तमस्त्रीणां ममाग्रमहिषी भव ।।
data.es: "O Mythili be my wife. Give up this (folly due to) delusion. Be my chief consort among the several excellent women I have picked up here and there. Be blessed.

data.v: लोकेभ्यो यानि रत्नानि संप्रमथ्याहृतानि मे । तानि ते भीरु सर्वाणि राज्यं चैतदहं च ते ।।
data.es: "O timid lady, gems brought forcibly from all the worlds, this kingdom as well as myself are yours.

data.v: विजित्य पृथिवीं सर्वां नानानगरमालिनीम् । जनकाय प्रदास्यामि तव हेतोर्विलासिनि ।।
data.es: "O lovely lady I will win all the cities and lands and give them to Janaka for your sake.

data.v: नेह पश्यामि लोकेऽन्यं यो मे प्रतिबलो भवेत् । पश्य मे सुमहद्वीर्यमप्रतिद्वन्द्वमाहवे ।।
data.es: "I'm unrivalled in this entire world. Behold my matchless virility which permits no rival in war.

data.v: असकृत्संयुगे भग्ना मया विमृदितध्वजाः । अशक्ताः प्रत्यनीकेषु स्थातुं मम सुरासुराः ।।
data.es: "The gods and demons were unable to withstand my power in wars fought against me. They were often shattered and defeated with their flags crushed in war.

data.v: इच्छ मां क्रियतामद्य प्रतिकर्म तवोत्तमम् । सप्रभाण्यवसज्जन्तां तवाङ्गे भूषणानि च । साधु पश्यामि ते रूपं संयुक्तं प्रतिकर्मणा ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यमभर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतभम], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसतज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरसय]

data.es: "Offer your love to me. Get yourself decorated in an excellent way. Wear glowing ornaments on your limbs. Let me see you in pleasingly decorated form.

data.v: प्रतिकर्माभिसंयुक्ता दाक्षिण्येन वरानने । भुङ्क्ष्व भोगान्यथाकामं पिब भीरु रमस्व च । यथेष्टं च प्रयच्छ त्वं पृथिवीं वा धनानि च ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: सरमत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यभतभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततम], अज्ञातम् [१२: ससनत]

data.es: "O charming lady decorate yourself liberally. Enjoy these pleasures as you please. Drink and make merry.

data.v: ललस्व मयि विस्रब्धा धृष्टमाज्ञापयस्व च । मत्प्रभावाल्ललन्त्याश्च ललन्तां बान्धवास्तव ।।
ऋद्धिं ममानुपश्य त्वं श्रियं भद्रे यशश्च मे । किं करिष्यसि रामेण सुभगे चीरवाससा ।।
निक्षिप्तविजयो रामो गतश्रीर्वनगोचरः । व्रती स्थण्डिलशायी च शङ्के जीवति वा न वा ।।
data.es: "O beautiful lady Rama has renounced victory, he has lost his fortune. Clad in bark, he is wandering in the forest following asceticism and sleeping on the ground. What can he do for you? I am in doubt if he is alive or not.

data.v: न हि वैदेहि रामस्त्वां द्रष्टुं वाप्युपलप्स्यते । पुरो बलाकैरसितैर्मेघैर्ज्योत्स्नामिवावृताम् ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi I wonder if Rama can see you at all. You are like moonlight veiled by dark clouds and cannot be seen even by the flying cranes.

data.v: न चापि मम हस्तात्त्वां प्राप्तुमर्हति राघवः । हिरण्यकशिपुः कीर्तिमिन्द्रहस्तगतामिव ।।
data.es: "Surely Raghava will not be able to win you back from my hands any more than the demon Hiranyakasipu was able to usurp the fame of Indra.

data.v: चारुस्मिते चारुदति चारुनेत्रे विलासिनि । मनो हरसि मे भीरु सुपर्णः पन्नगं यथा ।।
data.es: "O lovely, timid lady your smile, your teeth and your eyes are bewitching. Just as Garuda snatches away a serpent, you ravish my mind by your beauty.

data.v: क्लिष्टकौशेयवसनां तन्वीमप्यनलंकृताम् । तां दृष्ट्वा स्वेषु दारेषु रतिं नोपलभाम्यहम् ।।
data.es: "Even when you are attired in soiled silk and are bereft of ornaments, I find no interest in my own wives.

data.v: अन्तःपुरनिवासिन्यः स्त्रियः सर्वगुणान्विताः । यावन्त्यो मम सर्वासामैश्वर्यं कुरु जानकि ।।
data.es: "O Janaki There are a number of virtuous consorts residing in the harem of my royal palace. You may exercise your authority on all of them.

data.v: मम ह्यसितकेशान्ते त्रैलोक्यप्रवराः स्त्रियः । तास्त्वां परिचरिष्यन्ति श्रियमप्सरसो यथा ।।
यानि वैश्रवणे सुभ्रु रत्नानि च धनानि च । तानि लोकांश्च सुश्रोणि मां च भुङ्क्ष्व यथासुखम् ।।
data.es: "O Sita of heavy hips and beautiful brows Be happy. Enjoy all the worlds of mine, the gems and wealth of Ravana.

data.v: न रामस्तपसा देवि न बलेन न विक्रमैः । न धनेन मया तुल्यस्तेजसा यशसापि वा ।।
data.es: "O queen Rama is not equal to me either in penance or prowess or valour or wealth or brilliance or even in fame.

data.v: पिब विहर रमस्व भुङ्क्ष्व भोगा;न्धननिचयं प्रदिशामि मेदिनीं च । मयि लल ललने यथासुखं त्वं; त्वयि च समेत्य ललन्तु बान्धवास्ते ।।
data.es: "O delightful one I will bestow you with heaps of riches and land. Therefore, enjoy with me drinking, sporting, and revelling. Accept me and be happy to sport with me.Let your elatives join you and enjoy all my wealth.

data.v: कुसुमिततरुजालसंततानि; भ्रमरयुतानि समुद्रतीरजानि । कनकविमलहारभूषिताङ्गी; विहर मया सह भीरु काननानि ।।
data.es: "O timid lady embellish yourself with necklaces of pure gold and enjoy with me in the enchanting seaside forest groves full of trees with blossoms and swarming bees.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे विंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the twentieth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा सीता रौद्रस्य रक्षसः । आर्ता दीनस्वरा दीनं प्रत्युवाच शनैर्वचः ।।
data.es: On hearing the demon's haughty words, oppressed, pitiable Sita replied slowly in a sorrowful tone.

data.v: दुःखार्ता रुदती सीता वेपमाना तपस्विनी । चिन्तयन्ती वरारोहा पतिमेव पतिव्रता ।।
data.es: Sita, austere, beautiful and chaste afflicted by grief kept sobbing. Brooding over her husband and trembling in fear, she placed a blade of grass in between her and Ravana and replied with a gentle smile on her face.

data.v: तृणमन्तरतः कृत्वा प्रत्युवाच शुचिस्मिता । निवर्तय मनो मत्तः स्वजने क्रियतां मनः ।।
न मां प्रार्थयितुं युक्तस्त्वं सिद्धिमिव पापकृत् । अकार्यं न मया कार्यमेकपत्न्या विगर्हितम् । कुलं संप्राप्तया पुण्यं कुले महति जातया ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ररजम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरनर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरभत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसमभ]

data.es: "I was born of high lineage and joined a meritorious family by virtue of my marriage. I am devoted only to my husband. I should not commit this contemptible, forbidden act."

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु वैदेही रावणं तं यशस्विनी । राक्षसं पृष्ठतः कृत्वा भूयो वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Glorious Vaidehi having thus spoken to the demon turned her back and continued:

data.v: नाहमौपयिकी भार्या परभार्या सती तव । साधु धर्ममवेक्षस्व साधु साधुव्रतं चर ।।
data.es: "I cannot be your lawful wife obtainable by your personal efforts. I am a chaste woman married to another man. (Being a king) examine the dharma honestly and adopt a pious way of life.

data.v: यथा तव तथान्येषां रक्ष्या दारा निशाचर । आत्मानमुपमां कृत्वा स्वेषु दारेषु रम्यताम् ।।
data.es: "O nightranger Enjoy your wives. Take care of them. Taking your example, others' wives also deserve to be protected.

data.v: अतुष्टं स्वेषु दारेषु चपलं चलितेन्द्रियम् । नयन्ति निकृतिप्रज्ञां परदाराः पराभवम् ।।
data.es: "The wives of others will insult an evilminded man who is not satisfied with his own wives, is fickleminded and has no control over his senses.

data.v: इह सन्तो न वा सन्ति सतो वा नानुवर्तसे । वचो मिथ्या प्रणीतात्मा पथ्यमुक्तं विचक्षणैः ।।
अकृतात्मानमासाद्य राजानमनये रतम् । समृद्धानि विनश्यन्ति राष्ट्राणि नगराणि च ।।
data.es: "Even prosperous countries and cities are destroyed on account of indiscreet rulers engaged in unfair means.

data.v: तथेयं त्वां समासाद्य लङ्का रत्नौघ संकुला । अपराधात्तवैकस्य नचिराद्विनशिष्यति ।।
data.es: "Having got you as its ruler, this Lanka filled with gems (riches) will perish without delay for the crime of one individual.

data.v: स्वकृतैर्हन्यमानस्य रावणादीर्घदर्शिनः । अभिनन्दन्ति भूतानि विनाशे पापकर्मणः ।।
data.es: "O Ravana living beings will welcome and enjoy the destruction of a shortsighted sinner killed by his own vile act.

data.v: एवं त्वां पापकर्माणं वक्ष्यन्ति निकृता जनाः । दिष्ट्यैतद्व्यसनं प्राप्तो रौद्र इत्येव हर्षिताः ।।
data.es: "Seeing you, getting ruined this way for your sin, those who were angry with you for their humiliation in your hands will feel glad and say 'Luckily this terrible fellow has met with his doom' .

data.v: शक्या लोभयितुं नाहमैश्वर्येण धनेन वा । अनन्या राघवेणाहं भास्करेण प्रभा यथा ।।
data.es: "I cannot be lured by your power or wealth. I am inseparable from Raghava like light from the Sun.

data.v: उपधाय भुजं तस्य लोकनाथस्य सत्कृतम् । कथं नामोपधास्यामि भुजमन्यस्य कस्यचित् ।।
data.es: "How can I pillow on somebody's arm after resting on the honourable arm of the great lord of the worlds ?

data.v: अहमौपयिकी भार्या तस्यैव वसुधापतेः । व्रतस्नातस्य विप्रस्य विद्येव विदितात्मनः ।।
data.es: "I am alone the lawful wife of the lord of the earth like the knowledge of the Vedas which rightfully belongs to a wise brahmin who has realised the self after having had his ceremonial bath (as a token of celibacy) and having observed strict vows during the period of his study.

data.v: साधु रावण रामेण मां समानय दुःखिताम् । वने वाशितया सार्धं करेण्वेव गजाधिपम् ।।
data.es: "O Ravana it is proper for you to unite me in distress with Rama as one would unite a female elephant with the lordly elephant from which it is separated in the wilderness.

data.v: मित्रमौपयिकं कर्तुं रामः स्थानं परीप्सता । वधं चानिच्छता घोरं त्वयासौ पुरुषर्षभः ।।
data.es: "I wish you to build friendship with Rama, the bull among men. Surely it is the right thing for you to do, if you are desirous of avoiding a dreadful death.

data.v: वर्जयेद्वज्रमुत्सृष्टं वर्जयेदन्तकश्चिरम् । त्वद्विधं न तु संक्रुद्धो लोकनाथः स राघवः ।।
रामस्य धनुषः शब्दं श्रोष्यसि त्वं महास्वनम् । शतक्रतुविसृष्टस्य निर्घोषमशनेरिव ।।
data.es: "You will hear the terrible twang of Rama's bow resembling the rumble of the thunderbolt released by Indra who performed a hundred yajnas.

data.v: इह शीघ्रं सुपर्वाणो ज्वलितास्या इवोरगाः । इषवो निपतिष्यन्ति रामलक्ष्मणलक्षणाः ।।
रक्षांसि परिनिघ्नन्तः पुर्यामस्यां समन्ततः । असंपातं करिष्यन्ति पतन्तः कङ्कवाससः ।।
data.es: "The shafts bound with feathers of Kanka birds (released by Rama and Lakshmana) will be killing the demons all over this Lanka. They will not give a chance for any other weapon to fall.

data.v: राक्षसेन्द्रमहासर्पान्स रामगरुडो महान् । उद्धरिष्यति वेगेन वैनतेय इवोरगान् ।।
data.es: "Just as Garuda swiftly extirpates the serpents, Rama will exterminate the demon leaders.

data.v: अपनेष्यति मां भर्ता त्वत्तः शीघ्रमरिंदमः । असुरेभ्यः श्रियं दीप्तां विष्णुस्त्रिभिरिव क्रमैः ।।
data.es: "My husband, the subduer of enemies, will soon take me away just as Lord Visnu in the form of Vamana took away the glowing prosperity from the demons with three strides.

data.v: जनस्थाने हतस्थाने निहते रक्षसां बले । अशक्तेन त्वया रक्षः कृतमेतदसाधु वै ।।
data.es: "When the army of demons as killed you had no capacity to protect and was destroyed at Janasthana, the place of death. You acted in this dishonest way.

data.v: आश्रमं तु तयोः शून्यं प्रविश्य नरसिंहयोः । गोचरं गतयोर्भ्रात्रोरपनीता त्वयाधम ।।
data.es: "You are a mean creature. Finding me in the vacant hut, when the two brothers, lions among men, were away, you abducted me.

data.v: न हि गन्धमुपाघ्राय रामलक्ष्मणयोस्त्वया । शक्यं संदर्शने स्थातुं शुना शार्दूलयोरिव ।।
data.es: "Had you smelt the presence of Rama and Lakshmna, it would not have been possible for you to stand there, like a dog under the gaze of a pair of tigers.

data.v: तस्य ते विग्रहे ताभ्यां युगग्रहणमस्थिरम् । वृत्रस्येवेन्द्रबाहुभ्यां बाहोरेकस्य निग्रहः ।।
data.es: "You will not be able to withstand them in a battle. You will meet the same fate as the onearmed Vritra in a battle with the twoarmed Indra.

data.v: क्षिप्रं तव स नाथो मे रामः सौमित्रिणा सह । तोयमल्पमिवादित्यः प्राणानादास्यते शरैः ।।
data.es: "My lord Rama accompanied by Saumitri will draw out your life by his arrows swiftly as Aditya sucks up shallow water at once by his radiance.

data.v: गिरिं कुबेरस्य गतोऽथ वालयं; सभां गतो वा वरुणस्य राज्ञः । असंशयं दाशरथेर्न मोक्ष्यसे; महाद्रुमः कालहतोऽशनेरिव ।।
data.es: "Even if you fly to Kubera's mountain (Kailasa) or the residence of king Varuna (ocean) you will not escape Rama's arrows like a mighty tree cannot evade lightning.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे एकविंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the twentyfirst sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: सीताया वचनं श्रुत्वा परुषं राक्षसाधिपः । प्रत्युवाच ततः सीतां विप्रियं प्रियदर्शनाम् ।।
data.es: Hearing the sharp words of pleasing Sita, the lord of demons replied in unpleasant terms:

data.v: यथा यथा सान्त्वयिता वश्यः स्त्रीणां तथा तथा । यथा यथा प्रियं वक्ता परिभूतस्तथा तथा ।।
data.es: "The more the lover is courteous and loving and pleasing to women the more he is humiliated by them.

data.v: संनियच्छति मे क्रोधं त्वयि कामः समुत्थितः । द्रवतो मार्गमासाद्य हयानिव सुसारथिः ।।
data.es: "My love for you has restrained my anger, just as a good charioteer controls the horses galloping on a wrong path.

data.v: वामः कामो मनुष्याणां यस्मिन्किल निबध्यते । जने तस्मिंस्त्वनुक्रोशः स्नेहश्च किल जायते ।।
data.es: "Love is partial. It gets bound to those in whomsoever compassion and friendship is generated, even though they are punishable.

data.v: एतस्मात्कारणान्न तां घतयामि वरानने । वधार्हामवमानार्हां मिथ्याप्रव्रजिते रताम् ।।
data.es: "O beautiful one it is on this account that I do not kill you even though you deserve to be killed and insulted (for the words used), even as you are engaged in a pseudoascetic life.

data.v: परुषाणि हि वाक्यानि यानि यानि ब्रवीषि माम् । तेषु तेषु वधो युक्तस्तव मैथिलि दारुणः ।।
data.es: "O Mythili for each of the piercing statements made you deserve dreadful death."

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु वैदेहीं रावणो राक्षसाधिपः । क्रोधसंरम्भसंयुक्तः सीतामुत्तरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Glorious Vaidehi having thus spoken to the demon turned her back and continued:

data.v: द्वौ मासौ रक्षितव्यौ मे योऽवधिस्ते मया कृतः । ततः शयनमारोह मम त्वं वरवर्णिनि ।।
data.es: "I shall wait for two months, the deadline fixed. O lady of beautiful hue thereafter you have to share my bed.

data.v: द्वाभ्यामूर्ध्वं तु मासाभ्यां भर्तारं मामनिच्छतीम् । मम त्वां प्रातराशार्थमारभन्ते महानसे ।।
data.es: "If you are still reluctant to accept me as your husband after two months you will be sent to kitchen to be cooked as morning breakfast for me".

data.v: तां तर्ज्यमानां संप्रेक्ष्य राक्षसेन्द्रेण जानकीम् । देवगन्धर्वकन्यास्ता विषेदुर्विपुलेक्षणाः ।।
data.es: Observing Janaki, threatened by the demon king the daughters of gods and gandharvas shed tears with distressful eyes.

data.v: ओष्ठप्रकारैरपरा नेत्रवक्त्रैस्तथापराः । सीतामाश्वासयामासुस्तर्जितां तेन रक्षसा ।।
data.es: When Sita was threatened by the demon king, the daughters of gods and gandharvas there consoled her through gestures of their lips and eyes.

data.v: ताभिराश्वासिता सीता रावणं राक्षसाधिपम् । उवाचात्महितं वाक्यं वृत्तशौण्डीर्यगर्वितम् ।।
data.es: Having thus been consoled, Sita, proud of the power of her virtues, said this to Ravana in selfdefence:

data.v: नूनं न ते जनः कश्चिदसिन्निःश्रेयसे स्थितः । निवारयति यो न त्वां कर्मणोऽस्माद्विगर्हितात् ।।
data.es: "Obviously there is no one among your people keen on your welfare since nobody is preventing you from this reproachable act.

data.v: मां हि धर्मात्मनः पत्नीं शचीमिव शचीपतेः । त्वदन्यस्त्रिषु लोकेषु प्रार्थयेन्मनसापि कः ।।
data.es: "Who in all the three worlds other than you would, even in mind, seek this consort of the righteous self (Sri Rama) like Sachi to Indra? .

data.v: राक्षसाधम रामस्य भार्याममिततेजसः । उक्तवानसि यत्पापं क्व गतस्तस्य मोक्ष्यसे ।।
data.es: "O stupid demon where can you go to escape the consequences of your sinful words spoken against Rama's consort of undimmed brilliance?

data.v: यथा दृप्तश्च मातङ्गः शशश्च सहितौ वने । तथा द्विरदवद्रामस्त्वं नीच शशवत्स्मृतः ।।
data.es: "It is like a proud elephant fighting in war with a rabbit. Rama is like an elephant and you are like an ordinary rabbit people speak of.

data.v: स त्वमिक्ष्वाकुनाथं वै क्षिपन्निह न लज्जसे । चक्षुषो विषयं तस्य न तावदुपगच्छसि ।।
data.es: "You are not ashamed of belittling Rama in his absence. You have not yet walked into his sight.

data.v: इमे ते नयने क्रूरे विरूपे कृष्णपिङ्गले । क्षितौ न पतिते कस्मान्मामनार्यनिरीक्षितः ।।
data.es: "O ignoble wretch I wonder why your dark brown, distorted eyes do not fall off (the socket) when you look at me (lustfully).

data.v: तस्य धर्मात्मनः पत्नीं स्नुषां दशरथस्य च । कथं व्याहरतो मां ते न जिह्वा पाप शीर्यते ।।
data.es: "Why does not your tongue drop down while you speak such words against this consort of the righteous king (Rama) and daughterin law of Dasaratha?

data.v: असंदेशात्तु रामस्य तपसश्चानुपालनात् । न त्वां कुर्मि दशग्रीव भस्म भस्मार्हतेजसा ।।
data.es: "O Ravana I can reduce you to ashes through the fire of my chastity. But I do not have Rama's permission and I want to preserve my power of ascetism even though you are fit to be consigned to the flames.

data.v: नापहर्तुमहं शक्या तस्य रामस्य धीमतः । विधिस्तव वधार्थाय विहितो नात्र संशयः ।।
data.es: "When I was with wise Rama, it was not possible for you to abduct me. No doubt Providence has ordained this to bring about your death.

data.v: शूरेण धनदभ्राता बलैः समुदितेन च । अपोह्य रामं कस्माद्धि दारचौर्यं त्वया कृतम् ।।
data.es: "You are a (great) warrior and a brother of Kubera. You possess an army. Then why did you abduct Rama's wife bypassing him?"

data.v: सीताया वचनं श्रुत्वा रावणो राक्षसाधिपः । विवृत्य नयने क्रूरे जानकीमन्ववैक्षत ।।
data.es: Hearing the sharp words of pleasing Sita, the lord of demons replied in unpleasant terms:

data.v: नीलजीमूतसंकाशो महाभुजशिरोधरः । सिंहसत्त्वगतिः श्रीमान्दीप्तजिह्वोग्रलोचनः ।।
data.es: Prosperous Ravana looked like a mass of dark cloud, with strong arms, stout neck, gait of a lion, a blazing tongue and burning eyes

data.v: चलाग्रमकुटः प्रांशुश्चित्रमाल्यानुलेपनः । रक्तमाल्याम्बरधरस्तप्ताङ्गदविभूषणः ।।
data.es: He appeared taller with an unsteady crown. He was wearing wonderful red flower garlands and clothes and was smeared with unguents, shining in ornamental armlets.

data.v: श्रोणीसूत्रेण महता मेककेन सुसंवृतः । अमृतोत्पादनद्धेन भुजंगेनेव मन्दरः ।।
data.es: Wrapped well with a big black thread around his hips, he appeared like mount Mandara encompassed by a black serpent at the time of churning the milkocean for nectar.

data.v: तरुणादित्यवर्णाभ्यां कुण्डलाभ्यां विभूषितः । रक्तपल्लवपुष्पाभ्यामशोकाभ्यामिवाचलः ।।
data.es: He stood like a mountain with two Ashoka trees clothed with red leaves and flowers in the form of earrings of the colour of the rising Sun.

data.v: अवेक्षमाणो वैदेहीं कोपसंरक्तलोचनः । उवाच रावणः सीतां भुजंग इव निःश्वसन् ।।
data.es: Looking at Vaidehi, eyes red with anger, and breathing heavily like a histing snake, Ravana replied:

data.v: अनयेनाभिसंपन्नमर्थहीनमनुव्रते । नाशयाम्यहमद्य त्वां सूर्यः संध्यामिवौजसा ।।
data.es: "O Sita you are following a vow of chastity and treading a meaningless, wrong path. I will destroy you as the Sun dispels the morning twilight with his lustre".

data.v: इत्युक्त्वा मैथिलीं राजा रावणः शत्रुरावणः । संदिदेश ततः सर्वा राक्षसीर्घोरदर्शनाः ।।
data.es: King Ravana, a tormentor of enemies, having thus threatened Mythili commanded the shedemons women of fiecrceful appearance as follows:

data.v: एकाक्षीमेककर्णां च कर्णप्रावरणां तथा । गोकर्णीं हस्तिकर्णीं च लम्बकर्णीमकर्णिकाम् ।।
हस्तिपद्य श्वपद्यौ च गोपदीं पादचूलिकाम् । एकाक्षीमेकपादीं च पृथुपादीमपादिकाम् ।।
अतिमात्रशिरोग्रीवामतिमात्रकुचोदरीम् । अतिमात्रास्यनेत्रां च दीर्घजिह्वामजिह्विकाम् । अनासिकां सिंहमुखीं गोमुखीं सूकरीमुखीम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ररजर], अज्ञातम् [१२: ससतज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जभतत], अज्ञातम् [१२: भततर]

data.es: Of them one had one eye, the other one ear, another with ears covered, one had the ear of a cow, another had ears of an elephant and yet another, long, hanging ears. One had the feet of an elephant, another, hoofs of a horse and still another of a cow. While one had a single foot, another had broad feet and yet another no feet at all. One had a long neck and a large head. One had large breasts and belly. One had a big face and eyes, another had a long tongue and yet another no tongue at all. One had no nose and still another had a lion face and yet another the face of a cow.

data.v: यथा मद्वशगा सीता क्षिप्रं भवति जानकी । तथा कुरुत राक्षस्यः सर्वाः क्षिप्रं समेत्य च ।।
data.es: "O demonesses, all of you jointly dispose Janaki towards me. See that she submits to me at once.

data.v: प्रतिलोमानुलोमैश्च सामदानादिभेदनैः । आवर्तयत वैदेहीं दण्डस्योद्यमनेन च ।।
data.es: "By adopting means favourable or contrary to her will or through persuasion or coercion or through reward or punishment, draw Vaidehi's mind towards me." (said Ravana).

data.v: इति प्रतिसमादिश्य राक्षसेन्द्रः पुनः पुनः । काममन्युपरीतात्मा जानकीं पर्यतर्जयत् ।।
data.es: The demon king repeatedly commanded the ogresses burning in anger and passion and threatened Sita again and again, pointing his finger at her.

data.v: उपगम्य ततः क्षिप्रं राक्षसी धान्यमालिनी । परिष्वज्य दशग्रीवमिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: An ogress called Dhanyamalini at once approached the tenheaded Ravana and embracing him, said:.

data.v: मया क्रीड महाराजसीतया किं तवानया । अकामां कामयानस्य शरीरमुपतप्यते । इच्छन्तीं कामयानस्य प्रीतिर्भवति शोभना ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यमनर], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसरय], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसयम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरतत]

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु राक्षस्या समुत्क्षिप्तस्ततो बली । ज्वलद्भास्करवर्णाभं प्रविवेश निवेशनम् ।।
data.es: Having heard her words, the demon king who resembled a fierce dark cloud turned away, laughing heartily.

data.v: देवगन्धर्वकन्याश्च नागकन्याश्च तास्ततः । परिवार्य दशग्रीवं विविशुस्तद्गृहोत्तमम् ।।
data.es: Then the daughters of gods, gandharvas and nagas gathered round and followed him into his excellent palace.

data.v: स मैथिलीं धर्मपरामवस्थितां; प्रवेपमानां परिभर्त्स्य रावणः । विहाय सीतां मदनेन मोहितः; स्वमेव वेश्म प्रविवेश भास्वरम् ।।
data.es: Having derided Mythili trembling in fear yet steadfast in treading the righteous path, Ravana, overpowered with passion left her and entered his glittering mansion.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे द्वाविंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends twentysecond sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: इत्युक्त्वा मैथिलीं राजा रावणः शत्रुरावणः । संदिश्य च ततः सर्वा राक्षसीर्निर्जगाम ह ।।
data.es: King Ravana, a tormentor of enemies, having thus threatened Mythili commanded the shedemons women of fiecrceful appearance as follows:

data.v: निष्क्रान्ते राक्षसेन्द्रे तु पुनरन्तःपुरं गते । राक्षस्यो भीमरूपास्ताः सीतां समभिदुद्रुवुः ।।
data.es: As the demon king left for his abode all the demonesses of hideous looks rushed towards Sita and crowded around her.

data.v: ततः सीतामुपागम्य राक्षस्यः क्रोधमूर्छिताः । परं परुषया वाचा वैदेहीमिदमब्रुवन् ।।
data.es: The demonesses, overcome with anger, approached Sita and harshly said:

data.v: पौलस्त्यस्य वरिष्ठस्य रावणस्य महात्मनः । दशग्रीवस्य भार्यात्वं सीते न बहु मन्यसे ।।
data.es: 'O Sita don't you think it is a privilege to be the wife of the highsouled, tennecked Ravana, who is the distinguished king of a high family of sage Paulastya?

data.v: ततस्त्वेकजटा नाम राक्षसी वाक्यमब्रवीत् । आमन्त्र्य क्रोधताम्राक्षी सीतां करतलोदरीम् ।।
data.es: Then Ekajata, a shedemon of hideous looks, eyes red with anger and a belly of the size of the palm said to Sita:

data.v: प्रजापतीनां षण्णां तु चतुर्थो यः प्रजापतिः । मानसो ब्रह्मणः पुत्रः पुलस्त्य इति विश्रुतः ।।
data.es: 'The mindborn son of Brahma is well known as Paulastya. He was the fourth among the six Prajapatis (Maricha, Atri, Angira, Pulastya, Plaha, Kratu).

data.v: पुलस्त्यस्य तु तेजस्वी महर्षिर्मानसः सुतः । नाम्ना स विश्रवा नाम प्रजापतिसमप्रभः ।।
data.es: 'This glorious mindborn sage Pulastya's son is the famous Vishrava who, in glory and splendour was equal to Prajapatis.

data.v: तस्य पुत्रो विशालाक्षि रावणः शत्रुरावणः । तस्य त्वं राक्षसेन्द्रस्य भार्या भवितुमर्हसि । मयोक्तं चारुसर्वाङ्गि वाक्यं किं नानुमन्यसे ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: रररज], अज्ञातम् [१२: तसनम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जमतत], अज्ञातम् [१२: ययतर]

data.es: 'O largeeyes lady to become the wife of the lord of demons is a stroke of good luck. You deserve to be one. O lady of beautiful limbs why don't you accept his proposal?'

data.v: ततो हरिजटा नाम राक्षसी वाक्यमब्रवीत् । विवृत्य नयने कोपान्मार्जारसदृशेक्षणा ।।
data.es: Then Ekajata, a shedemon of hideous looks, eyes red with anger and a belly of the size of the palm said to Sita:

data.v: येन देवास्त्रयस्त्रिंशद्देवराजश्च निर्जितः । तस्य त्वं राक्षसेन्द्रस्य भार्या भवितुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: 'You ought to be the wife of the lord of ogres who has vanquished thirty three crores of gods including Indra, their king.'

data.v: वीर्योत्सिक्तस्य शूरस्य संग्रामेष्वनिवर्तिनः । बलिनो वीर्ययुक्तस्या भार्यात्वं किं न लप्स्यसे ।।
data.es: 'Why don't you wish to be the wife of such a mighty and powerful king, a valiant hero who has never beaten a retreat in war?

data.v: प्रियां बहुमतां भार्यां त्यक्त्वा राजा महाबलः । सर्वासां च महाभागां त्वामुपैष्यति रावणः ।।
data.es: 'Even renouncing his highly respectable, favourite wife among all, mighty Ravana is prepared to accept you.

data.v: समृद्धं स्त्रीसहस्रेण नानारत्नोपशोभितम् । अन्तःपुरं समुत्सृज्य त्वामुपैष्यति रावणः ।।
data.es: 'Ravana is prepared to abandon a thousand wives in his prosperous harem decorated with all kinds of gems in order to accept you.'

data.v: असकृद्देवता युद्धे नागगन्धर्वदानवाः । निर्जिताः समरे येन स ते पार्श्वमुपागतः ।।
data.es: Another ogress called Vikata said, ' Know that he who has often defeated gods in war and has vanquished nagas, gandharvas and demons has come to you (seeking your favour)'.

data.v: तस्य सर्वसमृद्धस्या रावणस्य महात्मनः । किमर्थं राक्षसेन्द्रस्य भार्यात्वं नेच्छसेऽधमे ।।
data.es: 'O Sita don't you think it is a privilege to be the wife of the highsouled, tennecked Ravana, who is the distinguished king of a high family of sage Paulastya?

data.v: यस्य सूर्यो न तपति भीतो यस्य च मारुतः । न वाति स्मायतापाङ्गे किं त्वं तस्य न तिष्ठसि ।।
data.es: Then an ogress called Durmukhi said, 'O lady of long sideglances why don't you yield to him, afraid of whom the Sun scorches not and strong winds blow not?

data.v: पुष्पवृष्टिं च तरवो मुमुचुर्यस्य वै भयात् । शैलाश्च सुभ्रु पानीयं जलदाश्च यदेच्छति ।।
data.es: 'O lady of beautiful brows why don't you make up your mind to accept the king of kings, afraid of whom the trees rain flowers, the mountains and clouds release water at his will? Ravana is the king of the southwest, direction Why don't you wish to be his wife?

data.v: तस्य नैरृतराजस्य राजराजस्य भामिनि । किं त्वं न कुरुषे बुद्धिं भार्यार्थे रावणस्य हि ।।
data.es: 'O lady of beautiful brows why don't you make up your mind to accept the king of kings, afraid of whom the trees rain flowers, the mountains and clouds release water at his will? Ravana is the king of the southwest, direction Why don't you wish to be his wife?

data.v: साधु ते तत्त्वतो देवि कथितं साधु भामिनि । गृहाण सुस्मिते वाक्यमन्यथा न भविष्यसि ।।
ततः सीतामुपागम्य राक्षस्यो विकृताननाः । परुषं परुषा नार्य ऊचुस्ता वाक्यमप्रियम् ।।
data.es: The demonesses, overcome with anger, approached Sita and harshly said:

data.v: किं त्वमन्तःपुरे सीते सर्वभूतमनोहरे । महार्हशयनोपेते न वासमनुमन्यसे ।।
data.es: 'O Sita why don't you agree to dwell in Ravana's inner apartment furnished with fine bedsteads, and which is delightful?

data.v: मानुषी मानुषस्यैव भार्यात्वं बहु मन्यसे । प्रत्याहर मनो रामान्न त्वं जातु भविष्यसि ।।
data.es: 'You are a woman, wife of Rama, an ordinary mortal you are holding in high esteem. Withdraw your mind from Rama or else you will not survive.

data.v: मानुषी मानुषं तं तु राममिच्छसि शोभने । राज्याद्भ्रष्टमसिद्धार्थं विक्लवं तमनिन्दिते ।।
data.es: 'O charming lady you have an irreproachable beauty and grace. Why do you think of human Rama only who has been dethroned from the kingdom. He is only a human being who is unsuccessful and distressful.'

data.v: राक्षसीनां वचः श्रुत्वा सीता पद्मनिभेक्षणा । नेत्राभ्यामश्रुपूर्णाभ्यामिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Hearing the words of the ogresses, Sita with eyes like lotus petals full of tears replied this way:

data.v: यदिदं लोकविद्विष्टमुदाहरथ संगताः । नैतन्मनसि वाक्यं मे किल्बिषं प्रतितिष्ठति ।।
न मानुषी राक्षसस्य भार्या भवितुमर्हति । कामं खादत मां सर्वा न करिष्यामि वो वचः । दीनो वा राज्यहीनो वा यो मे भर्ता स मे गुरुः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: सरयम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यमतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतरभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जयभम]

data.v: सीताया वचनं श्रुत्वा राक्षस्यः क्रोधमूर्छिताः । भर्त्सयन्ति स्म परुषैर्वाक्यै रावणचोदिताः ।।
data.es: Hearing the reply of Sita, the ogresses ordered by Ravana and overtaken by anger again began to threaten Sita using harsh words.

data.v: अवलीनः स निर्वाक्यो हनुमाञ्शिंशपाद्रुमे । सीतां संतर्जयन्तीस्ता राक्षसीरशृणोत्कपिः ।।
data.es: Hanuman who kept himself concealed on the simsupa tree speechlessly listened to the ogresses threatening Sita.

data.v: तामभिक्रम्य संरब्धा वेपमानां समन्ततः । भृशं संलिलिहुर्दीप्तान्प्रलम्बदशनच्छदान् ।।
data.es: Sita was trembling in fear. The enraged ogresses went on licking their lips hanging, again and again.

data.v: ऊचुश्च परमक्रुद्धाः प्रगृह्याशु परश्वधान् । नेयमर्हति भर्तारं रावणं राक्षसाधिपम् ।।
data.es: The enraged ogresses immediately picked up the axes and rose up saying, 'she is unfit to have the demon king, Ravana as her husband'.

data.v: सा भर्त्स्यमाना भीमाभी राक्षसीभिर्वरानना । सा बाष्पमपमार्जन्ती शिंशपां तामुपागमत् ।।
data.es: As the charming Sita was threatened by the fierce ogresses, she moved towards the simsupa tree with eyes full of tears.

data.v: ततस्तां शिंशपां सीता राक्षसीभिः समावृता । अभिगम्य विशालाक्षी तस्थौ शोकपरिप्लुता ।।
data.es: Then the largeeyed Sita, drowned in sorrow surrounded by the ogresses went near the simsupa tree and stood there.

data.v: तां कृशां दीनवदनां मलिनाम्बरधारिणीम् । भर्त्सयां चक्रिरे भीमा राक्षस्यस्ताः समन्ततः ।।
data.es: The ogresses started intimidating Sita who was dressed in soiled clothes and emaciated with a dejected look on her face.

data.v: ततस्तां विनता नाम राक्षसी भीमदर्शना । अब्रवीत्कुपिताकारा कराला निर्णतोदरी ।।
data.es: Then a dark ogress called Vinata with a terryfying look, loathsome appearance and a large sunken belly said to Sita:

data.v: सीते पर्याप्तमेतावद्भर्तृस्नेहो निदर्शितः । सर्वत्रातिकृतं भद्रे व्यसनायोपकल्पते ।।
data.es: 'O Sita you have shown your love for your husband to this extent. It is enough. O auspicious lady anything carried to excess leads to adversity.

data.v: परितुष्टास्मि भद्रं ते मानुषस्ते कृतो विधिः । ममापि तु वचः पथ्यं ब्रुवन्त्याः कुरु मैथिलि ।।
data.es: "O Mythili I beseech you (to oblige Ravana). You have discharged your duty as a human being. Be happy. But you should also heed my advice which is, after all, salutary.

data.v: रावणं भज भर्तारं भर्तारं सर्वरक्षसाम् । विक्रान्तं रूपवन्तं च सुरेशमिव वासवम् ।।
दक्षिणं त्यागशीलं च सर्वस्य प्रियवादिनम् । मानुषं कृपणं रामं त्यक्त्वा रावणमाश्रय ।।
दिव्याङ्गरागा वैदेहि दिव्याभरणभूषिता । अद्य प्रभृति सर्वेषां लोकानामीश्वरी भव । अग्नेः स्वाहा यथा देवी शचीवेन्द्रस्य शोभने ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: तमरभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जमनम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: मरसम]

data.es: 'Leave the helpless human Rama and seek Ravana's refuge. O Vaidehi, using the heavenly unguents and adorned with imposing ornaments from now on, be the queen of all people.

data.v: किं ते रामेण वैदेहि कृपणेन गतायुषा ।।
data.es: 'O beautiful Sita Just like Swaha, queen to the Firegod and Sachi to Indra, accept Ravana. Why are you still thinking of Rama who is helpless and whose life span is coming to an end soon.

data.v: एतदुक्तं च मे वाक्यं यदि त्वं न करिष्यसि । अस्मिन्मुहूर्ते सर्वास्त्वां भक्षयिष्यामहे वयम् ।।
data.es: 'If you do not heed our words of advice, all of us will eat you at this very moment.'

data.v: अन्या तु विकटा नाम लम्बमानपयोधरा । अब्रवीत्कुपिता सीतां मुष्टिमुद्यम्य गर्जती ।।
data.es: Now Vikata another ogress with hanging breasts raised her fist up in anger and roared at Sita.

data.v: बहून्यप्रतिरूपाणि वचनानि सुदुर्मते । अनुक्रोशान्मृदुत्वाच्च सोढानि तव मैथिलि । न च नः कुरुषे वाक्यं हितं कालपुरस्कृतम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: तसनज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसभज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरभर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरतत]

data.es: 'O wicked Mythili we have tolerated many unpleasant words uttered by you due to our kindness and mildness৷৷

data.v: आनीतासि समुद्रस्य पारमन्यैर्दुरासदम् । रावणान्तःपुरं घोरं प्रविष्टा चासि मैथिलि ।।
data.es: 'O Mythili you have heeded not our good and timely advice tendered in your interest. You have been brought to the other shore of the ocean and to the inner chambers of Ravana which is very difficult for others to access.

data.v: रावणस्य गृहे रुधा अस्माभिस्तु सुरक्षिता । न त्वां शक्तः परित्रातुमपि साक्षात्पुरंदरः ।।
data.es: 'You are in Ravana's house, wellguarded by us. It is not possible even for Indra, destroyer of citadels, to come to your rescue (let alone Rama).

data.v: कुरुष्व हितवादिन्या वचनं मम मैथिलि । अलमश्रुप्रपातेन त्यज शोकमनर्थकम् ।।
data.es: 'Mythili, act according to our advice. I am your wellwisher. Give up sorrow and stop shedding useless tears.

data.v: भज प्रीतिं प्रहर्षं च त्यजैतां नित्यदैन्यताम् । सीते राक्षसराजेन सह क्रीड यथासुखम् ।।
data.es: 'O Sita offer your love to Ravana, adore him and be happy. Give up this continuous dejection. Enjoy all pleasures along with the king of demons.

data.v: जानासि हि यथा भीरु स्त्रीणां यौवनमध्रुवम् । यावन्न ते व्यतिक्रामेत्तावत्सुखमवाप्नुहि ।।
data.es: 'O timid Sita know that youth of women is fleeting and transient. Before it is over, enjoy all kinds of pleasures.

data.v: उद्यानानि च रम्याणि पर्वतोपवनानि च । सह राक्षसराजेन चर त्वं मदिरेक्षणे ।।
data.es: 'O lady of intoxicating eyes range in the company of the demon king, the delightful gardens and mountain ranges filled with gardens.

data.v: स्त्रीसहस्राणि ते सप्त वशे स्थास्यन्ति सुन्दरि । रावणं भज भर्तारं भर्तारं सर्वरक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: 'O beautiful Sita seven thousand ogresses will be at your beck and call. (Therefore) accept Ravana, the lord of all ogres as your husband.

data.v: उत्पाट्य वा ते हृदयं भक्षयिष्यामि मैथिलि । यदि मे व्याहृतं वाक्यं न यथावत्करिष्यसि ।।
data.es: 'O Mythili if you heed not my words of advice, I will pluck out your heart and eat it up'.

data.v: ततश्चण्डोदरी नाम राक्षसी क्रूरदर्शना । भ्रामयन्ती महच्छूलमिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Then an ogress named Praghasa, overwhelmed with anger, deriding Sita said these terrible words:

data.v: इमां हरिणलोकाक्षीं त्रासोत्कम्पपयोधराम् । रावणेन हृतां दृष्ट्वा दौर्हृदो मे महानभूत् ।।
data.es: 'I have developed a morbid desire to feast upon this woman with eyes flashing like doe's, whose breasts heave with stress and fear after she was abducted by Ravana.

data.v: यकृत्प्लीहमथोत्पीडं हृदयं च सबन्धनम् । अन्त्राण्यपि तथा शीर्षं खादेयमिति मे मतिः ।।
data.es: 'I thought of feasting on your spleen, liver, heart, all the joints, head and intestines.'

data.v: ततस्तु प्रघसा नाम राक्षसी वाक्यमब्रवीत् । कण्ठमस्या नृशंसायाः पीडयामः किमास्यते ।।
data.es: Next spoke an ogress called Praghasa, saying 'Why not we twist and squeeze the neck of this heartless lady. Why are you sitting idle still? Come on.'

data.v: निवेद्यतां ततो राज्ञे मानुषी सा मृतेति ह । नात्र कश्चन संदेहः खादतेति स वक्ष्यति ।।
data.es: 'Thereafter we will announce that such a human being is dead. Then Ravana will simply say 'eat her up'. There is no doubt .'

data.v: ततस्त्वजामुखी नाम राक्षसी वाक्यमब्रवीत् । विशस्येमां ततः सर्वान्समान्कुरुत पीलुकान् ।।
data.es: Then an ogress called Harijata said this in anger, her cateyes rolling:

data.v: विभजाम ततः सर्वा विवादो मे न रोचते । पेयमानीयतां क्षिप्रं माल्यं च विविधं बहु ।।
data.es: 'We shall share them. I do not like disputes in this regard. Go swiftly and get drinks and food to lick. Let the accompanying dishes of all variety and quality be brought.'

data.v: ततः शूर्पणखा नाम राक्षसी वाक्यमब्रवीत् । अजामुखा यदुक्तं हि तदेव मम रोचते ।।
data.es: Then an ogress called Surpanakha said, 'I too like the proposal of Ajamukhi.'

data.v: सुरा चानीयतां क्षिप्रं सर्वशोकविनाशिनी । मानुषं मांसमासाद्य नृत्यामोऽथ निकुम्भिलाम् ।।
data.es: 'Get the wine quickly, destroyer of all sorrows. After relishing the human flesh we will start Nikumbhila dance.'

data.v: एवं संभर्त्स्यमाना सा सीता सुरसुतोपमा । राक्षसीभिः सुघोराभिर्धैर्यमुत्सृज्य रोदिति ।।
data.es: Threatened by the ogresses in that manner, Sita who was like the daughter of a god, cried aloud.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे चतुर्विंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the twentyfourth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तथा तासां वदन्तीनां परुषं दारुणं बहु । राक्षसीनामसौम्यानां रुरोद जनकात्मजा ।।
data.es: On hearing the many harsh words of dire threat by the ugly ogresses, the daughter of Janaka wept.

data.v: एवमुक्ता तु वैदेही राक्षसीभिर्मनस्विनी । उवाच परमत्रस्ता बाष्पगद्गदया गिरा ।।
data.es: In reply to the ogresses who thus spoke, noble Vaidehi, terribly frightened, said in a voice choked with tears.

data.v: न मानुषी राक्षसस्य भार्या भवितुमर्हति । कामं खादत मां सर्वा न करिष्यामि वो वचः ।।
सा राक्षसी मध्यगता सीता सुरसुतोपमा । न शर्म लेभे दुःखार्ता रावणेन च तर्जिता ।।
data.es: Surrounded by the ogresses, distressed Sita, who was like the daughter of a divine, did not get any solace.

data.v: वेपते स्माधिकं सीता विशन्तीवाङ्गमात्मनः । वने यूथपरिभ्रष्टा मृगी कोकैरिवार्दिता ।।
data.es: 'Like a doe that strayed from the herd in the forest and tormented by wolves around, Sita had withdrawn into herself all her limbs through fear, she was trembling excessively.

data.v: सा त्वशोकस्य विपुलां शाखामालम्ब्य पुष्पिताम् । चिन्तयामास शोकेन भर्तारं भग्नमानसा ।।
data.es: Laying hold on a large blossoming branch of the Ashoka tree, Sita thought of her husband with a broken heart.

data.v: सा स्नापयन्ती विपुलौ स्तनौ नेत्रजलस्रवैः । चिन्तयन्ती न शोकस्य तदान्तमधिगच्छति ।।
data.es: Her large breasts bathed with the flow of tears, she continued to brood over her plight and found no end to it.

data.v: सा वेपमाना पतिता प्रवाते कदली यथा । राक्षसीनां भयत्रस्ता विवर्णवदनाभवत् ।।
data.es: Trembling like a banana tree uprooted by the stormy wind, Sita who was seized with fear of the ogresses looked pale and desperate.

data.v: तस्या सा दीर्घविपुला वेपन्त्याः सीतया तदा । ददृशे कम्पिनी वेणी व्यालीव परिसर्पती ।।
data.es: The long, luxuriant braid of hair of the trembling Sita waving (in the wind), appeared like a crawling female serpent.

data.v: सा निःश्वसन्ती दुःखार्ता शोकोपहतचेतना । आर्ता व्यसृजदश्रूणि मैथिली विललाप ह ।।
data.es: The distressed Mythili, her consciousness drowned in grief, sighing, shed streams of tears.

data.v: हा रामेति च दुःखार्ता पुनर्हा लक्ष्मणेति च । हा श्वश्रु मम कौसल्ये हा सुमित्रेति भाविनि ।।
data.es: 'The bright, beautiful Sita began to wail, alas, "Rama alas, Lakshmana alas, my motherinlaw, Kausalya alas, Sumitra

data.v: लोकप्रवादः सत्योऽयं पण्डितैः समुदाहृतः । अकाले दुर्लभो मृत्युः स्त्रिया वा पुरुषस्य वा ।।
data.es: 'There is a famous popular saying among the learned that untimely death is not possible either for a woman or a man.It is true that I am living in this miserable condition, deprived of Rama's company and tormented by these cruel ogresses here. Living in such conditions even for a moment is impossible. But nobody dies an untimely death.

data.v: यत्राहमाभिः क्रूराभी राक्षसीभिरिहार्दिता । जीवामि हीना रामेण मुहूर्तमपि दुःखिता ।।
data.es: 'There is a famous popular saying among the learned that untimely death is not possible either for a woman or a man.It is true that I am living in this miserable condition, deprived of Rama's company and tormented by these cruel ogresses here. Living in such conditions even for a moment is impossible. But nobody dies an untimely death.

data.v: एषाल्पपुण्या कृपणा विनशिष्याम्यनाथवत् । समुद्रमध्ये नौ पूर्णा वायुवेगैरिवाहता ।।
data.es: 'I am a woman of low merit, a wretched woman, an orphan. I will be ruined like the loaded boat that gets hit in the midst of the ocean by the stormy wind.

data.v: भर्तारं तमपश्यन्ती राक्षसीवशमागता । सीदामि खलु शोकेन कूलं तोयहतं यथा ।।
data.es: 'Unable to find my husband and seized by these ogresses, I am collapsing on account of grief like a riverbank under the current of water.

data.v: तं पद्मदलपत्राक्षं सिंहविक्रान्तगामिनम् । धन्याः पश्यन्ति मे नाथं कृतज्ञं प्रियवादिनम् ।।
data.es: 'Blessed are those who are in touch with my husband with eyes like lotus petals, whose walk is majestic like a lion's, who has a sense of gratitude and is pleasing in words.

data.v: सर्वथा तेन हीनाया रामेण विदितात्मना । तीष्क्णं विषमिवास्वाद्य दुर्लभं मम जीवितम् ।।
data.es: 'Separated from Rama endowed with selfknowledge, it is impossible for me to live like one who has drunk venom.

data.v: कीदृशं तु मया पापं पुरा देहान्तरे कृतम् । येनेदं प्राप्यते दुःखं मया घोरं सुदारुणम् ।।
data.es: 'I do not know what great sin I have committed in my past life for which I experience this terrific, cruel affliction?

data.v: जीवितं त्यक्तुमिच्छामि शोकेन महता वृता । राक्षसीभिश्च रक्षन्त्या रामो नासाद्यते मया ।।
data.es: 'I long to give up my life, afflicted with great grief, as I, wellguarded by these ogresses, have no hope to reach Rama.

data.v: धिगस्तु खलु मानुष्यं धिगस्तु परवश्यताम् । न शक्यं यत्परित्यक्तुमात्मच्छन्देन जीवितम् ।।
data.es: 'Fie upon this human life. Fie upon this dependence. What a pitiable situation I am placed in. It is not possible for me, a human, to give up life at my free will.' इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे पञ्चविंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the twentyfifth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: प्रसक्ताश्रुमुखीत्येवं ब्रुवन्ती जनकात्मजा । अधोमुखमुखी बाला विलप्तुमुपचक्रमे ।।
data.es: The young daughter of king Janaka thus speaking, began to cry, her face bent down.

data.v: उन्मत्तेव प्रमत्तेव भ्रान्तचित्तेव शोचती । उपावृत्ता किशोरीव विवेष्टन्ती महीतले ।।
data.es: Bewildered or distracted or intoxicated, this young lady wailed, wallowing round on the ground like a young female horse:

data.v: राघवस्याप्रमत्तस्य रक्षसा कामरूपिणा । रावणेन प्रमथ्याहमानीता क्रोशती बलात् ।।
data.es: "When Rama was engaged (in deer hunt) and I was screaming, I was brought forcibly by Ravana who can assume any form at his will.

data.v: राक्षसी वशमापन्ना भर्त्यमाना सुदारुणम् । चिन्तयन्ती सुदुःखार्ता नाहं जीवितुमुत्सहे ।।
data.es: "Having fallen under the clutches of the dreadful demonesses and threatened by them, I am so full of woes and worries that I don't want to live.

data.v: न हि मे जीवितेनार्थो नैवार्थैर्न च भूषणैः । वसन्त्या राक्षसी मध्ये विना रामं महारथम् ।।
data.es: "In the absence of the great charioteer Rama, of what use is my living in the midst of ogresses? I need no wealth, no ornaments.

data.v: धिङ्मामनार्यामसतीं याहं तेन विना कृता । मुहूर्तमपि रक्षामि जीवितं पापजीविता ।।
data.es: "I am preserving this sinful life like this though separated from Rama. Fie on me, for this wretched, infidel life

data.v: का च मे जीविते श्रद्धा सुखे वा तं प्रियं विना । भर्तारं सागरान्ताया वसुधायाः प्रियं वदम् ।।
data.es: "How can I have interest in any kind of pleasure without my sweettongued husband, the lord of the whole earth extending up to the ocean.

data.v: भिद्यतां भक्ष्यतां वापि शरीरं विसृजाम्यहम् । न चाप्यहं चिरं दुःखं सहेयं प्रियवर्जिता ।।
data.es: "I will give up my body. Break me into pieces or eat me up. I cannot bear the sorrow of separation from my dear Rama any longer.

data.v: चरणेनापि सव्येन न स्पृशेयं निशाचरम् । रावणं किं पुनरहं कामयेयं विगर्हितम् ।।
data.es: "I will not even touch that vile nightranger Ravana with my left foot. What to speak of loving him.

data.v: प्रत्याख्यातं न जानाति नात्मानं नात्मनः कुलम् । यो नृशंस स्वभावेन मां प्रार्थयितुमिच्छति ।।
छिन्ना भिन्ना विभक्ता वा दीप्ते वाग्नौ प्रदीपिता । रावणं नोपतिष्ठेयं किं प्रलापेन वश्चिरम् ।।
data.es: "Even if I am cut, broken to pieces or burnt in glowing fire, I will not accept Ravana. Why do you shout for so long?

data.v: ख्यातः प्राज्ञः कृतज्ञश्च सानुक्रोशश्च राघवः । सद्वृत्तो निरनुक्रोशः शङ्के मद्भाग्यसंक्षयात् ।।
data.es: "Rama is renowned, wise, grateful and kindly. It is due to my misfortune that he has turned pitiless to me. There is no doubt.

data.v: राक्षसानां जनस्थाने सहस्राणि चतुर्दश । येनैकेन निरस्तानि स मां किं नाभिपद्यते ।।
data.es: "He who destroyed fourteen thousand demons singlehanded has not come to protect me. I do not know why.

data.v: निरुद्धा रावणेनाहमल्पवीर्येण रक्षसा । समर्थः खलु मे भर्ता रावणं हन्तुमाहवे ।।
data.es: "Rama, my husband, for sure, is capable of killing in battle this Ravana who has held me captive and who is a demon of inferior valour.

data.v: विराधो दण्डकारण्ये येन राक्षसपुंगवः । रणे रामेण निहतः स मां किं नाभिपद्यते ।।
data.es: "Why is Rama who killed Viradha, a bull among demons, in Dandaka forest in the fight not coming to rescue me?

data.v: कामं मध्ये समुद्रस्य लङ्केयं दुष्प्रधर्षणा । न तु राघवबाणानां गतिरोधी ह विद्यते ।।
data.es: "This Lanka in the middle of the ocean is unassailable. But there is nothing which can resist the arrows of Rama.

data.v: किं नु तत्कारणं येन रामो दृढपराक्रमः । रक्षसापहृतां भार्यामिष्टां नाभ्यवपद्यते ।।
data.es: "What may be the reason that my loving husband, Rama who is highly powerful has not reached this place to which I was abducted by the demon.

data.v: इहस्थां मां न जानीते शङ्के लक्ष्मणपूर्वजः । जानन्नपि हि तेजस्वी धर्षणां मर्षयिष्यति ।।
data.es: "The elder brother of Lakshamana does not know that I am here. Or, I'm afraid, the glorious Rama knows and yet tolerates such an outrageous act.

data.v: हृतेति योऽधिगत्वा मां राघवाय निवेदयेत् । गृध्रराजोऽपि स रणे रावणेन निपातितः ।।
data.es: "Even the king of vultures knows I was borne away. He could have informed Rama. But he has also been thrashed down on the earth by Ravana in the fight.

data.v: कृतं कर्म महत्तेन मां तदाभ्यवपद्यता । तिष्ठता रावणद्वन्द्वे वृद्धेनापि जटायुषा ।।
data.es: "Though old, Jatayu did a great help to me by resisting Ravana in the duel and advancing (to confront him.).

data.v: यदि मामिह जानीयाद्वर्तमानां स राघवः । अद्य बाणैरभिक्रुद्धः कुर्याल्लोकमराक्षसं ।।
data.es: "Had only Raghava known that I was here he would have freed this world of demons with his anger.

data.v: विधमेच्च पुरीं लङ्कां शोषयेच्च महोदधिम् । रावणस्य च नीचस्य कीर्तिं नाम च नाशयेत् ।।
data.es: "Had Rama known that I am in Lanka he would have blown up this city, dried up the ocean and destroyed the name and fame of the mean Ravana.

data.v: ततो निहतनथानां राक्षसीनां गृहे गृहे । यथाहमेवं रुदती तथा भूयो न संशयः । अन्विष्य रक्षसां लङ्कां कुर्याद्रामः सलक्ष्मणः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जनमय], अज्ञातम् [१२: यमतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरयस], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरयभ]

data.es: "Like me weeping, the cry of ogresses with lost husbands will be heard in every house in Lanka. There is no doubt.

data.v: न हि ताभ्यां रिपुर्दृष्टो मुहूतमपि जीवति । चिता धूमाकुलपथा गृध्रमण्डलसंकुला । अचिरेण तु लङ्केयं श्मशानसदृशी भवेत् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: रसजज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरनर], अज्ञातम् [१२: सरतभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसतस]

data.es: "Very soon this Lanka will be enveloped with smoke from funeral pyres and thronged with flocks of vultures moving in circles. It will be like a burial ground.

data.v: अचिरेणैव कालेन प्राप्स्याम्येव मनोरथम् । दुष्प्रस्थानोऽयमाख्याति सर्वेषां वो विपर्ययः ।।
data.es: "Your bad behaviour forebodes illluck for you.I shall have my desire fulfilled in a short time.

data.v: यादृशानि तु दृश्यन्ते लङ्कायामशुभानि तु । अचिरेणैव कालेन भविष्यति हतप्रभा ।।
data.es: "Inauspicious signs are seen here in Lanka. In a short time this city will lose its splendour.

data.v: नूनं लङ्का हते पापे रावणे राक्षसाधिपे । शोषं यास्यति दुर्धर्षा प्रमदा विधवा यथा ।।
data.es: "Surely this impregnable Lanka will wither up (lose its splendour) and appear like a widow when this sinful Ravana, a mean demon is killed.

data.v: पुष्योत्सवसमृद्धा च नष्टभर्त्री सराक्षसा । भविष्यति पुरी लङ्का नष्टभर्त्री यथाङ्गना ।।
data.es: "This city of Lanka with many auspicious celebrations will lose its king and all mean ogresses will remain like widows.

data.v: नूनं राक्षसकन्यानां रुदन्तीनां गृहे गृहे । श्रोष्यामि नचिरादेव दुःखार्तानामिह ध्वनिम् ।।
data.es: "I shall surely hear very soon sounds of distressful cry of young ogresses in every household.

data.v: सान्धकारा हतद्योता हतराक्षसपुंगवा । भविष्यति पुरी लङ्का निर्दग्धा रामसायकैः ।।
data.es: "Totally burnt by Rama's arrows, this Lanka will be filled with darkness, and its splendour lost and preeminent demons destroyed.

data.v: यदि नाम स शूरो मां रामो रक्तान्तलोचनः । जानीयाद्वर्तमानां हि रावणस्य निवेशने ।।
data.es: "If the heroic Rama of bloodshot eyes comes to know that I am here at Ravana's, the expiry of time limit fixed by this cruel, lowly, foolish Ravana has arrived, this wicked fellow's death is inevitable.

data.v: अनेन तु नृशंसेन रावणेनाधमेन मे । समयो यस्तु निर्दिष्टस्तस्य कालोऽयमागतः ।।
अकार्यं ये न जानन्ति नैरृताः पापकारिणः । अधर्मात्तु महोत्पातो भविष्यति हि साम्प्रतम् ।।
data.es: "Nothing is forbidden for sinful demons. A calamity will befall now due to this adharma. The flesheating ogres are aware of neither dharma nor adharma

data.v: नैते धर्मं विजानन्ति राक्षसाः पिशिताशनाः । ध्रुवं मां प्रातराशार्थे राक्षसः कल्पयिष्यति ।।
साहं कथं करिष्यामि तं विना प्रियदर्शनम् । रामं रक्तान्तनयनमपश्यन्ती सुदुःखिता ।।
data.es: "This demon is determined to make me his morning meal. How can I do anything in the absence of my lord of pleasing countenance. I am distressed very much by not seeing Rama, possessed of eyes with a reddish tinge in the corners.

data.v: यदि कश्चित्प्रदाता मे विषस्याद्य भवेदिह । क्षिप्रं वैवस्वतं देवं पश्येयं पतिना विना ।।
नाजानाज्जीवतीं रामः स मां लक्ष्मणपूर्वजः । जानन्तौ तौ न कुर्यातां नोर्व्यां हि मम मार्गणम् ।।
data.es: "Neither Lakshmana nor his elder brother knows that I am here alive. (Had they known) both of them would have ransacked this earth.

data.v: नूनं ममैव शोकेन स वीरो लक्ष्मणाग्रजः । देवलोकमितो यातस्त्यक्त्वा देहं महीतले ।।
data.es: "Would it be that the heroic elder brother of Lakshmana has gone to the abode of gods unable to find me on this earth?

data.v: धन्या देवाः सगन्धर्वाः सिद्धाश्च परमर्षयः । मम पश्यन्ति ये नाथं रामं राजीवलोचनम् ।।
data.es: Then the gods, gandharvas, siddhas and great sages approached Surasa, the mother of nagas, who was glowing like the Sungod and said:.

data.v: अथ वा न हि तस्यार्थे धर्मकामस्य धीमतः । मया रामस्य राजर्षेर्भार्यया परमात्मनः ।।
data.es: "Or that royal sage, wise Rama who always seeks dharma having become one with the supreme spirit has no longer any interest in me?

data.v: दृश्यमाने भवेत्प्रीतः सौहृदं नास्त्यपश्यतः । नाशयन्ति कृतघ्रास्तु न रामो नाशयिष्यति ।।
data.es: "Love attaches itself to one who remains before one's eyes.Friendship fades with separation. The ungrateful destroy love and friendship (as their love is conditioned by frequent meetings). But it cannot happen in case of Rama.

data.v: किं नु मे न गुणाः केचित्किं वा भाग्य क्षयो हि मे । याहं सीता वरार्हेण हीना रामेण भामिनी ।।
data.es: "Do I, a charming lady, not have any good fortune because of my past deeds? I wonder how a foremost woman like me seperated from my husband is sinking in grief without Rama. Has my fortune diminished?

data.v: श्रेयो मे जीवितान्मर्तुं विहीना या महात्मना । रामादक्लिष्टचारित्राच्छूराच्छत्रुनिबर्हणात् ।।
data.es: "Instead of living separated from noble and brave Rama, a blemishless character and a destroyer of enemies, it is better for me to die.

data.v: अथ वा न्यस्तशस्त्रौ तौ वने मूलफलाशनौ । भ्रातरौ हि नर श्रेष्ठौ चरन्तौ वनगोचरौ ।।
data.es: "May be both the brothers, foremost among men, have laid down their arms, and taken to asceticism, subsisting on roots and fruits.

data.v: अथ वा राक्षसेन्द्रेण रावणेन दुरात्मना । छद्मना घातितौ शूरौ भ्रातरौ रामलक्ष्मणौ ।।
data.es: "Or else, has this wicked demon king slain both the brothers Rama and Lakshmana by some deceptive means?

data.v: साहमेवंगते काले मर्तुमिच्छामि सर्वथा । न च मे विहितो मृत्युरस्मिन्दुःखेऽपि वर्तति ।।
data.es: "By all means I wish to die in these circumstances. However, death is not ordained for me even in this sorrowful state.

data.v: धन्याः खलु महात्मानो मुनयः सत्यसंमताः । जितात्मानो महाभागा येषां न स्तः प्रियाप्रिये ।।
data.es: "Blessed are the exhalted sages who have not committed any sin. They have selfcontrol and have subdued their senses. There is no pleasure or displeasure for them.

data.v: प्रियान्न संभवेद्दुःखमप्रियादधिकं भयम् । ताभ्यां हि ये वियुज्यन्ते नमस्तेषां महात्मनाम् ।।
data.es: "Salutations to those exalted souls who have distanced themselves from pleasure and displeasure. Pleasures may not lead to suffering or displeasure to excessive, meaningless fear for such great souls.

data.v: साहं त्यक्ता प्रियेणेह रामेण विदितात्मना । प्राणांस्त्यक्ष्यामि पापस्य रावणस्य गता वशम् ।।
data.es: "Separated from the wise Rama who deserves pleasant things I will give up life being under the clutches of the sinful Ravana.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे षडिवंश स्सर्गः।Thus ends the twentysixth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: इत्युक्ताः सीतया घोरं राक्षस्यः क्रोधमूर्छिताः । काश्चिज्जग्मुस्तदाख्यातुं रावणस्य तरस्विनः ।।
data.es: Hearing the reply of Sita, the ogresses ordered by Ravana and overtaken by anger again began to threaten Sita using harsh words.

data.v: ततः सीतामुपागम्य राक्षस्यो घोरदर्शनाः । पुनः परुषमेकार्थमनर्थार्थमथाब्रुवन् ।।
data.es: The demonesses, overcome with anger, approached Sita and harshly said:

data.v: हन्तेदानीं तवानार्ये सीते पापविनिश्चये । राक्षस्यो भक्षयिष्यन्ति मांसमेतद्यथासुखम् ।।
data.es: "O vile one you are determined in your evil ways. Today these shedemons will eat away your flesh to their heart's content ".

data.v: सीतां ताभिरनार्याभिर्दृष्ट्वा संतर्जितां तदा । राक्षसी त्रिजटावृद्धा शयाना वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Then seeing the ignoble shedemons threatening Sita, an old demoness called Trijata, who was lying down there, said:

data.v: आत्मानं खादतानार्या न सीतां भक्षयिष्यथ । जनकस्य सुतामिष्टां स्नुषां दशरथस्य च ।।
data.es: "Devour yourselves now, O ignoble ones, if you will. Do not eat Janaka's favourite daughter, the daughterinlaw of Dasaratha.

data.v: स्वप्नो ह्यद्य मया दृष्टो दारुणो रोमहर्षणः । राक्षसानामभावाय भर्तुरस्या भवाय च ।।
data.es: "Tonight I had a terrific, horriplating nightmare in which I saw the annihilation of all demons and the triumph of Sita's husband".

data.v: एवमुक्तास्त्रिजटया राक्षस्यः क्रोधमूर्छिताः । सर्वा एवाब्रुवन्भीतास्त्रिजटां तामिदं वचः ।।
data.es: Hearing Sita's words, some terrifying demonesses, overwhelmed with anger, went to inform Ravana, who was quick to act.

data.v: कथयस्व त्वया दृष्टः स्वप्नेऽयं कीदृशो निशि ।।
तासां श्रुत्वा तु वचनं राक्षसीनां मुखोद्गतम् । उवाच वचनं काले त्रिजटास्वप्नसंश्रितम् ।।
data.es: "O Trijata, tell us the kind of dream you dreamt last night", they insisted. Hearing the words from the mouth of the shedemons, Trijata told them all about her dream.

data.v: गजदन्तमयीं दिव्यां शिबिकामन्तरिक्षगाम् । युक्तां वाजिसहस्रेण स्वयमास्थाय राघवः ।।
data.es: "Rama, in white attire, wearing a garland of white flowers, ascending a palanquin made of ivory drawn by a thousand swans and coursing through the sky with Lakshmana arrived.

data.v: स्वप्ने चाद्य मया दृष्टा सीता शुक्लाम्बरावृता । सागरेण परिक्षिप्तं श्वेतपर्वतमास्थिता । रामेण संगता सीता भास्करेण प्रभा यथा ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: रसयर], अज्ञातम् [१२: मसमम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतभम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यततर]

data.es: "I also saw Sita in my dream wearing white robes and perched on a white mountain surrounded by the ocean.

data.v: राघवश्च मया दृष्टश्चतुर्दन्तं महागजम् । आरूढः शैलसंकाशं चचार सहलक्ष्मणः ।।
