data.es: "Just as light is united with the Sun, I saw Sita united with Rama. I saw Rama with Lakshmana riding a huge, mountainlike elephant having four tusks.

data.v: ततस्तौ नरशार्दूलौ दीप्यमानौ स्वतेजसा । शुक्लमाल्याम्बरधरौ जानकीं पर्युपस्थितौ ।।
data.es: "Dressed in white garlands and clothes, the two brothers, tigers among men, glowing in their effulgence approached Janaki.

data.v: ततस्तस्य नगस्याग्रे आकाशस्थस्य दन्तिनः । भर्त्रा परिगृहीतस्य जानकी स्कन्धमाश्रिता ।।
data.es: "Then from the front of the mountain Janaki shifted to the back of the elephant held by her husband waiting in the sky.

data.v: भर्तुरङ्कात्समुत्पत्य ततः कमललोचना । चन्द्रसूर्यौ मया दृष्टा पाणिभ्यां परिमार्जती ।।
data.es: "Then I saw the lotuseyed Sita springing up from the lap of her husband and playfully caressing the Moon and Sun with her palms.

data.v: ततस्ताभ्यां कुमाराभ्यामास्थितः स गजोत्तमः । सीतया च विशालाक्ष्या लङ्काया उपरि स्थितः ।।
data.es: "Then the excellent elephant was seen halted in the city of Lanka with both princes and the largeeyed Sita mounted on the elephant.

data.v: पाण्डुरर्षभयुक्तेन रथेनाष्टयुजा स्वयम् । शुक्लमाल्याम्बरधरो लक्ष्मणेन समागतः । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा सीतया सह भार्यया ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: रसयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसभत], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततस], अज्ञातम् [१२: यतभर]

data.es: "Rama accompanied by his wife Sita came on a chariot yoked to eight white oxen.

data.v: विमानात्पुष्पकादद्य रावणः पतितो भुवि । कृष्यपाणः स्त्रिया दृष्टो मुण्डः कृष्णाम्बरः पुनः ।।
data.es: "Tonight I saw (in another dream) Ravana with shaven head, clad in black clothes, fallen down on the ground from the Pushpaka chariot, being dragged by a woman.

data.v: रथेन खरयुक्तेन रक्तमाल्यानुलेपनः । प्रयातो दक्षिणामाशां प्रविष्टः कर्दमं ह्रदम् ।।
कण्ठे बद्ध्वा दशग्रीवं प्रमदा रक्तवासिनी । काली कर्दमलिप्ताङ्गी दिशं याम्यां प्रकर्षति ।।
वराहेण दशग्रीवः शिंशुमारेण चेन्द्रजित् । उष्ट्रेण कुम्भकर्णश्च प्रयातो दक्षिणां दिशम् ।।
data.es: "The tennecked Ravana was seen (this time) riding on a boar, Indrajit on a crocodile and Kumbhakarna on a camel all set towards the southerly direction.

data.v: समाजश्च महान्वृत्तो गीतवादित्रनिःस्वनः । पिबतां रक्तमाल्यानां रक्षसां रक्तवाससाम् ।।
लङ्का चेयं पुरी रम्या सवाजिरथसंकुला । सागरे पतिता दृष्टा भग्नगोपुरतोरणा ।।
data.es: "I saw this delightful Lanka teeming with horses, chariots and elephants, archways and towers crumbling and falling into the ocean.

data.v: पीत्व तैलं प्रनृत्ताश्च प्रहसन्त्यो महास्वनाः । लङ्कायां भस्मरूक्षायां सर्वा राक्षसयोषितः ।।
कुम्भकर्णादयश्चेमे सर्वे राक्षसपुंगवाः । रक्तं निवसनं गृह्य प्रविष्टा गोमयह्रदे ।।
data.es: "Kumbhakarna and other demon leaders wearing red clothes entered into a pool of cow dung.

data.v: अपगच्छत नश्यध्वं सीतामाप्नोति राघवः । घातयेत्परमामर्षी सर्वैः सार्धं हि राक्षसैः ।।
data.es: "(Therefore) go away from here. You will be totally destroyed by Rama who will secure his wife and will kill all of you along with others in great anger.

data.v: प्रियां बहुमतां भार्यां वनवासमनुव्रताम् । भर्त्सितां तर्जितां वापि नानुमंस्यति राघवः ।।
data.es: 'Even renouncing his highly respectable, favourite wife among all, mighty Ravana is prepared to accept you.

data.v: तदलं क्रूरवाक्यैर्वः सान्त्वमेवाभिधीयताम् । अभियाचाम वैदेहीमेतद्धि मम रोचते ।।
data.es: "Give up these cruel taunts. Speak to her in a cordial manner. We will beg Vaidehi's forgiveness. I like this kind of action.

data.v: यस्या ह्येवं विधः स्वप्नो दुःखितायाः प्रदृश्यते । सा दुःखैर्बहुभिर्मुक्ता प्रियं प्राप्नोत्यनुत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "When any demoness in a sorrowful state dreams this kind of dream, she will be relieved of sorrow and will obtain supreme joy.

data.v: भर्त्सितामपि याचध्वं राक्षस्यः किं विवक्षया । राघवाद्धि भयं घोरं राक्षसानामुपस्थितम् ।।
data.es: "O demonesses beg her (pardon) now even though you had threatened her earlier. Where is the need to hesitate? There is cause for concern for demons from Rama.

data.v: प्रणिपात प्रसन्ना हि मैथिली जनकात्मजा । अलमेषा परित्रातुं राक्षस्यो महतो भयात् ।।
data.es: "O shedemons, this Janaka's daughter from Mithila who is capable of protecting you against great dangers will be pleased by your submission.

data.v: अपि चास्या विशालाक्ष्या न किंचिदुपलक्षये । विरुद्धमपि चाङ्गेषु सुसूक्ष्ममपि लक्ष्मणम् ।।
data.es: "Look at the signs on her body. There is not a little inauspiciousness in the limbs of the largeeyed princess from Mithila.

data.v: छाया वैगुण्य मात्रं तु शङ्के दुःखमुपस्थितम् । अदुःखार्हामिमां देवीं वैहायसमुपस्थिताम् ।।
अर्थसिद्धिं तु वैदेह्याः पश्याम्यहमुपस्थिताम् । राक्षसेन्द्रविनाशं च विजयं राघवस्य च ।।
data.es: "I see the day of fulfilment for Vaidehi has drawn near. I can also foresee the destruction of the demon king and the triumph of Rama.

data.v: निमित्तभूतमेतत्तु श्रोतुमस्या महत्प्रियम् । दृश्यते च स्फुरच्चक्षुः पद्मपत्रमिवायतम् ।।
data.es: "This dream indeed served as an augery for good news about her. Look, her (left) eye which is large like a lotus petal is throbbing.

data.v: ईषच्च हृषितो वास्या दक्षिणाया ह्यदक्षिणः । अकस्मादेव वैदेह्या बाहुरेकः प्रकम्पते ।।
data.es: "The left shoulder of this great Vaidehi has started suddenly throbbing, indicating that she is feeling a bit happy.

data.v: करेणुहस्तप्रतिमः सव्यश्चोरुरनुत्तमः । वेपन्सूचयतीवास्या राघवं पुरतः स्थितम् ।।
data.es: "Her excellent left thigh, comparable to a female elephant's trunk is trembling, as though indicating that Rama is standing in her presence.

data.v: पक्षी च शाखा निलयं प्रविष्टः; पुनः पुनश्चोत्तमसान्त्ववादी । सुखागतां वाचमुदीरयाणः; पुनः पुनश्चोदयतीव हृष्टः ।।
data.es: "One can see the bird which utters excellent sweet notes indicating happy tidings, entering again and again the foliage of the tree, a delightful bird, as if prompting Sita again and again to rejoice.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे सप्तविंशस्सर्गः।Thus ends the twentyseventh sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: सा राक्षसेन्द्रस्य वचो निशम्य; तद्रावणस्याप्रियमप्रियार्ता । सीता वितत्रास यथा वनान्ते; सिंहाभिपन्ना गजराजकन्या ।।
data.es: After hearing the unpleasant words spoken by the king of demons, which caused restlessness and sorrow to Sita, she was terrified like the young calf of a lordly elephant fallen into the clutches of a lion in the midst of the forest.

data.v: सा राक्षसी मध्यगता च भीरु;र्वाग्भिर्भृशं रावणतर्जिता च । कान्तारमध्ये विजने विसृष्टा; बालेव कन्या विललाप सीता ।।
data.es: Encircled by the demonesses, Sita was repeatedly humiliated by Ravana's cruel words. She wept like a young girl deserted in a desolate forest.

data.v: सत्यं बतेदं प्रवदन्ति लोके; नाकालमृत्युर्भवतीति सन्तः । यत्राहमेवं परिभर्त्स्यमाना; जीवामि किंचित्क्षणमप्यपुण्या ।।
data.es: "Even though I am threatened like this, I am living pitiably because of lack of merit. Indeed I regret my survival due to my bad luck. Elders say that death will not ocurr before its time. It seems to be true.

data.v: सुखाद्विहीनं बहुदुःखपूर्ण;मिदं तु नूनं हृदयं स्थिरं मे । विदीर्यते यन्न सहस्रधाद्य; वज्राहतं शृङ्गमिवाचलस्य ।।
data.es: "Even though I am devoid of joy, and living in deep agony, my heart bursts not into a thousand pieces like the summit of a mountain hit by thunderbolt (lightning).

data.v: नैवास्ति नूनं मम दोषमत्र; वध्याहमस्याप्रियदर्शनस्य । भावं न चास्याहमनुप्रदातु;मलं द्विजो मन्त्रमिवाद्विजाय ।।
data.es: "I will not be blamed if I commit suicide now.I stand condemned to death in the hands of this ugly Ravana. I cannot bestow my affection on him or surender to his desire like a brahmin would not like to impart Vedic knowledge to a nonbrahmin. (Better die of my own accord than be killed by a sinful ogre).

data.v: नूनं ममाङ्गान्यचिरादनार्यः; शस्त्रैः शितैश्छेत्स्यति राक्षसेन्द्रः । तस्मिन्ननागच्छति लोकनाथे; गर्भस्थजन्तोरिव शल्यकृन्तः ।।
data.es: "If the lord of the world does not come here before that (time fixed by Ravana) the vile lord of demons will cut me into pieces with weapons just as a barber would cut to pieces the foetus with a sharp knife (in order to save a pregnant woman).

data.v: दुःखं बतेदं मम दुःखिताया; मासौ चिरायाभिगमिष्यतो द्वौ । बद्धस्य वध्यस्य यथा निशान्ते; राजापराधादिव तस्करस्य ।।
हा राम हा लक्ष्मण हा सुमित्रे; हा राम मातः सह मे जनन्या । एषा विपद्याम्यहमल्पभाग्या; महार्णवे नौरिव मूढ वाता ।।
तरस्विनौ धारयता मृगस्य; सत्त्वेन रूपं मनुजेन्द्रपुत्रौ । नूनं विशस्तौ मम कारणात्तौ; सिंहर्षभौ द्वाविव वैद्युतेन ।।
data.es: "Just like two mighty lions are killed by a bolt of lightning, the two princes must have been killed by a creature in the guise of a deer on my account.

data.v: नूनं स कालो मृगरूपधारी; मामल्पभाग्यां लुलुभे तदानीम् । यत्रार्यपुत्रं विससर्ज मूढा; रामानुजं लक्ष्मणपूर्वकं च ।।
data.es: "Verily, it is the spirit of the time that assumed the form of deer and tempted this unfortunate soul. It was foolish of me to send away, the sons of a noble king, Lakshmana and his elder brother.

data.v: हा राम सत्यव्रत दीर्घवाहो; हा पूर्णचन्द्रप्रतिमानवक्त्र । हा जीवलोकस्य हितः प्रियश्च; वध्यां न मां वेत्सि हि राक्षसानाम् ।।
अनन्यदेवत्वमियं क्षमा च; भूमौ च शय्या नियमश्च धर्मे । पतिव्रतात्वं विफलं ममेदं; कृतं कृतघ्नेष्विव मानुषाणाम् ।।
data.es: "I am devoted to you and to no other god. My hardship in sleeping on the ground, my righteousness, my discipline and chastity have all proved futile like the devotion of an ungrateful person.

data.v: मोघो हि धर्मश्चरितो ममायं; तथैकपत्नीत्वमिदं निरर्थम् । या त्वां न पश्यामि कृशा विवर्णा; हीना त्वया संगमने निराशा ।।
data.es: "This righteousnes practised by me is in vain like my devotion to you, as I am unable to see you. I am a separated, emaciated, pale with no hope of reuniting with you.

data.v: पितुर्निर्देशं नियमेन कृत्वा; वनान्निवृत्तश्चरितव्रतश्च । स्त्रीभिस्तु मन्ये विपुलेक्षणाभिः; संरंस्यसे वीतभयः कृतार्थः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति त्रिष्टुभ्: अज्ञातम् [११: यतजगग], उपेन्द्रवज्रा [११: जतजगग], इन्द्रवज्रा [११: ततजगग]

data.es: "Having truly fulfilled your pledge given to your father, you will return from the forest to Ayodhya, rid of all fear, as an accomplished person, will and revel in the company of largeeyed damsels, I think.

data.v: अहं तु राम त्वयि जातकामा; चिरं विनाशाय निबद्धभावा । मोघं चरित्वाथ तपोव्रतं च; त्यक्ष्यामि धिग्जीवितमल्पभाग्या ।।
data.es: "O RamaI loved you and concentrated all my love on you for a long time only for my doom. I have observed vows and austerities in vain. I cannot continue it for long. Here I am giving up my life. Fie upon this luckless one (me).

data.v: सा जीवितं क्षिप्रमहं त्यजेयं; विषेण शस्त्रेण शितेन वापि । विषस्य दाता न तु मेऽस्ति कश्चि;च्छस्त्रस्य वा वेश्मनि राक्षसस्य ।।
data.es: "I will end my life at once by taking poison or else by a sharp weapon. Alas There is none to give get me poison or a weapon at this demon's residence".

data.v: शोकाभितप्ता बहुधा विचिन्त्य; सीताथ वेण्युद्ग्रथनं गृहीत्वा । उद्बध्य वेण्युद्ग्रथनेन शीघ्र;महं गमिष्यामि यमस्य मूलम् ।।
data.es: "Burning in grief, worrying in many ways, Sita took hold of her braid and said", by tying myself with this braid I shall quickly reach the presence of the lord of death".

data.v: इतीव सीता बहुधा विलप्य; सर्वात्मना राममनुस्मरन्ती । प्रवेपमाना परिशुष्कवक्त्रा; नगोत्तमं पुष्पितमाससाद ।।
data.es: Queen Sita was wailing in many ways, constantly remembering Rama, the soul of all. Shivering, her face pales as she approached the great Simsupa tree in bloom.

data.v: उपस्थिता सा मृदुर्सर्वगात्री; शाखां गृहीत्वाथ नगस्य तस्य । तस्यास्तु रामं प्रविचिन्तयन्त्या; रामानुजं स्वं च कुलं शुभाङ्ग्याः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति त्रिष्टुभ्: इन्द्रवज्रा [११: ततजगग], अज्ञातम् [११: जततगग]

data.v: शोकानिमित्तानि तदा बहूनि; धैर्यार्जितानि प्रवराणि लोके । प्रादुर्निमित्तानि तदा बभूवुः; पुरापि सिद्धान्युपलक्षितानि ।।
तथागतां तां व्यथितामनिन्दितां; व्यपेतहर्षां परिदीनमानसाम् । शुभां निमित्तानि शुभानि भेजिरे; नरं श्रिया जुष्टमिवोपजीविनः ।।
data.es: Like wellwishers flocking round a person on whom fortune is smiling, omens foretelling auspicious happenings in near future appeared to Sita. She was unimpeachable. She was in agony, distressed in mind, bereft of all joy (now) standing under that Simsupa tree.

data.v: तस्याः शुभं वाममरालपक्ष्म; राजीवृतं कृष्णविशालशुक्लम् । प्रास्पन्दतैकं नयनं सुकेश्या; मीनाहतं पद्ममिवाभिताम्रम् ।।
data.es: Her left eye with a row of curved eyelashes, the black pupils of the eye in white throbbed in an auspicious manner. The lady with her long tresses, and throbbing eye appeared like a red lotus gently struck by a fish.

data.v: भुजश्च चार्वञ्चितपीनवृत्तः; परार्ध्य कालागुरुचन्दनार्हः । अनुत्तमेनाध्युषितः प्रियेण; चिरेण वामः समवेपताशु ।।
data.es: Her stout left arm curved beautifully, fit for excellent agaru and sandal paste once the pillow by her beloved lord for long, throbbed suddenly.

data.v: गजेन्द्रहस्तप्रतिमश्च पीन;स्तयोर्द्वयोः संहतयोः सुजातः । प्रस्पन्दमानः पुनरूरुरस्या; रामं पुरस्तात्स्थितमाचचक्षे ।।
data.es: Again her roundshaped left thigh resembling an elephant's trunk started throbbing, presaging union with Rama.

data.v: शुभं पुनर्हेमसमानवर्ण;मीषद्रजोध्वस्तमिवामलाक्ष्याः । वासः स्थितायाः शिखराग्रदन्त्याः; किंचित्परिस्रंसत चारुगात्र्याः ।।
data.es: Her eyes were pristine, teeth wellshaped. The goldhued auspicious sari on her charming limbs was now a little soiled on account of dust. It slipped slightly as she stood up. This augured well for her.

data.v: एतैर्निमित्तैरपरैश्च सुभ्रूः; संबोधिता प्रागपि साधुसिद्धैः । वातातपक्लान्तमिव प्रनष्टं; वर्षेण बीजं प्रतिसंजहर्ष ।।
data.es: Reassured by such omens which augured well as tested by time, Sita, with beautiful eyebrows, and deep foresight experienced great joy, like a seed blighted by the wind and the Sun comes back to joyful life through a pleasing shower. (A foreteller is addressed as siddha in sanskrit dramas)

data.v: तस्याः पुनर्बिम्बफलोपमौष्ठं; स्वक्षिभ्रुकेशान्तमरालपक्ष्म । वक्त्रं बभासे सितशुक्लदंष्ट्रं; राहोर्मुखाच्चन्द्र इव प्रमुक्तः ।।
data.es: Her face shining with beautiful red lips like bimba fruit, sparkling teeth, and curved eyelashes with lovely brows extending up to her hair, she appeared like a Moon released from the mouth of Rahu.

data.v: सा वीतशोका व्यपनीततन्द्री; शान्तज्वरा हर्षविबुद्धसत्त्वा । अशोभतार्या वदनेन शुक्ले; शीतान्शुना रात्रिरिवोदितेन ।।
data.es: Revered Sita, completely relieved of grief, exhaustion gone, fears allayed, mind illumined with joy, looked charming with her countenance as a night with the Moon fully risen during the bright fortnight.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे एकोनत्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentyninth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic compsed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: हनुमानपि विक्रान्तः सर्वं शुश्राव तत्त्वतः । सीतायास्त्रिजटायाश्च राक्षसीनां च तर्जनम् ।।
data.es: The valiant hero Hanuman heard everything including the lamentation of Sita and the dream of Trijata and the threats of the demonesses.

data.v: अवेक्षमाणस्तां देवीं देवतामिव नन्दने । ततो बहुविधां चिन्तां चिन्तयामास वानरः ।।
data.es: The sight of Sita who seemed a deity in the Nandana garden of Indra, set a chain of reflections in his mind :

data.v: यां कपीनां सहस्राणि सुबहून्ययुतानि च । दिक्षु सर्वासु मार्गन्ते सेयमासादिता मया ।।
data.es: "This is Sita whom thousands of vanaras are searching in all directions.

data.v: चारेण तु सुयुक्तेन शत्रोः शक्तिमवेक्षिता । गूढेन चरता तावदवेक्षितमिदं मया ।।
data.es: "Roaming everywhere incognito to ascertain carefully the strength of the enemy, I have seen everything.

data.v: राक्षसानां विशेषश्च पुरी चेयमवेक्षिता । राक्षसाधिपतेरस्य प्रभावो रावणस्य च ।।
data.es: "I have seen the ability of the demons and the citadel of Lanka. I have seen the power of Ravana the demon king.

data.v: युक्तं तस्याप्रमेयस्य सर्वसत्त्वदयावतः । समाश्वासयितुं भार्यां पतिदर्शनकाङ्क्षिणीम् ।।
data.es: "It is the opportune time for me to comfort Sita eagerly waiting to see her husband who is of immeasurable prowess and who is compassionate to all beings.

data.v: अहमाश्वासयाम्येनां पूर्णचन्द्रनिभाननाम् । अदृष्टदुःखां दुःखस्य न ह्यन्तमधिगच्छतीम् ।।
data.es: "The moonfaced Sita had never experienced sorrow before. She sees no end to her sorrow and suffering. I will console her.

data.v: यदि ह्यहमिमां देवीं शोकोपहतचेतनाम् । अनाश्वास्य गमिष्यामि दोषवद्गमनं भवेत् ।।
data.es: "If I should return to Kishkindha without reassuring Sita, whose understanding has been clouded in grief I would be blamed.

data.v: गते हि मयि तत्रेयं राजपुत्री यशस्विनी । परित्राणमविन्दन्ती जानकी जीवितं त्यजेत् ।।
data.es: "If I so back, this illustrious princess, Janaki will give up her life, finding no means of deliverance (from this tragic situation).

data.v: मया च स महाबाहुः पूर्णचन्द्रनिभाननः । समाश्वासयितुं न्याय्यः सीतादर्शनलालसः ।।
data.es: "I should provide some comfort to the strongarmed Rama with a face like the fullmoon yearning to see Sita.

data.v: निशाचरीणां प्रत्यक्षमक्षमं चाभिभाषणम् । कथं नु खलु कर्तव्यमिदं कृच्छ्र गतो ह्यहम् ।।
data.es: "I cannot talk to her in the presence of these nightroamers. How can I discharge my duty in this predicament?

data.v: अनेन रात्रिशेषेण यदि नाश्वास्यते मया । सर्वथा नास्ति संदेहः परित्यक्ष्यति जीवितम् ।।
data.es: "If I do not comfort her before the remaining part of the night ends, she will give up her life. There is no doubt about it.

data.v: रामश्च यदि पृच्छेन्मां किं मां सीताब्रवीद्वचः । किमहं तं प्रतिब्रूयामसंभाष्य सुमध्यमाम् ।।
data.es: "If Rama enquires about the message of Sita, this lady of beautiful waist, what can I speak without meeting and talking to her?

data.v: सीतासंदेशरहितं मामितस्त्वरया गतम् । निर्दहेदपि काकुत्स्थः क्रुद्धस्तीव्रेण चक्षुषा ।।
data.es: "If I leave this place without any message from Sita, Rama will burn me with his eyes full of great anger.

data.v: यदि चेद्योजयिष्यामि भर्तारं रामकारणात् । व्यर्थमागमनं तस्य ससैन्यस्य भविष्यति ।।
data.es: "If I get the lord of vanaras and his army for the cause of Rama (without talking to Sita), their arrival will be useless (if Sita would have given up her life by then).

data.v: अन्तरं त्वहमासाद्य राक्षसीनामिह स्थितः । शनैराश्वासयिष्यामि संतापबहुलामिमाम् ।।
data.es: "I shall wait and speak to her slowly and console this deeply distressed lady when I get a chance to speak to her (when these ogresses are asleep).

data.v: अहं ह्यतितनुश्चैव वनरश्च विशेषतः । वाचं चोदाहरिष्यामि मानुषीमिह संस्कृताम् ।।
data.es: "I am indeed of small size and that too a monkey. Nevertheless I shall speak in Sanskrit, a language of the common people. (as the shedemons cannot understand that language).

data.v: यदि वाचं प्रदास्यामि द्विजातिरिव संस्कृताम् । रावणं मन्यमाना मां सीता भीता भविष्यति ।।
data.es: "If I speak like a brahmin in sanskrit language she would be frightened thinking that I am Ravana and how would a vanara speak?

data.v: अवश्यमेव वक्तव्यं मानुषं वाक्यमर्थवत् । मया सान्त्वयितुं शक्या नान्यथेयमनिन्दिता ।।
data.es: "I will certainly speak to her meaningfully in the language of the people. Otherwise it is not possible to pacify the sinless Sita.

data.v: सेयमालोक्य मे रूपं जानकी भाषितं तथा । रक्षोभिस्त्रासिता पूर्वं भूयस्त्रासं गमिष्यति ।।
data.es: "Since Janaki has already been frightened by the demons, she will be even more terrified seeing me in this form and hearing me speaking this way.

data.v: ततो जातपरित्रासा शब्दं कुर्यान्मनस्विनी । जानमाना विशालाक्षी रावणं कामरूपिणम् ।।
data.es: By seeing me in this form, sensitive largeeyed Sita will scream loudly thinking that I am Ravana who can assume any form at his free will.

data.v: सीतया च कृते शब्दे सहसा राक्षसीगणः । नानाप्रहरणो घोरः समेयादन्तकोपमः ।।
data.es: "If Sita screams, the horde of terrific ogresses will at once gather, armed with dreadful weapons like Yama, the god of death.

data.v: ततो मां संपरिक्षिप्य सर्वतो विकृताननाः । वधे च ग्रहणे चैव कुर्युर्यत्नं यथाबलम् ।।
data.es: "Then all these hideous ogresses will swarm round me and make efforts to capture me with all their strength and kill me.

data.v: तं मां शाखाः प्रशाखाश्च स्कन्धांश्चोत्तमशाखिनाम् । दृष्ट्वा विपरिधावन्तं भवेयुर्भयशङ्किताः ।।
data.es: "Seeing me holding big and small branches of large trees and leaping from one place to the other, the ogresses will get scared.

data.v: मम रूपं च संप्रेक्ष्य वनं विचरतो महत् । राक्षस्यो भयवित्रस्ता भवेयुर्विकृताननाः ।।
data.es: "These ogresses with their hideous faces will be frightened on looking at my huge form moving in this grove.

data.v: ततः कुर्युः समाह्वानं राक्षस्यो रक्षसामपि । राक्षसेन्द्रनियुक्तानां राक्षसेन्द्रनिवेशने ।।
data.es: "Thereafter the ogresses will draw the attention of demon guards engaged by the king of demons at his residence towards me.

data.v: ते शूलशरनिस्त्रिंश विविधायुधपाणयः । आपतेयुर्विमर्देऽस्मिन्वेगेनोद्विग्नकारिणः ।।
data.es: "Those ogresses due to fear will come speedily, armed with spears, tridents, swords and different kinds of weapons for a combat.

data.v: संक्रुद्धस्तैस्तु परितो विधमन्रक्षसां बलम् । शक्नुयं न तु संप्राप्तुं परं पारं महोदधेः ।।
data.es: "With them around me, I may not be able to reach the other end of the ocean (my strength spent in the combat.)

data.v: मां वा गृह्णीयुराप्लुत्य बहवः शीघ्रकारिणः । स्यादियं चागृहीतार्था मम च ग्रहणं भवेत् ।।
data.es: "The ogres who are in large numbers, here are very prompt to act. They will jump into the sky and bind me. Sita will not receive the message and I will be taken into custody by the demons.

data.v: हिंसाभिरुचयो हिंस्युरिमां वा जनकात्मजाम् । विपन्नं स्यात्ततः कार्यं रामसुग्रीवयोरिदम् ।।
data.es: "These demons who are keen on indulging in violence will harm Janaka's daughter. Then the mission of Rama and Sugriva will also fail.

data.v: उद्देशे नष्टमार्गेऽस्मिन्राक्षसैः परिवारिते । सागरेण परिक्षिप्ते गुप्ते वसति जानकी ।।
data.es: "Janaki is staying in this untraceable location surrounded by demons. And this location is a secret place surrounded by the ocean .

data.v: विशस्ते वा गृहीते वा रक्षोभिर्मयि संयुगे । नान्यं पश्यामि रामस्य सहायं कार्यसाधने ।।
data.es: "If I am killed in the combat or captured by the demons, I do not see another person who can help in accomplishing this task.

data.v: विमृशंश्च न पश्यामि यो हते मयि वानरः । शतयोजनविस्तीर्णं लङ्घयेत महोदधिम् ।।
data.es: "When I am killed here, I cannot see any other vanara who can leap over a hundred yojanas of the ocean (to reach this place).

data.v: कामं हन्तुं समर्थोऽस्मि सहस्राण्यपि रक्षसाम् । न तु शक्ष्यामि संप्राप्तुं परं पारं महोदधेः ।।
data.es: "With them around me, I may not be able to reach the other end of the ocean (my strength spent in the combat.)

data.v: असत्यानि च युद्धानि संशयो मे न रोचते । कश्च निःसंशयं कार्यं कुर्यात्प्राज्ञः ससंशयम् ।।
data.es: "Battles, no doubt, are unpredictable. Which wise man with a sound intellect will take up a doubtful work unhesitatingly?

data.v: एष दोषो महान्हि स्यान्मम सीताभिभाषणे । प्राणत्यागश्च वैदेह्या भवेदनभिभाषणे ।।
भूताश्चार्था विनश्यन्ति देशकालविरोधिताः । विक्लवं दूतमासाद्य तमः सूर्योदये यथा ।।
data.es: 'Just as darkness disappears at Sunrise, wellplanned strategies also fail at the hands of a thoughtless messenger when they are set in opposition to proper time and place.

data.v: अर्थानर्थान्तरे बुद्धिर्निश्चितापि न शोभते । घातयन्ति हि कार्याणि दूताः पण्डितमानिनः ।।
data.es: 'Even though messengers are not intelligent, they think themselves clever and capable. They act foolishly, swerve from proper course of action and fail in their effort.

data.v: न विनश्येत्कथं कार्यं वैक्लव्यं न कथं भवेत् । लङ्घनं च समुद्रस्य कथं नु न वृथा भवेत् ।।
data.es: 'How should the task be performed? How to avoid impetuousness? How can my purpose of crossing the ocean be not wasted?

data.v: कथं नु खलु वाक्यं मे शृणुयान्नोद्विजेत च । इति संचिन्त्य हनुमांश्चकार मतिमान्मतिम् ।।
data.es: Wise Hanuman came to a decision after reflecting in his mind about how not to create fear in Sita (while communicating with her.)

data.v: राममक्लिष्टकर्माणं स्वबन्धुमनुकीर्तयन् । नैनामुद्वेजयिष्यामि तद्बन्धुगतमानसाम् ।।
data.es: "By praising Rama who is very dear, who is judicious in action and in whom her mind is absorbed, I will not create fear.

data.v: इक्ष्वाकूणां वरिष्ठस्य रामस्य विदितात्मनः । शुभानि धर्मयुक्तानि वचनानि समर्पयन् ।।
data.es: "I shall present in auspicious words the esteemed Rama of Ikshvaku family who is a knower of self and make her listen to everything in such a sweet manner that she will trust me.

data.v: श्रावयिष्यामि सर्वाणि मधुरां प्रब्रुवन्गिरम् । श्रद्धास्यति यथा हीयं तथा सर्वं समादधे ।।
data.es: "I shall present in auspicious words the esteemed Rama of Ikshvaku family who is a knower of self and make her listen to everything in such a sweet manner that she will trust me.

data.v: इति स बहुविधं महानुभावो; जगतिपतेः प्रमदामवेक्षमाणः । मधुरमवितथं जगाद वाक्यं; द्रुमविटपान्तरमास्थितो हनूमान् ।।
data.es: Highsouled Hanuman seated on the branch of the tree without being seen began to speak faithfully in praise of the lord of the universe in many ways while looking at her. इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे त्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtieth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: एवं बहुविधां चिन्तां चिन्तयित्व महाकपिः । संश्रवे मधुरं वाक्यं वैदेह्या व्याजहार ह ।।
data.es: After deliberating in several ways the great Hanuman spoke these sweet words to Vaidehi:

data.v: राजा दशरथो नाम रथकुञ्जरवाजिनाम् । पुण्यशीलो महाकीर्तिरृजुरासीन्महायशाः । चक्रवर्तिकुले जातः पुरंदरसमो बले ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: तसभज], अज्ञातम् [१२: सरयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरनर]

data.es: "There was an illustrious king called Dasaratha in Ikshvaku race, a master of chariots, elephants and horses. He was highly meritorious and renowned.

data.v: अहिंसारतिरक्षुद्रो घृणी सत्यपराक्रमः । मुख्यश्चेक्ष्वाकुवंशस्य लक्ष्मीवाँल्लक्ष्मिवर्धनः ।।
data.es: "He was committed to nonviolence, magnanimous, compassionate and one whose strength was truth. He was not only a prosperous king of Ikshvaku family but also a promoter of prosperity of others too.

data.v: पार्थिवव्यञ्जनैर्युक्तः पृथुश्रीः पार्थिवर्षभः । पृथिव्यां चतुरन्तयां विश्रुतः सुखदः सुखी ।।
data.es: "Endowed with signs of kingship and vast wealth, he was a bull among rulers of the vast earth, surrounded by the sea. A happy king himself, he was wellknown as a provider of happiness.

data.v: तस्य पुत्रः प्रियो ज्येष्ठस्ताराधिपनिभाननः । रामो नाम विशेषज्ञः श्रेष्ठः सर्वधनुष्मताम् ।।
data.es: "His beloved eldest son Rama, whose countenance is like the full moon, is a scholar of all branches of knowledge and is foremost among the bowmen on earth.

data.v: रक्षिता स्वस्य वृत्तस्य स्वजनस्यापि रक्षिता । रक्षिता जीवलोकस्य धर्मस्य च परंतपः ।।
data.es: "The scourage of enemies, he is a protector of righteousness and of his kins and all living creatures. He is an embodiment of righteousness.

data.v: तस्य सत्याभिसंधस्य वृद्धस्य वचनात्पितुः । सभार्यः सह च भ्रात्रा वीरः प्रव्रजितो वनम् ।।
data.es: "Honouring the word of his aged father who was ever steadfast in truth, Rama left for the forest along with his wife and brother.

data.v: तेन तत्र महारण्ये मृगयां परिधावता । जनस्थानवधं श्रुत्वा हतौ च खरदूषणौ । ततस्त्वमर्षापहृता जानकी रावणेन तु ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: भततभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसजभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसतज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरभम]

data.es: "In the deep forest he went round hunting animals and killing the demon warriors who assumed any form at their free will.

data.v: यथारूपां यथावर्णां यथालक्ष्मीं विनिश्चिताम् । अश्रौषं राघवस्याहं सेयमासादिता मया ।।
data.es: "Surely I have seen here a lady of similar body, of similar complexion, of similar glow and beauty as described by Rama".

data.v: विररामैवमुक्त्वासौ वाचं वानरपुंगवः । जानकी चापि तच्छ्रुत्वा विस्मयं परमं गता ।।
data.es: Having spoken thus, the great vanara stopped speaking after that. Janaki was wonderstruck by the words of the vanara.

data.v: ततः सा वक्रकेशान्ता सुकेशी केशसंवृतम् । उन्नम्य वदनं भीरुः शिंशपावृक्षमैक्षत ।।
data.es: Then Sita looked up at the Simsupa tree timidly, her face covered with beautiful curly hair.

data.v: सा तिर्यगूर्ध्वं च तथाप्यधस्ता;न्निरीक्षमाणा तमचिन्त्य बुद्धिम् । ददर्श पिङ्गाधिपतेरमात्यं; वातात्मजं सूर्यमिवोदयस्थम् ।।
data.es: She looked obliquely, up, and down and saw Hanuman of unimaginable intelligence, the minister of the monkey lord, son of the Windgod, who looked like the rising Sun.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे एकत्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtyfirst sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: ततः शाखान्तरे लीनं दृष्ट्वा चलितमानसा । सा ददर्श कपिं तत्र प्रश्रितं प्रियवादिनम् ।।
data.es: Sita got perplexed on seeing him (Hanuman), who was tawny in complexion and looked like a cluster of lightnings, clad in white and hidden in between the branches.

data.v: सा तु दृष्ट्वा हरिश्रेष्ठं विनीतवदुपस्थितम् । मैथिली चिन्तयामास स्वप्नोऽयमिति भामिनी ।।
data.es: Noble Sita, seeing the best of vanaras who stood near humbly, began reflecting 'Is this a dream'?

data.v: सा तं समीक्ष्यैव भृशं विसंज्ञा; गतासुकल्पेव बभूव सीता । चिरेण संज्ञां प्रतिलभ्य चैव; विचिन्तयामास विशालनेत्रा ।।
data.es: The largeeyed Sita lost her senses looking at him. She got back her senses after a long time and started thinking again:

data.v: स्वप्नो मयायं विकृतोऽद्य दृष्टः; शाखामृगः शास्त्रगणैर्निषिद्धः । स्वस्त्यस्तु रामाय सलक्ष्मणाय; तथा पितुर्मे जनकस्य राज्ञः ।।
data.es: 'Today I saw an ugly monkey in my dream. Its sight in a dream is inauspicious according to sastras. Let it be auspicious for Lakshmana and Rama for the sake of my father Janaka.

data.v: स्वप्नोऽपि नायं न हि मेऽस्ति निद्रा; शोकेन दुःखेन च पीडितायाः । सुखं हि मे नास्ति यतोऽस्मि हीना; तेनेन्दुपूर्णप्रतिमाननेन ।।
data.es: "But no, it was not a dream for tormented by grief and sorrow I cannot have a dream. When separated from the moonfaced Rama I have no sleep or pleasure, how can I have dream?

data.v: अहं हि तस्याद्य मनो भवेन; संपीडिता तद्गतसर्वभावा । विचिन्तयन्ती सततं तमेव; तथैव पश्यामि तथा शृणोमि ।।
data.es: "I am tormented by intense love for Rama, with all my thoughts immersed in him. Since I am constantly thinking of him I see him and hear words about him. (She thinks it is all hallucination.)

data.v: मनोरथः स्यादिति चिन्तयामि; तथापि बुद्ध्या च वितर्कयामि । किं कारणं तस्य हि नास्ति रूपं; सुव्यक्तरूपश्च वदत्ययं माम् ।।
data.es: "I feel it is only the desire in my mind. Desire has no form. But the one who is addressing me has a form. I cannot understand this.

data.v: नमोऽस्तु वाचस्पतये सवज्रिणे; स्वयम्भुवे चैव हुताशनाय । अनेन चोक्तं यदिदं ममाग्रतो; वनौकसा तच्च तथास्तु नान्यथा ।।
data.es: "My salutations to Indra, Brihaspati, Brahma the creator and also to the firegod. Let all those words spoken by the vanara here in front of me be true and not other than that."इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे द्वात्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtysecond sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तामब्रवीन्महातेजा हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । शिरस्यञ्जलिमाधाय सीतां मधुरया गिरा ।।
data.es: Hanuman, son of the Windgod whose face shone like coral, dressed in a sober manner climbed down the tree, went close to Sita, offered salutations with his palms on his head and spoke in sweet words:

data.v: का नु पद्मपलाशाक्षी क्लिष्टकौशेयवासिनी । द्रुमस्य शाखामालम्ब्य तिष्ठसि त्वमनिन्दिता ।।
data.es: "O blameless lady with eyes like lotus petals, in crumpled silk, holding a branch, and standing, who are you?

data.v: किमर्थं तव नेत्राभ्यां वारि स्रवति शोकजम् । पुण्डरीकपलाशाभ्यां विप्रकीर्णमिवोदकम् ।।
data.es: "Why are tears of grief flowing from your eyes like water trickling down a pair of petals of white lotuses?

data.v: सुराणामसुराणां च नागगन्धर्वरक्षसाम् । यक्षाणां किंनराणां च का त्वं भवसि शोभने ।।
data.es: "O noble lady, are you a goddess or a demoness, a naga, a gandharva, a rakshasa, a yaksha or a kinnera?

data.v: का त्वं भवसि रुद्राणां मरुतां वा वरानने । वसूनां वा वरारोहे देवता प्रतिभासि मे ।।
data.es: "O beautiful lady Do you belong to the race of Rudras, or Marutas, or Vasus?. O noble lady, you appear a goddess to me.

data.v: किं नु चन्द्रमसा हीना पतिता विबुधालयात् । रोहिणी ज्योतिषां श्रेष्ठा श्रेष्ठा सर्वगुणान्विता ।।
कोपाद्वा यदि वा मोहाद्भर्तारमसितेक्षणा । वसिष्ठं कोपयित्वा त्वं नासि कल्याण्यरुन्धती ।।
data.es: "O lady of lovely black eyes who are you? Have you by any chance offended your husband out of anger or out of delusion? Are you the auspicious Arundhati dislodged for making your lord Vasistha angry?

data.v: को नौ पुत्रः पिता भ्रात भर्ता वा ते सुमध्यमे । अस्माल्लोकादमुं लोकं गतं त्वमनुशोचसि ।।
data.es: "O woman of beautiful waist from which world have you come here? For whom are you worrying? Who is your son, father, brother or husband? Are you worrying about some one dead?.

data.v: व्यञ्जनानि हि ते यानि लक्षणानि च लक्षये । महिषी भूमिपालस्य राजकन्यासि मे मता ।।
data.es: "On the basis of your royal signs and other qualities I infer that you are the daughter of a king or his consort.

data.v: रावणेन जनस्थानाद्बलादपहृता यदि । सीता त्वमसि भद्रं ते तन्ममाचक्ष्व पृच्छतः ।।
data.es: "If you are Sita, who was forcefully borne away by Ravana from Janasthana you may kindly reveal to me freely. May god bless you.

data.v: सा तस्य वचनं श्रुत्वा रामकीर्तनहर्षिता । उवाच वाक्यं वैदेही हनूमन्तं द्रुमाश्रितम् ।।
data.es: Happy to have heard words of praise of Rama, Vaidehi spoke this to Hanuman, who got up the tree:

data.v: दुहिता जनकस्याहं वैदेहस्य महात्मनः । सीता च नाम नाम्नाहं भार्या रामस्य धीमतः ।।
data.es: "I am daughter of the great soul, Janaka, king of Videha, known as Sita. I am the wife of that sagacious Rama.

data.v: समा द्वादश तत्राहं राघवस्य निवेशने । भुञ्जाना मानुषान्भोगान्सर्वकामसमृद्धिनी ।।
data.es: "I enjoyed worldly pleasures in abundance for twelve years at Rama's abode.

data.v: ततस्त्रयोदशे वर्षे राज्येनेक्ष्वाकुनन्दनम् । अभिषेचयितुं राजा सोपाध्यायः प्रचक्रमे ।।
data.es: "Then in the thirteenth year king Dasaratha along with the royal preceptor arranged to coronate Rama, delight of the Ikshvaku family, in the kingdom.

data.v: तस्मिन्संभ्रियमाणे तु राघवस्याभिषेचने । कैकेयी नाम भर्तारं देवी वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "While preparations for the coronation were on, queen Kaikeyi said to her husband:

data.v: न पिबेयं न खादेयं प्रत्यहं मम भोजनम् । एष मे जीवितस्यान्तो रामो यद्यभिषिच्यते ।।
data.es: 'I shall not drink or eat food, if Rama is coronated. I shall end my life this moment.

data.v: यत्तदुक्तं त्वया वाक्यं प्रीत्या नृपतिसत्तम । तच्चेन्न वितथं कार्यं वनं गच्छतु राघवः ।।
data.es: 'O Dasaratha, the foremost among kings if the promise lovingly made by you earlier is not going to be false, Rama should go to the forest'.

data.v: स राजा सत्यवाग्देव्या वरदानमनुस्मरन् । मुमोह वचनं श्रुत्वा कैकेय्याः क्रूरमप्रियम् ।।
data.es: "Remembering the boons the ever truthful king had granted to Kaikeyi, he fainted after hearing her cruel and harsh words.

data.v: ततस्तु स्थविरो राजा सत्यधर्मे व्यवस्थितः । ज्येष्ठं यशस्विनं पुत्रं रुदन्राज्यमयाचत ।।
data.es: "The aged king who held on to truthfulness and righteousness begged his famed eldest son Rama to return the kingdom.

data.v: स पितुर्वचनं श्रीमानभिषेकात्परं प्रियम् । मनसा पूर्वमासाद्य वाचा प्रतिगृहीतवान् ।।
data.es: "The illustrious Rama who valued his father's word more than sovereignty, bowed to the command of the father.

data.v: दद्यान्न प्रतिगृह्णीयान्न ब्रूयत्किंचिदप्रियम् । अपि जीवितहेतोर्हि रामः सत्यपराक्रमः ।।
data.es: "Rama, whose strength was his truthfulness, gave whatever others sought but would not accept anything in return. He would not speak a harsh word.

data.v: स विहायोत्तरीयाणि महार्हाणि महायशाः । विसृज्य मनसा राज्यं जनन्यै मां समादिशत् ।।
data.es: "Having given up the kingdom voluntarily, Rama, a highly renowned king cast off his luxurious upper garments and asked me to take care of his mother.

data.v: साहं तस्याग्रतस्तूर्णं प्रस्थिता वनचारिणी । न हि मे तेन हीनाया वासः स्वर्गेऽपि रोचते ।।
data.es: "I, however resolved to live in the forest, marched ahead of him quickly as I did not prefer even heaven without him.

data.v: प्रागेव तु महाभागः सौमित्रिर्मित्रनन्दनः । पूर्वजस्यानुयात्रार्थे द्रुमचीरैरलंकृतः ।।
ते वयं भर्तुरादेशं बहु मान्यदृढव्रताः । प्रविष्टाः स्म पुराद्दृष्टं वनं गम्भीरदर्शनम् ।।
data.es: "Respecting the king's order and determined firmly, we entered the impenetrable forest.

data.v: वसतो दण्डकारण्ये तस्याहममितौजसः । रक्षसापहृता भार्या रावणेन दुरात्मना ।।
data.es: "While the most valiant Rama was living in the Dandaka forest, I, his wife was borne away by the evilminded Ravana.

data.v: द्वौ मासौ तेन मे कालो जीवितानुग्रहः कृतः । ऊर्ध्वं द्वाभ्यां तु मासाभ्यां ततस्त्यक्ष्यामि जीवितम् ।।
data.es: "He has allowed me two months time to live. After two months I will have to give up my life."इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे त्रयस्त्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtythird sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तस्यास्तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा हनूमान्हरियूथपः । दुःखाद्दुःखाभिभूतायाः सान्तमुत्तरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Hearing the words of Sita who was overwhelmed with grief, the monkey leader Hanuman felt sad and thus spoke comforting her:

data.v: अहं रामस्य संदेशाद्देवि दूतस्तवागतः । वैदेहि कुशली रामस्त्वां च कौशलमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "By the command of Rama I am here as a messenger. He is keeping well. He is well and wishes you well.

data.v: यो ब्राह्ममस्त्रं वेदांश्च वेद वेदविदां वरः । स त्वां दाशरथी रामो देवि कौशलमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "O godlike lady Rama, son of Dasaratha, master of the Vedas, wielder of Brahmastra wishes you well.

data.v: लक्ष्मणश्च महातेजा भर्तुस्तेऽनुचरः प्रियः । कृतवाञ्शोकसंतप्तः शिरसा तेऽभिवादनम् ।।
data.es: "The mighty Lakshmana too, a dear brother and follower of your husband is immersed in grief, and sends salutations to you."

data.v: सा तयोः कुशलं देवी निशम्य नरसिंहयोः । प्रीतिसंहृष्टसर्वाङ्गी हनूमान्तमथाब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: On hearing the wellbeing of Rama and Lakshman, lions among men, Sita experienced thrill all over her body. She then spoke to Hanuman:

data.v: कल्याणी बत गथेयं लौकिकी प्रतिभाति मे । एहि जीवन्तमानदो नरं वर्षशतादपि ।।

ch.n: उपजाति अनुष्टुभ्: अज्ञातम् [८: रसलग], अज्ञातम् [८: ररलग], अज्ञातम् [८: यसलल], अज्ञातम् [८: मनगग]

data.es: "The adage that 'joy comes to a living being even though it be at the end of a hundred years' is popular. It appears true in my case".

data.v: तयोः समागमे तस्मिन्प्रीतिरुत्पादिताद्भुता । परस्परेण चालापं विश्वस्तौ तौ प्रचक्रतुः ।।
data.es: Hanuman thus created a sense of wonderful joy in her as they came together. Both of them started to converse restoring confidence in each other.

data.v: तस्यास्तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा हनूमान्हरियूथपः । सीतायाः शोकदीनायाः समीपमुपचक्रमे ।।
data.es: Hearing the words of Sita who was overwhelmed with grief, the monkey leader Hanuman felt sad and thus spoke comforting her:

data.v: यथा यथा समीपं स हनूमानुपसर्पति । तथा तथा रावणं सा तं सीता परिशङ्कते ।।
data.es: As Hanuman started slowly drawing close, Sita suspected he might be Ravana.

data.v: अहो धिग्धिक्कृतमिदं कथितं हि यदस्य मे । रूपान्तरमुपागम्य स एवायं हि रावणः ।।
data.es: "Ohshame on me. I have told him my story which should not have been said. This is verily Ravana come in a disguise".

data.v: तामशोकस्य शाखां सा विमुक्त्वा शोककर्शिता । तस्यामेवानवद्याङ्गी धरण्यां समुपाविशत् ।।
data.es: So saying Sita of flawless limbs, emaciated with grief, left the branch of Ashoka tree held by her and squatted on the ground.

data.v: अवन्दत महाबाहुस्ततस्तां जनकात्मजाम् । सा चैनं भयवित्रस्ता भूयो नैवाभ्युदैक्षत ।।
data.es: The longarmed Hanuman saw Sita, who was stricken with grief and deluded with fear. He prostrated to her. But out of fear she did not look at him.

data.v: तं दृष्ट्वा वन्दमानं तु सीता शशिनिभानना । अब्रवीद्दीर्घमुच्छ्वस्य वानरं मधुरस्वरा ।।
data.es: On seeing the vanara prostrated, the moonfaced lady, sighed deeply and spoke to him in a sweet voice:

data.v: मायां प्रविष्टो मायावी यदि त्वं रावणः स्वयम् । उत्पादयसि मे भूयः संतापं तन्न शोभनम् ।।
data.es: "If you are that trickster Ravana who appears incognito before me, it is not good for you. You are causing grief again.

data.v: स्वं परित्यज्य रूपं यः परिव्राजकरूपधृत् । जनस्थाने मया दृष्टस्त्वं स एवासि रावणः ।।
data.es: "You are the same Ravana who took the guise of a mendicant, giving up your real form and came to Janasthana.

data.v: उपवासकृशां दीनां कामरूप निशाचर । संतापयसि मां भूयः संतापं तन्न शोभनम् ।।
data.es: "Oh you are one who can assume any form at will. You are a nightstalker. It is not good for you to cause pain to me who is already emaciated through fasting, who is pitiable and who is already afflicted.

data.v: यदि रामस्य दूतस्त्वमागतो भद्रमस्तु ते । पृच्छामि त्वां हरिश्रेष्ठ प्रिया राम कथा हि मे ।।
data.es: "O great vanara, If on the other hand you have come here as Rama's messenger I wish you well. I love Rama's story. Tell me.

data.v: गुणान्रामस्य कथय प्रियस्य मम वानर । चित्तं हरसि मे सौम्य नदीकूलं यथा रयः ।।
data.es: "O vanara Rama's virtues are dear to me to hear. O gentle one just as the current of the river wears away its banks, my mind is lured by your presence.

data.v: अहो स्वप्नस्य सुखता याहमेवं चिराहृता । प्रेषितं नाम पश्यामि राघवेण वनौकसं ।।
data.es: "Oh I have been seeing the person sent by Rama in my dream for a long time. This is a pleasant dream to me.

data.v: स्वप्नेऽपि यद्यहं वीरं राघवं सहलक्ष्मणम् । पश्येयं नावसीदेयं स्वप्नोऽपि मम मत्सरी ।।
data.es: "Even if I can see the heroic Rama together with Lakshmana in my dream my pain will be gone. Even the dream is inimical to me (I cannot sleep and thus cannot dream.)

data.v: नाहं स्वप्नमिमं मन्ये स्वप्ने दृष्ट्वा हि वानरम् । न शक्योऽभ्युदयः प्राप्तुं प्राप्तश्चाभ्युदयो मम ।।
data.es: "I do not think it is a dream. Pleasure cannot be experienced by seeing a vanara in a dream. I experience pleasure now (seeing a monkey in a dream is a bad omen).

data.v: किं नु स्याच्चित्तमोहोऽयं भवेद्वातगतिस्त्वियम् । उन्मादजो विकारो वा स्यादियं मृगतृष्णिका ।।
data.es: "Can this be a delusion of my mind or a mental imbalance (resulting in movement of the mind in the body). Is it a malady born of my madness? Or is it a mirage?

data.v: अथ वा नायमुन्मादो मोहोऽप्युन्मादलक्ष्मणः । संबुध्ये चाहमात्मानमिमं चापि वनौकसं ।।
data.es: "No, this cannot be insanity. nor even delusion. But I recognise this vanara well"

data.v: इत्येवं बहुधा सीता संप्रधार्य बलाबलम् । रक्षसां कामरूपत्वान्मेने तं राक्षसाधिपम् ।।
data.es: Considering the strength and weakness of demons in that manner Sita thought that Hanuman was none other than the king of demons who can asume any form at will.

data.v: एतां बुद्धिं तदा कृत्वा सीता सा तनुमध्यमा । न प्रतिव्याजहाराथ वानरं जनकात्मजा ।।
data.es: Having entertained such thoughts, Sita, the lady with a fairwaist, daughter of Janaka, did not respond to the vanara.

data.v: सीतायाश्चिन्तितं बुद्ध्वा हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । श्रोत्रानुकूलैर्वचनैस्तदा तां संप्रहर्षयत् ।।
data.es: Hanuman, son of the Windgod understood what was going on in Sita's mind and spoke pleasing words that brought joy in her.

data.v: आदित्य इव तेजस्वी लोककान्तः शशी यथा । राजा सर्वस्य लोकस्य देवो वैश्रवणो यथा ।।
data.es: "Rama is glorious as the Sun, brings delight to the whole world like the Moon, is the king of kings like Vaisravana, and renowned like Visnu endowed with valour.

data.v: विक्रमेणोपपन्नश्च यथा विष्णुर्महायशाः । सत्यवादी मधुरवाग्देवो वाचस्पतिर्यथा ।।
रूपवान्सुभगः श्रीमान्कन्दर्प इव मूर्तिमान् । स्थानक्रोधप्रहर्ता च श्रेष्ठो लोके महारथः । बाहुच्छायामवष्टब्धो यस्य लोको महात्मनः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जमतत], अज्ञातम् [१२: मरयम], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसमभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: यततर]

data.es: "He shows anger to one who deserves it, he is the foremost charioteer of the world and he is a great self under the shadow of whose shoulders the whole world takes refuge.

data.v: अपकृष्याश्रमपदान्मृगरूपेण राघवम् । शून्ये येनापनीतासि तस्य द्रक्ष्यसि यत्फलम् ।।
data.es: "You will see the consequences of the action of Ravana who abducted you deceitfully in the form of deer when Rama was away from the hermitage.

data.v: नचिराद्रावणं संख्ये यो वधिष्यति वीर्यवान् । रोषप्रमुक्तैरिषुभिर्ज्वलद्भिरिव पावकैः ।।
data.es: "Heroic Rama will soon release many scorching, fiery arrows in anger and kill Ravana. I seek your permission as an envoy of Rama. Filled with grief by your separation, he has made inquiries about your welfare.

data.v: तेनाहं प्रेषितो दूतस्त्वत्सकाशमिहागतः । त्वद्वियोगेन दुःखार्तः स त्वां कौशलमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "Heroic Rama will soon release many scorching, fiery arrows in anger and kill Ravana. I seek your permission as an envoy of Rama. Filled with grief by your separation, he has made inquiries about your welfare.

data.v: लक्ष्मणश्च महातेजाः सुमित्रानन्दवर्धनः । अभिवाद्य महाबाहुः सोऽपि कौशलमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "The brilliant, longarmed Lakshmana, delight of Sumitra enquires about your welfare and offers salutations to you.

data.v: रामस्य च सखा देवि सुग्रीवो नाम वानरः । राजा वानरमुख्यानां स त्वां कौशलमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "O goddess like lady Rama's friend Sugriva, king of vanara chieftans inquires about your wellbeing.

data.v: नित्यं स्मरति रामस्त्वां ससुग्रीवः सलक्ष्मणः । दिष्ट्या जीवसि वैदेहि राक्षसी वशमागता ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi Rama, Lakshmana and Sugriva always remember you. Luckily you are alive even though you are under the clutches of shedemons.

data.v: नचिराद्द्रक्ष्यसे रामं लक्ष्मणं च महारथम् । मध्ये वानरकोटीनां सुग्रीवं चामितौजसं ।।
data.es: "Very soon you will see mighty Rama, Lakshmana and Sugriva of unlimited prowess surrounded by crores of vanaras.

data.v: अहं सुग्रीवसचिवो हनूमान्नाम वानरः । प्रविष्टो नगरीं लङ्कां लङ्घयित्वा महोदधिम् ।।
data.es: "I am Sugriva's minister known as Hanuman, a vanara who entered the city of Lanka after leaping over the great ocean.

data.v: कृत्वा मूर्ध्नि पदन्यासं रावणस्य दुरात्मनः । त्वां द्रष्टुमुपयातोऽहं समाश्रित्य पराक्रमम् ।।
data.es: "Setting my foot with my valour on the head of the cruelminded Ravana, using my valour, I came here to see you.

data.v: नाहमस्मि तथा देवि यथा मामवगच्छसि । विशङ्का त्यज्यतामेषा श्रद्धत्स्व वदतो मम ।।
data.es: "O goddesslike lady I am not a deceitful person as you suppose me to be. Shake off your suspicion as I speak to you and trust me."इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे चतुस्त्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtyfourth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: तां तु राम कथां श्रुत्वा वैदेही वानरर्षभात् । उवाच वचनं सान्त्वमिदं मधुरया गिरा ।।
data.es: On hearing about Rama from the bull among vanaras, thus spoke Vaidehi politely in a sweet voice:

data.v: क्व ते रामेण संसर्गः कथं जानासि लक्ष्मणम् । वानराणां नराणां च कथमासीत्समागमः ।।
data.es: "Where did you come in contact with Rama? How did you assess Lakshmana? How did an alliance of vanaras and humans take place?

data.v: यानि रामस्य लिङ्गानि लक्ष्मणस्य च वानर । तानि भूयः समाचक्ष्व न मां शोकः समाविशेत् ।।
data.es: "O vanara tell me all about the identification marks of Rama and Lakshmana again so that grief does not enter my mind.

data.v: कीदृशं तस्य संस्थानं रूपं रामस्य कीदृशम् । कथमूरू कथं बाहू लक्ष्मणस्य च शंस मे ।।
data.es: "What does Rama look like? And Laksmana? How are his thighs, arms? Tell me".

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु वैदेह्या हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । ततो रामं यथातत्त्वमाख्यातुमुपचक्रमे ।।
data.es: Questioned thus by Vaidehi, Hanuman, son of the Windgod started describing Rama's physique as it is.

data.v: जानन्ती बत दिष्ट्या मां वैदेहि परिपृच्छसि । भर्तुः कमलपत्राक्षि संख्यानं लक्ष्मणस्य च ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi with eyes like lotus petals although you know your husband's and Lakshmana's form and distinguishing marks, it is my good fortune that you asked me (to describe them).

data.v: यानि रामस्य चिह्नानि लक्ष्मणस्य च यानि वै । लक्षितानि विशालाक्षि वदतः शृणु तानि मे ।।
data.es: "O largeeyed lady I will describe those distinguishing marks of Rama and Lakshmana Listen.

data.v: रामः कमलपत्राक्षः सर्वभूतमनोहरः । रूपदाक्षिण्यसंपन्नः प्रसूतो जनकात्मजे ।।
data.es: "O daughter of Janaka Rama with eyes like lotus petals is a person born with a delightful form, richly endowed with indescribable charm and politeness.

data.v: तेजसादित्यसंकाशः क्षमया पृथिवीसमः । बृहस्पतिसमो बुद्ध्या यशसा वासवोपमः ।।
data.es: "He vies with the Sun in effulgence, with earth in forbearance, with Brihaspati in intelligence, and in fame with Indra.

data.v: रक्षिता जीवलोकस्य स्वजनस्य च रक्षिता । रक्षिता स्वस्य वृत्तस्य धर्मस्य च परंतपः ।।
data.es: "The scourage of enemies, he is a protector of righteousness and of his kins and all living creatures. He is an embodiment of righteousness.

data.v: रामो भामिनि लोकस्य चातुर्वर्ण्यस्य रक्षिता । मर्यादानां च लोकस्य कर्ता कारयिता च सः ।।
data.es: "O beautiful lady Rama is a protector of the four classes of society (Brahmana, Kshatriya, Vaisya and Sudra) in the world. He follows codes of conduct and makes others follow them.

data.v: अर्चिष्मानर्चितोऽत्यर्थं ब्रह्मचर्यव्रते स्थितः । साधूनामुपकारज्ञः प्रचारज्ञश्च कर्मणाम् ।।
data.es: "He is luminous and highly revered. He observes vow of selfcontrol. He is steadfast and recognises services rendered by sages. He is aware of the rites and the ways of administration.

data.v: राजविद्याविनीतश्च ब्राह्मणानामुपासिता । श्रुतवाञ्शीलसंपन्नो विनीतश्च परंतपः ।।
data.es: "He is welltrained in statecraft. He is devoted to brahmins. Endowed with an excellent conduct, he is learned in scriptures and a scorcher of enemies.

data.v: यजुर्वेदविनीतश्च वेदविद्भिः सुपूजितः । धनुर्वेदे च वेदे च वेदाङ्गेषु च निष्ठितः ।।
data.es: "He is versed in Yajurveda and is respected by Vedic scholars. He has mastered Dhanurveda and other Vedas and auxillary Vedas as well.

data.v: विपुलांसो महाबाहुः कम्बुग्रीवः शुभाननः । गूढजत्रुः सुताम्राक्षो रामो देवि जनैः श्रुतः ।।
data.es: "O godlike lady Rama has broad shoulders, strong arms, conchshaped neck and an auspicious countenance. With his fleshy round arms and copperyred eyes, he is renowned in all the worlds.

data.v: दुन्दुभिस्वननिर्घोषः स्निग्धवर्णः प्रतापवान् । समः समविभक्ताङ्गो वर्णं श्यामं समाश्रितः ।।
data.es: "His tone is resonant like drums, he has a beautiful, dark, shining complexion. He has symmetrical, well proportioned limbs. He is neither too tall nor too short.

data.v: त्रिस्थिरस्त्रिप्रलम्बश्च त्रिसमस्त्रिषु चोन्नतः । त्रिवलीवांस्त्र्यवणतश्चतुर्व्यङ्गस्त्रिशीर्षवान् ।।
data.es: "He has three stiff parts, three long parts, three even parts, three shining parts, elevated in three parts, has three raised parts, his body has lines in three parts and is of coppery reddish colour in three parts. He has a majestic look.

data.v: चतुष्कलश्चतुर्लेखश्चतुष्किष्कुश्चतुःसमः । चतुर्दशसमद्वन्द्वश्चतुर्दष्टश्चतुर्गतिः ।।
महौष्ठहनुनासश्च पञ्चस्निग्धोऽष्टवंशवान् । दशपद्मो दशबृहत्त्रिभिर्व्याप्तो द्विशुक्लवान् । षडुन्नतो नवतनुस्त्रिभिर्व्याप्नोति राघवः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यरजर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसरम], अज्ञातम् [१२: नरतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जभतन]

data.es: "Ten limbs of the body resemble lotuses. He has proportionate limbs. He is known by the virtue of his spledour, fame and glory. Both his teeth and eyes are fair. Six parts of his body are elevated, nine parts of his body are fine and sharp. He pursues spiritual merit, worldly comfort and sensual delight in three periods of the dayforenoon, midday and evening. He always adopts the righteous way of life.

data.v: सत्यधर्मपरः श्रीमान्संग्रहानुग्रहे रतः । देशकालविभागज्ञः सर्वलोकप्रियंवदः ।।
data.es: "He is ever established in truth and righteousness. He is prosperous and desires to accumulate wealth in order to shower favour on others. He knows the right use of time and place in discharging his duties. He has endeared himself to all by his words.

data.v: भ्राता च तस्य द्वैमात्रः सौमित्रिरपराजितः । अनुरागेण रूपेण गुणैश्चैव तथाविधः ।।
data.es: "His invincible brother Saumitri born of a different mother is a replica of Rama in affection, charm and virtues.

data.v: त्वामेव मार्गमाणो तौ विचरन्तौ वसुंधराम् । ददर्शतुर्मृगपतिं पूर्वजेनावरोपितम् ।।
data.es: "While both of them were wandering, searching for you all over the earth they saw Sugriva, the lord of animals who had been thrown out of kingship by his elder brother and was living on the mountain Rshyamuka frightened of him.

data.v: ऋश्यमूकस्य पृष्ठे तु बहुपादपसंकुले । भ्रातुर्भार्यार्तमासीनं सुग्रीवं प्रियदर्शनम् ।।
data.es: "While both of them were wandering, searching for you all over the earth they saw Sugriva, the lord of animals who had been thrown out of kingship by his elder brother and was living on the mountain Rshyamuka frightened of him.

data.v: वयं तु हरिराजं तं सुग्रीवं सत्यसंगरम् । परिचर्यामहे राज्यात्पूर्वजेनावरोपितम् ।।
data.es: "Sugriva, king of vanaras who is committed to defend truth has been deposed from the kingdom by his elder brother. We keep attending on him.

data.v: ततस्तौ चीरवसनौ धनुःप्रवरपाणिनौ । ऋश्यमूकस्य शैलस्य रम्यं देशमुपागतौ ।।
data.es: "Both the princes clad in bark robes and armed with powerful bows reached the beautiful location of Rshyamukha mountain.

data.v: स तौ दृष्ट्वा नरव्याघ्रौ धन्विनौ वानरर्षभः । अभिप्लुतो गिरेस्तस्य शिखरं भयमोहितः ।।
data.es: "On seeing the tigers among men armed with bows, Sugriva, the bull among vanaras jumped from the mountain deluded with fear and reached the peak.

data.v: ततः स शिखरे तस्मिन्वानरेन्द्रो व्यवस्थितः । तयोः समीपं मामेव प्रेषयामास सत्वरः ।।
data.es: "Thereafter the lord of vanaras staying on the mountain top quickly sent me to meet both of them.

data.v: तावहं पुरुषव्याघ्रौ सुग्रीववचनात्प्रभू । रूपलक्षणसंपन्नौ कृताञ्जलिरुपस्थितः ।।
तौ परिज्ञाततत्त्वार्थौ मया प्रीतिसमन्वितौ । पृष्ठमारोप्य तं देशं प्रापितौ पुरुषर्षभौ ।।
data.es: "I recognised the true status of both the mighty men who were filled with joy, placed them on my back, and reached the mountaintop.

data.v: निवेदितौ च तत्त्वेन सुग्रीवाय महात्मने । तयोरन्योन्यसंभाषाद्भृशं प्रीतिरजायत ।।
data.es: "I reported faithfully about both the highsouled men to Sugriva. As they got to know each other through conversation a fast friendship developed between them.

data.v: तत्र तौ कीर्तिसंपन्नौ हरीश्वरनरेश्वरौ । परस्परकृताश्वासौ कथया पूर्ववृत्तया ।।
तं ततः सान्त्वयामास सुग्रीवं लक्ष्मणाग्रजः । स्त्रीहेतोर्वालिना भ्रात्रा निरस्तमुरु तेजसा ।।
data.es: "Then Rama, consoled Sugriva who was dethroned and abandoned on acount of a woman by his brother Vali, endowed with great prowess.

data.v: ततस्त्वन्नाशजं शोकं रामस्याक्लिष्टकर्मणः । लक्ष्मणो वानरेन्द्राय सुग्रीवाय न्यवेदयत् ।।
data.es: "Then Lakshmana spoke to the lord of vanaras, Sugriva about your loss and the grief caused to Rama, who is adept in accomplishing difficult deeds with ease.

data.v: स श्रुत्वा वानरेन्द्रस्तु लक्ष्मणेनेरितं वचः । तदासीन्निष्प्रभोऽत्यर्थं ग्रहग्रस्त इवांशुमान् ।।
data.es: "Having heard the words of Lakshmana, the king of vanaras became extremely lustreless like the Sun overshadowed by the planet Rahu.

data.v: ततस्त्वद्गात्रशोभीनि रक्षसा ह्रियमाणया । यान्याभरणजालानि पातितानि महीतले ।।
तानि सर्वाणि रामाय आनीय हरियूथपाः । संहृष्टा दर्शयामासुर्गतिं तु न विदुस्तव ।।
तानि रामाय दत्तानि मयैवोपहृतानि च । स्वनवन्त्यवकीर्णन्ति तस्मिन्विहतचेतसि ।।
data.es: "I collected the ornaments and gave them to Rama. He lost his senses on seeing the jingling ornaments scattered.

data.v: तान्यङ्के दर्शनीयानि कृत्वा बहुविधं ततः । तेन देवप्रकाशेन देवेन परिदेवितम् ।।
data.es: "The divine self who is effulgent like god wailed in many ways placing the beautiful ornaments on his lap.

data.v: पश्यतस्तस्या रुदतस्ताम्यतश्च पुनः पुनः । प्रादीपयन्दाशरथेस्तानि शोकहुताशनम् ।।
data.es: "Rama looked at them and wept clasping them again and again in grief which inflamed like fire.

data.v: शयितं च चिरं तेन दुःखार्तेन महात्मना । मयापि विविधैर्वाक्यैः कृच्छ्रादुत्थापितः पुनः ।।
data.es: "Rama, the great self, immersed in sorrow lay down on the ground. I also consoled him with great difficulty and helped him to get up.

data.v: तानि दृष्ट्वा महार्हाणि दर्शयित्वा मुहुर्मुहुः । राघवः सहसौमित्रिः सुग्रीवे स न्यवेदयत् ।।
data.es: "Longarmed Rama along with Lakshmana looked at them again and again and gave them to the care of Sugriva.

data.v: स तवादर्शनादार्ये राघवः परितप्यते । महता ज्वलता नित्यमग्निनेवाग्निपर्वतः ।।
data.es: "O divine lady on account of your separation he is ever blazing like a mountain of fire (Samvartaka).

data.v: त्वत्कृते तमनिद्रा च शोकश्चिन्ता च राघवम् । तापयन्ति महात्मानमग्न्यगारमिवाग्नयः ।।
data.es: "Rama is burning like a furnace by (three fires) sleeplessness, grief and intense anxiety just as the three sacred fires keep a firesanctuary intensely heated.

data.v: तवादर्शनशोकेन राघवः प्रविचाल्यते । महता भूमिकम्पेन महानिव शिलोच्चयः ।।
data.es: "On account of sorrow caused by not being able to see you, Rama of Raghu dynasty is shaken up like a lofty mountain is shaken by earthquake.

data.v: कानानानि सुरम्याणि नदीप्रस्रवणानि च । चरन्न रतिमाप्नोति त्वमपश्यन्नृपात्मजे ।।
data.es: "Oh princess unable to see you, Rama has found no joy in roaming delightful forests, rivers and streams.

data.v: स त्वां मनुजशार्दूलः क्षिप्रं प्राप्स्यति राघवः । समित्रबान्धवं हत्वा रावणं जनकात्मजे ।।
data.es: "Oh daughter of Janaka after killing Ravana, along with his friends and relatives Rama, the tiger among men, will meet you.

data.v: सहितौ रामसुग्रीवावुभावकुरुतां तदा । समयं वालिनं हन्तुं तव चान्वेषणं तथा ।।
data.es: "(Having become friends) Rama and Sugriva together reached an agreement to kill Vali and search for you.

data.v: ततो निहत्य तरसा रामो वालिनमाहवे । सर्वर्क्षहरिसंघानां सुग्रीवमकरोत्पतिम् ।।
data.es: "Then Rama quickly killed Vali in a combat and made Sugriva the lord of all troops of vanaras and bears.

data.v: रामसुग्रीवयोरैक्यं देव्येवं समजायत । हनूमन्तं च मां विद्धि तयोर्दूतमिहागतम् ।।
data.es: "Oh Illustrious lady In that manner alliance was established between Rama and Sugriva. Know me to be Hanuman, arrived here as their messenger.

data.v: स्वराज्यं प्राप्य सुग्रीवः समनीय महाहरीन् । त्वदर्थं प्रेषयामास दिशो दश महाबलान् ।।
data.es: "Having obtained his kingdom Sugriva despatched the vanara leaders to all ten directions (to search for you).

data.v: आदिष्टा वानरेन्द्रेण सुग्रीवेण महौजसः । अद्रिराजप्रतीकाशाः सर्वतः प्रस्थिता महीम् ।।
data.es: "Following Sugriva's orders, the powerful monkey leaders huge as the Himalayas, king of mountains went all over the earth (searching).

data.v: अङ्गदो नाम लक्ष्मीवान्वालिसूनुर्महाबलः । प्रस्थितः कपिशार्दूलस्त्रिभागबलसंवृतः ।।
तेषां नो विप्रनष्टानां विन्ध्ये पर्वतसत्तमे । भृशं शोकपरीतनामहोरात्रगणा गताः ।।
data.es: "We wasted many nights and days immersed in disappointment (for not being able to find you) and we missed our path in the great Vindhya mountain.

data.v: ते वयं कार्यनैराश्यात्कालस्यातिक्रमेण च । भयाच्च कपिराजस्य प्राणांस्त्यक्तुं व्यवस्थिताः ।।
data.es: "We decided to give up our lives due to disappointment, transgression of the time limit fixed for us and fear of the monkey lord (fear of facing the king without finding you).

data.v: विचित्य वनदुर्गाणि गिरिप्रस्रवणानि च । अनासाद्य पदं देव्याः प्राणांस्त्यक्तुं व्यवस्थिताः ।।
data.es: "We decided to give up our lives since we were unable to see the feet of the queen (Sita) even after searching the forest fortresses and the (banks of) mountain streams.

data.v: भृशं शोकार्णवे मग्नः पर्यदेवयदङ्गदः । तव नाशं च वैदेहि वालिनश्च तथा वधम् । प्रायोपवेशमस्माकं मरणं च जटायुषः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: रसयर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जभतत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरमज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यभभर]

data.v: तेषां नः स्वामिसंदेशान्निराशानां मुमूर्षताम् । कार्यहेतोरिवायातः शकुनिर्वीर्यवान्महान् ।।
data.es: "When we were disappointed (in tracing you) and were at the point of death having been commanded by the king (that whosoever overstays would be killed) a gigantic powerful bird appeared to fulfil our task.

data.v: गृध्रराजस्य सोदर्यः संपातिर्नाम गृध्रराट् । श्रुत्वा भ्रातृवधं कोपादिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "That king of vultures, Sampati was the brother of king of birds Jatayu. Hearing about the death of his younger brother Sampati felt distresed and spoke in anger:

data.v: यवीयान्केन मे भ्राता हतः क्व च विनाशितः । एतदाख्यातुमिच्छामि भवद्भिर्वानरोत्तमाः ।।
data.es: 'O best of vanaras by whom was my younger brother killed? Where was he dropped down? I wish you to tell me all about that.

data.v: अङ्गदोऽकथयत्तस्य जनस्थाने महद्वधम् । रक्षसा भीमरूपेण त्वामुद्दिश्य यथातथम् ।।
जटायोस्तु वधं श्रुत्वा दुःखितः सोऽरुणात्मजः । त्वामाह स वरारोहे वसन्तीं रावणालये ।।
data.es: "Having heard about the death of Jatayu, O charming lady that Sampati Aruna's son felt sad and told us that you are at Ravana's palace.

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा संपातेः प्रीतिवर्धनम् । अङ्गदप्रमुखाः सर्वे ततः संप्रस्थिता वयम् । त्वद्दर्शनकृतोत्साहा हृष्टास्तुष्टाः प्लवंगमाः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यरयभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: यमतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतभम], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसमम]

data.es: "Having heard Sampati's encouraging words all of us led by Angada departed immediately.

data.v: अथाहं हरिसैन्यस्य सागरं दृश्य सीदतः । व्यवधूय भयं तीव्रं योजनानां शतं प्लुतः ।।
data.es: "When the vanara army was feeling despondent at the sight of the ocean, I leaped across the sea, a hundred yojanas, pushing aside all my fear.

data.v: लङ्का चापि मया रात्रौ प्रविष्टा राक्षसाकुला । रावणश्च मया दृष्टस्त्वं च शोकनिपीडिता ।।
data.es: "I entered at night the city of Lanka teeming with demons and saw Ravana and saw you immersed in sorrow.

data.v: एतत्ते सर्वमाख्यातं यथावृत्तमनिन्दिते । अभिभाषस्व मां देवि दूतो दाशरथेरहम् ।।
data.es: "O sinless lady I have given you a faithful account. I am a messenger of Dasaratha's son. And you may speak now, O divine lady

data.v: त्वं मां रामकृतोद्योगं त्वन्निमित्तमिहागतम् । सुग्रीव सचिवं देवि बुध्यस्व पवनात्मजम् ।।
data.es: "O divine lady Know that I have come here for your cause carrying out the mission of Rama. I am Sugriva'a minister and son of the Windgod.

data.v: कुशली तव काकुत्स्थः सर्वशस्त्रभृतां वरः । गुरोराराधने युक्तो लक्ष्मणश्च सुलक्षणः ।।
data.es: "Your lord Rama of Kakutstha race, supreme among wielders of weapons is doing well. So is venerable Lakshmana endowed with auspicious signs engaged in serving him.

data.v: तस्य वीर्यवतो देवि भर्तुस्तव हिते रतः । अहमेकस्तु संप्राप्तः सुग्रीववचनादिह ।।
data.es: "O queen seeking the welfare of your Valiant husband I came here at the behest of Sugriva all alone.

data.v: मयेयमसहायेन चरता कामरूपिणा । दक्षिणा दिगनुक्रान्ता त्वन्मार्गविचयैषिणा ।।
data.es: "I can assume any form at my will. I searched for you without any help moving in the southern direction and reached this place .

data.v: दिष्ट्याहं हरिसैन्यानां त्वन्नाशमनुशोचताम् । अपनेष्यामि संतापं तवाभिगमशंसनात् ।।
data.es: "Fortunately for me I can finally dispel the fear of the vanara chiefs who are regretting your loss, by letting them know that you have been found.

data.v: दिष्ट्या हि न मम व्यर्थं देवि सागरलङ्घनम् । प्राप्स्याम्यहमिदं दिष्ट्या त्वद्दर्शनकृतं यशः ।।
data.es: "Oh queen luckily for me, crossing the ocean has not gone in vain. I am fortunate because I will attain fame of finding you.

data.v: राघवश्च महावीर्यः क्षिप्रं त्वामभिपत्स्यते । समित्रबान्धवं हत्वा रावणं राक्षसाधिपम् ।।
data.es: "Oh daughter of Janaka after killing Ravana, along with his friends and relatives Rama, the tiger among men, will meet you.

data.v: कौरजो नाम वैदेहि गिरीणामुत्तमो गिरिः । ततो गच्छति गोकर्णं पर्वतं केसरी हरिः ।।
data.es: "Oh Vaidehi there is a famous mountain called Malyavan. From there a monkey called Kesari went to mount Gokarna.

data.v: स च देवर्षिभिर्दृष्टः पिता मम महाकपिः । तीर्थे नदीपतेः पुण्ये शम्बसादनमुद्धरत् ।।
data.es: "He (Kesari) is said to be my father by the divine sages. He retrieved a piece of land in a holy spot of that sea shore and killed Sambasadana, a demon who was oppressing righteous people.

data.v: तस्याहं हरिणः क्षेत्रे जातो वातेन मैथिलि । हनूमानिति विख्यातो लोके स्वेनैव कर्मणा । विश्वासार्थं तु वैदेहि भर्तुरुक्ता मया गुणाः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: मसमम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यजतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: मरयम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसभम]

data.es: "O Mythili I was born in that land retrieved by the Windgod. I am known as Hanuman by virtue of my own action.

data.v: एवं विश्वासिता सीता हेतुभिः शोककर्शिता । उपपन्नैरभिज्ञानैर्दूतं तमवगच्छति ।।
data.es: The griefstricken Sita trusted him by his logical presentation of reasons as well as identifications. She believed that he was a messenger (of Rama).

data.v: अतुलं च गता हर्षं प्रहर्षेण तु जानकी । नेत्राभ्यां वक्रपक्ष्माभ्यां मुमोचानन्दजं जलम् ।।
data.es: Janaki experienced immeasurable happiness and shed tears of joy through her curved eyes.

data.v: चारु तच्चाननं तस्यास्ताम्रशुक्लायतेक्षणम् । अशोभत विशालाक्ष्या राहुमुक्त इवोडुराट् । हनूमन्तं कपिं व्यक्तं मन्यते नान्यथेति सा ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ररमय], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसजम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरनम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यततर]

data.es: Her face with large eyes with a tinge of red corners shone like the Moon released from Rahu.

data.v: अथोवाच हनूमांस्तामुत्तरं प्रियदर्शनाम् ।।
data.es: She realised that the monkey was none other than Hanuman. Then he looked at her who was pleasing to see and spoke again:

data.v: हतेऽसुरे संयति शम्बसादने; कपिप्रवीरेण महर्षिचोदनात् । ततोऽस्मि वायुप्रभवो हि मैथिलि; प्रभावतस्तत्प्रतिमश्च वानरः ।।
data.es: "(My father) a mighty monkey killed Sambasadana in a battle on the command of a great seer. I am a vanara (born to a monkey) by the impact of the Windgod. I am equal to the Windgod in power."इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे पञ्चत्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtyfifth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: भूय एव महातेजा हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । अब्रवीत्प्रश्रितं वाक्यं सीताप्रत्ययकारणात् ।।
data.es: Mighty Hanuman, the son of the Windgod again spoke to Sita humbly to inspire confidence in her.

data.v: वानरोऽहं महाभागे दूतो रामस्य धीमतः । रामनामाङ्कितं चेदं पश्य देव्यङ्गुलीयकम् । समाश्वसिहि भद्रं ते क्षीणदुःखफला ह्यसि ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ररमत], अज्ञातम् [१२: ररजभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यतभभ]

data.es: "O noble lady I am a vanara, an envoy of learned Rama. You see this ring with Rama's name inscribed on it, O godlike lady

data.v: गृहीत्वा प्रेक्षमाणा सा भर्तुः करविभूषणम् । भर्तारमिव संप्राप्ता जानकी मुदिताभवत् ।।
data.es: She received the ornament that adorned her husband's hand and gazed at it and felt delighted as though her husband had arrived.

data.v: चारु तद्वदनं तस्यास्ताम्रशुक्लायतेक्षणम् । बभूव प्रहर्षोदग्रं राहुमुक्त इवोडुराट् ।।
data.es: Her face with large eyes with a tinge of red corners shone like the Moon released from Rahu.

data.v: ततः सा ह्रीमती बाला भर्तुः संदेशहर्षिता । परितुट्षा प्रियं श्रुत्वा प्राशंसत महाकपिम् ।।
data.es: Young Sita felt delighted about her husband's news and blushed. By praising him for his action, she pleased the great monkey.

data.v: विक्रान्तस्त्वं समर्थस्त्वं प्राज्ञस्त्वं वानरोत्तम । येनेदं राक्षसपदं त्वयैकेन प्रधर्षितम् ।।
data.es: "O foremost among the vanaras you have trespassed the abodes of demons all alone. You are mighty and capable and wise.

data.v: शतयोजनविस्तीर्णः सागरो मकरालयः । विक्रमश्लाघनीयेन क्रमता गोष्पदीकृतः ।।
data.es: "You with your admirable prowess have reduced this ocean which is an abode of crocodiles stretching over a hundred yojanas to a cow's hoof mark.

data.v: न हि त्वां प्राकृतं मन्ये वनरं वनरर्षभ । यस्य ते नास्ति संत्रासो रावणान्नापि संभ्रमः ।।
data.es: "I do not think you are an ordinary monkey. You have no fear or excitement about Ravana. You are a bull among vanaras.

data.v: अर्हसे च कपिश्रेष्ठ मया समभिभाषितुम् । यद्यसि प्रेषितस्तेन रामेण विदितात्मना ।।
data.es: "O best of monkeys As you have been sent by Rama, the knower of the self, it is proper for me to converse with you.

data.v: प्रेषयिष्यति दुर्धर्षो रामो न ह्यपरीक्षितम् । पराक्रममविज्ञाय मत्सकाशं विशेषतः ।।
data.es: "The formidable Rama will not send any one specially to me without testing him or knowing his valour.

data.v: दिष्ट्या च कुशली रामो धर्मात्मा धर्मवत्सलः । लक्ष्मणश्च महातेजाः सुमित्रानन्दवर्धनः ।।
data.es: "To my luck, righteous Rama who abides in truth and glorious Lakshmana who enhances the joy of Sumitra are keepng well.

data.v: कुशली यदि काकुत्स्थः किं नु सागरमेखलाम् । महीं दहति कोपेन युगान्ताग्निरिवोत्थितः ।।
data.es: "Indeed if Kakutstha is well wherefore does he not burn the oceangirdled earth in his rage as (the earth is burnt) at the time of dissolution of the era?

data.v: अथ वा शक्तिमन्तौ तौ सुराणामपि निग्रहे । ममैव तु न दुःखानामस्ति मन्ये विपर्ययः ।।
data.es: "Both of them are capable of subduing even the gods. I think the reversal of my fate is reason for their inaction.

data.v: कच्चिच्च व्यथते रामः कच्चिन्न परिपत्यते । उत्तराणि च कार्याणि कुरुते पुरुषोत्तमः ।।
data.es: "Is Rama the greatest among men not depressed? Does he not feel helpless? He is (perhaps) taking necessary steps (for my recovery).

data.v: कच्चिन्न दीनः संभ्रान्तः कार्येषु च न मुह्यति । कच्चिन्पुरुषकार्याणि कुरुते नृपतेः सुतः ।।
data.es: "I suppose prince Rama is not too depressed or perplexed to attend to his work. He will (perhaps) be doing the duties expected of a manly person.

data.v: द्विविधं त्रिविधोपायमुपायमपि सेवते । विजिगीषुः सुहृत्कच्चिन्मित्रेषु च परंतपः ।।
data.es: "Tell me if Rama, scorcher of enemies, desirous of victory is following a twofold policy (confrontation and conciliation) A tough enemy cannot be defeated by following this method. A threefold strategy has to be adopted in this case (confrontation, conciliation and creation of dissension among his foes) to be victorious. I hope he is welldisposed to his friends and has a good team

data.v: कच्चिन्मित्राणि लभते मित्रैश्चाप्यभिगम्यते । कच्चित्कल्याणमित्रश्च मित्रैश्चापि पुरस्कृतः ।।
data.es: "I hope he is making new friends, who desire his friendship. Hopefully, Rama is well honoured by his allies.

data.v: कच्चिदाशास्ति देवानां प्रसादं पार्थिवात्मजः । कच्चित्पुरुषकारं च दैवं च प्रतिपद्यते ।।
data.es: "Does the prince ever seek the blessings of gods or fall back upon personal effort as well as providence?

data.v: कच्चिन्न विगतस्नेहो विवासान्मयि राघवः । कच्चिन्मां व्यसनादस्मान्मोक्षयिष्यति वानरः ।।
data.es: "I hope Rama is not devoid of love towards me by my separation. O Vanara, hope he will liberate me from this misery.

data.v: सुखानामुचितो नित्यमसुखानामनूचितः । दुःखमुत्तरमासाद्य कच्चिद्रामो न सीदति ।।
data.es: "I hope Rama who deserves happiness and not suffering has not become depressed now , having experienced a spate of sorrows.

data.v: कौसल्यायास्तथा कच्चित्सुमित्रायास्तथैव च । अभीक्ष्णं श्रूयते कच्चित्कुशलं भरतस्य च ।।
data.es: "I hope he regularly receives news about the welfare of Kausalya, Sumitra and Bharata.

data.v: मन्निमित्तेन मानार्हः कच्चिच्छोकेन राघवः । कच्चिन्नान्यमना रामः कच्चिन्मां तारयिष्यति ।।
data.es: "I hope respectable Rama is not too absentminded for being immersed in sorrow on my account. Hope he will save me.

data.v: कच्चिदक्षौहिणीं भीमां भरतो भ्रातृवत्सलः । ध्वजिनीं मन्त्रिभिर्गुप्तां प्रेषयिष्यति मत्कृते ।।
data.es: "Will Bharata, the devoted brother, send his formidable army of one akshavhini protected by ministers for my cause? I trust he will. (Akshauhini 109350 foot soldiers 65610 horse soldiers 21860 elephants soldiers on chariot)

data.v: वानराधिपतिः श्रीमान्सुग्रीवः कच्चिदेष्यति । मत्कृते हरिभिर्वीरैर्वृतो दन्तनखायुधैः ।।
data.es: "I trust that the illustrious Sugriva surrounded by valiant vanaras who use their teeth and nails as weapons will reach this place.

data.v: कच्चिच्च लक्ष्मणः शूरः सुमित्रानन्दवर्धनः । अस्त्रविच्छरजालेन राक्षसान्विधमिष्यति ।।
data.es: "Hope heroic Lakshmana, enhancer of the joy of Sumitra, who has mastered the use of weapons will blow away the demons through a network of arrows.

data.v: रौद्रेण कच्चिदस्त्रेण रामेण निहतं रणे । द्रक्ष्याम्यल्पेन कालेन रावणं ससुहृज्जनम् ।।
data.es: "Can I hope to see Ravana and his relatives slain in the battle by fiery weapons in a short time?

data.v: कच्चिन्न तद्धेमसमानवर्णं; तस्याननं पद्मसमानगन्धि । मया विना शुष्यति शोकदीनं; जलक्षये पद्ममिवातपेन ।।
data.es: "Hope, Rama's moonlike face without me with its golden complexion and lotus fragrance must not have been pale and withered with tears like the lotus in a pond scorched by the heat.

data.v: धर्मापदेशात्त्यजतश्च राज्यां; मां चाप्यरण्यं नयतः पदातिम् । नासीद्व्यथा यस्य न भीर्न शोकः; कच्चित्स धैर्यं हृदये करोति ।।
data.es: "Rama has given up sovereignty for the sake of establishing righteousness and led me into the forest on foot.He had not then felt any fear, anxiety or grief at heart.Rama showed patience, instead. Hope he retains them.

data.v: न चास्य माता न पिता न चान्यः; स्नेहाद्विशिष्टोऽस्ति मया समो वा । तावद्ध्यहं दूतजिजीविषेयं; यावत्प्रवृत्तिं शृणुयां प्रियस्य ।।
data.es: "His love for me is superior to his love for his father, mother or any one else. O messenger, I wish to survive till I hear any news from my dear lord."

data.v: इतीव देवी वचनं महार्थं; तं वानरेन्द्रं मधुरार्थमुक्त्वा । श्रोतुं पुनस्तस्य वचोऽभिरामं; रामार्थयुक्तं विरराम रामा ।।
data.es: The godlike lady, having spoken to the vanara leader in a very meaningful and sweet manner about her beloved Rama, she remained silent, waiting to hear Hanuman's attractive words of description of Rama once again.

data.v: सीताया वचनं श्रुत्वा मारुतिर्भीमविक्रमः । शिरस्यञ्जलिमाधाय वाक्यमुत्तरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Having heard Sita, Hanuman endowed with fearsome power placed his folded hands on his head and said this:

data.v: न त्वामिहस्थां जानीते रामः कमललोचनः । श्रुत्वैव तु वचो मह्यं क्षिप्रमेष्यति राघवः ।।
data.es: "O lotuseyed one Rama knows not that you are here. Therefore he has not taken you away immediately as did Indra to rescue his wife Sachi.

data.v: चमूं प्रकर्षन्महतीं हर्यृष्कगणसंकुलाम् । विष्टम्भयित्वा बाणौघैरक्षोभ्यं वरुणालयम् । करिष्यति पुरीं लङ्कां काकुत्स्थः शान्तराक्षसाम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यमतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: मसजभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतयभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जमयम]

data.es: "Kakutstha Rama will still the imperturbable abode of Varuna (ocean) by the torrent of his arrows and rid the city of Lanka of all the demons.

data.v: तत्र यद्यन्तरा मृत्युर्यदि देवाः सहासुराः । स्थास्यन्ति पथि रामस्य स तानपि वधिष्यति ।।
data.es: "Thereafter, whoever comes Rama's way, be it gods or demons or even death or any one else he will destroy them.

data.v: तवादर्शनजेनार्ये शोकेन स परिप्लुतः । न शर्म लभते रामः सिंहार्दित इव द्विपः ।।
data.es: "O noble lady not being able to see you, Rama is immersed in an ocean of sorrow, he has no solace like an elephant tormented by a lion.

data.v: दर्दरेण च ते देवि शपे मूलफलेन च । मलयेन च विन्ध्येन मेरुणा मन्दरेण च ।।
यथा सुनयनं वल्गु बिम्बौष्ठं चारुकुण्डलम् । मुखं द्रक्ष्यसि रामस्य पूर्णचन्द्रमिवोदितम् ।।
data.es: "O Sita I swear in the name of mountains like Malaya, Vindhya, Meru, and Dardura (the abodes of monkeys and bears) and by the roots and fruits as well (which are the food of vanaras). you will soon behold Rama with beautiful eyes, red lips like bimba fruit, lovely earrings and a countenance resembling the full moon.

data.v: क्षिप्रं द्रक्ष्यसि वैदेहि रामं प्रस्रवणे गिरौ । शतक्रतुमिवासीनं नाकपृष्ठस्य मूर्धनि ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi, you will soon see Rama seated on the Prasravana mountain just as Indra (who performed a hundred sacrifices) seated on the back of the king of elephants.

data.v: न मांसं राघवो भुङ्क्ते न चापि मधुसेवते । वन्यं सुविहितं नित्यं भक्तमश्नाति पञ्चमम् ।।
data.es: "Rama is not eating meat, nor drinking wine. He takes only the one fifth of a meal (sanctioned for an ascetic) available in the forest.

data.v: नैव दंशान्न मशकान्न कीटान्न सरीसृपान् । राघवोऽपनयेद्गत्रात्त्वद्गतेनान्तरात्मना ।।
data.es: "Since you left, Rama has been always thinking sincerely of you, no longer drives away flies or mosquitoes nor insects or serpents from his body (his mind entirely fixed on you).

data.v: नित्यं ध्यानपरो रामो नित्यं शोकपरायणः । नान्यच्चिन्तयते किंचित्स तु कामवशं गतः ।।
data.es: "Rama is always lost in thought. He is totally given to grief. Absorbed in love for you, he thinks of none else৷৷

data.v: अनिद्रः सततं रामः सुप्तोऽपि च नरोत्तमः । सीतेति मधुरां वाणीं व्याहरन्प्रतिबुध्यते ।।
data.es: "Rama, the best of men never goes to sleep and even if he drops off to sleep he mutters 'Sita, Sita' in a sweet voice in his sleep.

data.v: दृष्ट्वा फलं वा पुष्पं वा यच्चान्यत्स्त्रीमनोहरम् । बहुशो हा प्रियेत्येवं श्वसंस्त्वामभिभाषते ।।
data.es: "Sighing deeply whenever Rama sees a fruit or a flower or any such delightful thing, he remembers you and calls you out again and again, saying, 'alas, my darling '

data.v: स देवि नित्यं परितप्यमान;स्त्वामेव सीतेत्यभिभाषमाणः । धृतव्रतो राजसुतो महात्मा; तवैव लाभाय कृतप्रयत्नः ।।
data.es: "O divine lady prince Rama is ceaselessly suffering. He keeps talking to you in air. The determined Rama is only thinking of your recovery ".

data.v: सा रामसंकीर्तनवीतशोका; रामस्य शोकेन समानशोका । शरन्मुखेनाम्बुदशेषचन्द्रा; निशेव वैदेहसुता बभूव ।।
data.es: Her sorrow was mitigated by references made by Hanuman about Rama.She felt equally sad when she heard about Rama's agony. The princess from Videha appeared like a night at the advent of autumn, with the Moon looking partly muffled by clouds and partly bright.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे षट्त्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtysixth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: सीता तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा पूर्णचन्द्रनिभानना । हनूमन्तमुवाचेदं धर्मार्थसहितं वचः ।।
data.es: To the righteous words (about Rama's grief) of Hanuman, Sita with a face like the full moon replied :

data.v: अमृतं विषसंसृष्टं त्वया वानरभाषितम् । यच्च नान्यमना रामो यच्च शोकपरायणः ।।
data.es: "O vanara you have told me that Rama has his mind always fixed on me, not on others and you have also said that he is sad. It is like offering me poison mixed with nectar.

data.v: ऐश्वर्ये वा सुविस्तीर्णे व्यसने वा सुदारुणे । रज्ज्वेव पुरुषं बद्ध्वा कृतान्तः परिकर्षति ।।
data.es: "Death snatches a man tied with a cord, whether he is rolling in luxury or sinking in adversity.

data.v: विधिर्नूनमसंहार्यः प्राणिनां प्लवगोत्तम । सौमित्रिं मां च रामं च व्यसनैः पश्य मोहितान् ।।
data.es: "O best of vanaras surely it is not possible for living beings to overcome destiny. You see how Sri Rama, Saumitri, and my own self are all afflicted with grief.

data.v: शोकस्यास्य कदा पारं राघवोऽधिगमिष्यति । प्लवमानः परिश्रान्तो हतनौः सागरे यथा ।।
data.es: "When will Raghava reach the shore of this ocean of grief? He is like a man who has suffered a ship wreck, trying to swim?

data.v: राक्षसानां क्षयं कृत्वा सूदयित्वा च रावणम् । लङ्कामुन्मूलितां कृत्वा कदा द्रक्ष्यति मां पतिः ।।
data.es: "When will my husband see me after killing the demons including Ravana and uprooting Lanka?

data.v: स वाच्यः संत्वरस्वेति यावदेव न पूर्यते । अयं संवत्सरः कालस्तावद्धि मम जीवितम् ।।
data.es: "One year's time has been given (by Ravana) to me. Rama should be informed to be quick in reaching before the completion of the time limit and that I will survive till then only.

data.v: वर्तते दशमो मासो द्वौ तु शेषौ प्लवंगम । रावणेन नृशंसेन समयो यः कृतो मम ।।
data.es: "O vanara this is the end of the tenth month. Only two more months are left. This is the condition laid by the wicked Ravana in my case.

data.v: विभीषणेन च भ्रात्रा मम निर्यातनं प्रति । अनुनीतः प्रयत्नेन न च तत्कुरुते मतिम् ।।
data.es: "Vibhisana made efforts to advise Ravana for my restoration. But Ravana has not agreed to that.

data.v: मम प्रतिप्रदानं हि रावणस्य न रोचते । रावणं मार्गते संख्ये मृत्युः कालवशं गतम् ।।
data.es: "Ravana did not like to return me having fallen into the death trap. Death lies in wait for him in battle.

data.v: ज्येष्ठा कन्यानला नम विभीषणसुता कपे । तया ममैतदाख्यातं मात्रा प्रहितया स्वयम् ।।
data.es: "O vanara Nala the eldest daughter of Vibhisana sent by her mother came here personally and reported this to me.

data.v: अविन्ध्यो नाम मेधावी विद्वान्राक्षसपुंगवः । धृतिमाञ्शीलवान्वृद्धो रावणस्य सुसंमतः ।।
रामात्क्षयमनुप्राप्तं रक्षसां प्रत्यचोदयत् । न च तस्यापि दुष्टात्मा शृणोति वचनं हितम् ।।
आशंसेति हरिश्रेष्ठ क्षिप्रं मां प्राप्स्यते पतिः । अन्तरात्मा हि मे शुद्धस्तस्मिंश्च बहवो गुणाः ।।
data.es: "O eminent vanara no doubt my lord will soon reach this place. My pure conscience tells me that Rama has many virtues.
