data.v: उत्साहः पौरुषं सत्त्वमानृशंस्यं कृतज्ञता । विक्रमश्च प्रभावश्च सन्ति वानरराघवे ।।
data.es: "O vanara Rama is endowed with perseverance, manliness, prowess, kindness, gratitude, competence and power.

data.v: चतुर्दशसहस्राणि राक्षसानां जघान यः । जनस्थाने विना भ्रात्रा शत्रुः कस्तस्य नोद्विजेत् ।।
न स शक्यस्तुलयितुं व्यसनैः पुरुषर्षभः । अहं तस्यानुभावज्ञा शक्रस्येव पुलोमजा ।।
data.es: "O bull among men he will not be shaken by calamities. Just as Sachi, the daughter of Puloma knows Indra's might I know Rama's.

data.v: शरजालांशुमाञ्शूरः कपे रामदिवाकरः । शत्रुरक्षोमयं तोयमुपशोषं नयिष्यति ।।
data.es: "O monkey the valiant Rama is like the Sungod shoofing a dazzling volley of arrows which will dry up the sea of enemy forces."

data.v: इति संजल्पमानां तां रामार्थे शोककर्शिताम् । अश्रुसंपूर्णवदनामुवाच हनुमान्कपिः ।।
data.es: While Sita, tormented with grief on account of Rama was thus speaking, her eyes filled with tears, the monkey said:

data.v: श्रुत्वैव तु वचो मह्यं क्षिप्रमेष्यति राघवः । चमूं प्रकर्षन्महतीं हर्यृक्षगणसंकुलाम् ।।
data.es: "On hearing me Rama will reach soon with a huge army of vanaras and bears.

data.v: अथ वा मोचयिष्यामि तामद्यैव हि राक्षसात् । अस्माद्दुःखादुपारोह मम पृष्ठमनिन्दिते ।।
data.es: "O beautiful lady, if you please, I shall redeem you today itself from grief. You may ride on my back, O blameless lady.

data.v: त्वं हि पृष्ठगतां कृत्वा संतरिष्यामि सागरम् । शक्तिरस्ति हि मे वोढुं लङ्कामपि सरावणाम् ।।
data.es: "Placing you on my back I shall cross the ocean. Indeed, I have the capacity to carry the entire city of Lanka along with Ravana.

data.v: अहं प्रस्रवणस्थाय राघवायाद्य मैथिलि । प्रापयिष्यामि शक्राय हव्यं हुतमिवानलः ।।
data.es: "O Mythili Just as oblations offered to the sacred fire goes to Indra, I shall offer you today to Rama waiting on the Prasravana mountain.

data.v: द्रक्ष्यस्यद्यैव वैदेहि राघवं सहलक्ष्मणम् । व्यवसाय समायुक्तं विष्णुं दैत्यवधे यथा ।।
त्वद्दर्शनकृतोत्साहमाश्रमस्थं महाबलम् । पुरंदरमिवासीनं नागराजस्य मूर्धनि ।।
data.es: Mighty Rama staying in asram ill be enthused to see you seated on my back like Lord Purandara (Indra) seated on the back of the lord of elephants (Airavata)

data.v: पृष्ठमारोह मे देवि मा विकाङ्क्षस्व शोभने । योगमन्विच्छ रामेण शशाङ्केनेव रोहिणी ।।
data.es: "O god like lady climb up my back. Do not be reluctant. Join Rama just as Rohini unites with the Moon, O beautiful one

data.v: कथयन्तीव चन्द्रेण सूर्येणेव सुवर्चला । मत्पृष्ठमधिरुह्य त्वं तराकाशमहार्णवम् ।।
data.es: "Climb on my back and cross the ocean through space in the flaming light, conversing with Moon and Sun.

data.v: न हि मे संप्रयातस्य त्वामितो नयतोऽङ्गने । अनुगन्तुं गतिं शक्ताः सर्वे लङ्कानिवासिनः ।।
data.es: "O beautiful lady it is not possible for all the inhabitants of Lanka together to follow me while I carry you from this place.

data.v: यथैवाहमिह प्राप्तस्तथैवाहमसंशयम् । यास्यामि पश्य वैदेहि त्वामुद्यम्य विहायसं ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi just as I reached here I shall beyond doubt take you on my back in the same way across the sky without any difficulty. See.

data.v: मैथिली तु हरिश्रेष्ठाच्छ्रुत्वा वचनमद्भुतम् । हर्षविस्मितसर्वाङ्गी हनूमन्तमथाब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: When Mythili heard the wonderful proposal from Hanuman, the best of vanaras, she experienced immense joy in every limb of her body and said:

data.v: हनूमन्दूरमध्वनं कथं मां वोढुमिच्छसि । तदेव खलु ते मन्ये कपित्वं हरियूथप ।।
data.es: "Hanuman how do you intend to carry me to such a distant place? Indeed, it is your monkey nature, I suppose.

data.v: कथं वाल्पशरीरस्त्वं मामितो नेतुमिच्छसि । सकाशं मानवेन्द्रस्य भर्तुर्मे प्लवगर्षभ ।।
data.es: "O bull among monkeys you have such a small body. How can you intend to carry me from here to my husband, the lord of men"?

data.v: सीताया वचनं श्रुत्वा हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । चिन्तयामास लक्ष्मीवान्नवं परिभवं कृतम् ।।
data.es: On hearing Sita's new belittling statement about him, Hanuman, the illustrious son of the Windgod reflected:

data.v: न मे जानाति सत्त्वं वा प्रभावं वासितेक्षणा । तस्मात्पश्यतु वैदेही यद्रूपं मम कामतः ।।
data.es: 'Blackeyed Sita is not aware of my strength or my power. Therefore let her see the real (huge) form that I can assume at my free will'.

data.v: इति संचिन्त्य हनुमांस्तदा प्लवगसत्तमः । दर्शयामास वैदेह्याः स्वरूपमरिमर्दनः ।।
data.es: Thinking thus, Hanuman, the noble monkey, crusher of enemies, started revealing his real form to Vaidehi.

data.v: स तस्मात्पादपाद्धीमानाप्लुत्य प्लवगर्षभः । ततो वर्धितुमारेभे सीताप्रत्ययकारणात् ।।
data.es: The wise bull among monkeys, jumped down from the tree and started growing in size in order to instil confidence in Sita.

data.v: मेरुमन्दारसंकाशो बभौ दीप्तानलप्रभः । अग्रतो व्यवतस्थे च सीताया वानरर्षभः ।।
data.es: Hanuman, the foremost of the vanaras resembling mount Meru or Mandara stood there glowing like blazing fire in front of Sita.

data.v: हरिः पर्वतसंकाशस्ताम्रवक्त्रो महाबलः । वज्रदंष्ट्रनखो भीमो वैदेहीमिदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Resembling a mountain in size, with a red face, with teeth and nails strong like diamond, the vanara in dreadful form said to Vaidehi:

data.v: सपर्वतवनोद्देशां साट्टप्राकारतोरणाम् । लङ्कामिमां सनथां वा नयितुं शक्तिरस्ति मे ।।
data.es: "I have the capacity to carry away this entire Lanka uprooted with its mountains, gardens, forts, ramparts and gateways along with the king.

data.v: तदवस्थाप्य तां बुद्धिरलं देवि विकाङ्क्षया । विशोकं कुरु वैदेहि राघवं सहलक्ष्मणम् ।।
data.es: "O queen it is enough. Give up this unworthy attitude. Be stable. O Vaidehi, rid Lakshmana and Rama of grief".

data.v: तं दृष्ट्वाचलसंकाशमुवाच जनकात्मजा । पद्मपत्रविशालाक्षी मारुतस्यौरसं सुतम् ।।
data.es: Seeing the son of Maruta in dreadful form, the broad lotus petaleyed daughter of Janaka with eyes as large as lotus petals replied :

data.v: तव सत्त्वं बलं चैव विजानामि महाकपे । वायोरिव गतिं चापि तेजश्चाग्निरिवाद्भुतम् ।।
data.es: "O great monkey I have understood your strength and power. Your speed is like the Windgod's and your power is astonishing and splendid.

data.v: प्राकृतोऽन्यः कथं चेमां भूमिमागन्तुमर्हति । उदधेरप्रमेयस्य पारं वानरपुंगव ।।
data.es: "O chief of vanaras how could an ordinary person be capable of reaching this land on far off shore of the immeasurable ocean?

data.v: जानामि गमने शक्तिं नयने चापि ते मम । अवश्यं साम्प्रधार्याशु कार्यसिद्धिरिहात्मनः ।।
data.es: "I know you are capable of carrying me on your journey. I am sure about the quick success of your mission which has been carried out after careful planning.

data.v: अयुक्तं तु कपिश्रेष्ठ मया गन्तुं त्वया सह । वायुवेगसवेगस्य वेगो मां मोहयेत्तव ।।
data.es: "O sinless and foremost monkey going with you is not proper for me. Your windlike speed will render me unconscious.

data.v: अहमाकाशमासक्ता उपर्युपरि सागरम् । प्रपतेयं हि ते पृष्ठाद्भयाद्वेगेन गच्छतः ।।
data.es: "When you fly over the ocean in the sky speedily I may tumble down from your back by your speed out of fear.

data.v: पतिता सागरे चाहं तिमिनक्रझषाकुले । भयेयमाशु विवशा यादसामन्नमुत्तमम् ।।
न च शक्ष्ये त्वया सार्धं गन्तुं शत्रुविनाशन । कलत्रवति संदेहस्त्वय्यपि स्यादसंशयम् ।।
data.es: "O destroyer of foes, it is not possible for me to go with you. Further, when you are burdened with a woman you will also fall into danger (because of me), no doubt.

data.v: ह्रियमाणां तु मां दृष्ट्वा राक्षसा भीमविक्रमाः । अनुगच्छेयुरादिष्टा रावणेन दुरात्मना ।।
data.es: "When I am seen (while being carried away) by the demons of fearsome valour they will pursue you, ordered by the wicked Ravana.

data.v: तैस्त्वं परिवृतः शूरैः शूलमुद्गर पाणिभिः । भवेस्त्वं संशयं प्राप्तो मया वीर कलत्रवान् ।।
data.es: "O heroic monkey as the warriors armed with spears and maces surround you and attack, your life will be in danger, because of me.

data.v: सायुधा बहवो व्योम्नि राक्षसास्त्वं निरायुधः । कथं शक्ष्यसि संयातुं मां चैव परिरक्षितुम् ।।
data.es: "The demons are in large number and they will be armed with weapons. You are unarmed. How can you fight and protect me?

data.v: युध्यमानस्य रक्षोभिस्ततस्तैः क्रूरकर्मभिः । प्रपतेयं हि ते पृष्ठद्भयार्ता कपिसत्तम ।।
data.es: "O noble monkey while you are engaged in fighting with those demons of wicked deeds, I may drop down out of fear.

data.v: अथ रक्षांसि भीमानि महान्ति बलवन्ति च । कथंचित्साम्पराये त्वां जयेयुः कपिसत्तम ।।
data.es: "O noble monkey the massive, fearsome and powerful demons may defeat you in the fight in any way.

data.v: अथ वा युध्यमानस्य पतेयं विमुखस्य ते । पतितां च गृहीत्वा मां नयेयुः पापराक्षसाः ।।
data.es: "Or else, while you are engaged in fighting and turn your attention the other way I might fall down and the sinful ogres may bear me away.

data.v: मां वा हरेयुस्त्वद्धस्ताद्विशसेयुरथापि वा । अव्यवस्थौ हि दृश्येते युद्धे जयपराजयौ ।।
data.es: "They may snatch me away from your hands or cut me to pieces. Success or defeat is uncertain in a war.

data.v: अहं वापि विपद्येयं रक्षोभिरभितर्जिता । त्वत्प्रयत्नो हरिश्रेष्ठ भवेन्निष्फल एव तु ।।
data.es: "In such a case, caught and intimidated by the demons I may die. Then your efforts will be wasted.

data.v: कामं त्वमपि पर्याप्तो निहन्तुं सर्वराक्षसान् । राघवस्य यशो हीयेत्त्वया शस्तैस्तु राक्षसैः ।।
data.es: "It may be that you can kill all the demons but by such an act the fame of Rama will be diminished. (He cannot give his strength a trial)

data.v: अथ वादाय रक्षांसि न्यस्येयुः संवृते हि माम् । यत्र ते नाभिजानीयुर्हरयो नापि राघवः ।।
data.es: "Or else, the ogres will carry me and conceal me in a secret place which the vanaras or Rama and Lakshmana may not know.

data.v: आरम्भस्तु मदर्थोऽयं ततस्तव निरर्थकः । त्वया हि सह रामस्य महानागमने गुणः ।।
मयि जीवितमायत्तं राघवस्य महात्मनः । भ्रातॄणां च महाबाहो तव राजकुलस्य च ।।
data.es: "O strongarmed Hanuman your life and the life of the great self Rama, of his brother, and relatives of your king is dependent upon my survival.

data.v: तौ निराशौ मदर्थे तु शोकसंतापकर्शितौ । सह सर्वर्क्षहरिभिस्त्यक्ष्यतः प्राणसंग्रहम् ।।
data.es: "Both Rama and Lakshmana who are emaciated with sorrow and suffering on account of me will give up their lives along with vanaras and bears.

data.v: भर्तुर्भक्तिं पुरस्कृत्य रामादन्यस्य वानर । नाहं स्प्रष्टुं पदा गात्रमिच्छेयं वानरोत्तम ।।
data.es: "O chief of vanaras I cherish my devotion towards Rama alone and not touch the body of any other man.

data.v: यदहं गात्रसंस्पर्शं रावणस्य गता बलात् । अनीशा किं करिष्यामि विनाथा विवशा सती ।।
data.es: "I had no control over myself. I was helpless and my husband was not present when I had to bear the touch of Ravana's limbs. What can I do?

data.v: यदि रामो दशग्रीवमिह हत्वा सराक्षसं । मामितो गृह्य गच्छेत तत्तस्य सदृशं भवेत् ।।
data.es: "It will be proper if Rama comes here, kills Ravana along with all his relations and takes me away.

data.v: श्रुता हि दृष्टाश्च मया पराक्रमा; महात्मनस्तस्य रणावमर्दिनः । न देवगन्धर्वभुजंगराक्षसा; भवन्ति रामेण समा हि संयुगे ।।
data.es: "I have seen and heard about Rama's conquest of enemies and his valiant deeds in war. Indeed, gods gandharvas, nagas or even demons cannot match him in war.

data.v: समीक्ष्य तं संयति चित्रकार्मुकं; महाबलं वासवतुल्यविक्रमम् । सलक्ष्मणं को विषहेत राघवं; हुताशनं दीप्तमिवानिलेरितम् ।।
सलक्ष्मणं राघवमाजिमर्दनं; दिशागजं मत्तमिव व्यवस्थितम् । सहेत को वानरमुख्य संयुगे; युगान्तसूर्यप्रतिमं शरार्चिषम् ।।
data.es: "O chief of vanaras who can withstand Rama accompanied by Lakshmana, the conqueror of enemies? His arrows resemble the rays of the Sun at the time of the deluge, steady like the elephants who support the quarters of the earth.

data.v: स मे हरिश्रेष्ठ सलक्ष्मणं पतिं; सयूथपं क्षिप्रमिहोपपादय । चिराय रामं प्रति शोककर्शितां; कुरुष्व मां वानरमुख्य हर्षिताम् ।।
ततः स कपिशार्दूलस्तेन वाक्येन हर्षितः । सीतामुवाच तच्छ्रुत्वा वाक्यं वाक्यविशारदः ।।
data.es: Satisfied with the words of Sita, the tiger among monkeys, who was eloquent in speech said:

data.v: युक्तरूपं त्वया देवि भाषितं शुभदर्शने । सदृशं स्त्रीस्वभावस्य साध्वीनां विनयस्य च ।।
data.es: "O queen O lady of auspicious appearance your words are most appropriate to and characteristic of a modest virtuous woman.

data.v: स्त्रीत्वं न तु समर्थं हि सागरं व्यतिवर्तितुम् । मामधिष्ठाय विस्तीर्णं शतयोजनमायतम् ।।
data.es: "It may not be possible for a woman to cross on my back the vast ocean stretching over a hundred yojanas. It is not possible for a woman.

data.v: द्वितीयं कारणं यच्च ब्रवीषि विनयान्विते । रामादन्यस्य नार्हामि संस्पर्शमिति जानकि ।।
data.es: "O humble lady the second reason given by you, 'I ought not to touch a person other than Rama' is well said and worthy of you, being the wife of the great soul. Who else can speak such words?

data.v: एतत्ते देवि सदृशं पत्न्यास्तस्य महात्मनः । का ह्यन्या त्वामृते देवि ब्रूयाद्वचनमीदृशम् ।।
data.es: "O humble lady the second reason given by you, 'I ought not to touch a person other than Rama' is well said and worthy of you, being the wife of the great soul. Who else can speak such words?

data.v: श्रोष्यते चैव काकुत्स्थः सर्वं निरवशेषतः । चेष्टितं यत्त्वया देवि भाषितं मम चाग्रतः ।।
data.es: "O queen Kakutstha Rama will hear from me fully all that has been said and done by you in my presence without any omission.

data.v: कारणैर्बहुभिर्देवि राम प्रियचिकीर्षया । स्नेहप्रस्कन्नमनसा मयैतत्समुदीरितम् ।।
data.es: "O queen my heart is drenched with love for Rama and desires to please him for many reasons. Therefore these words have been spoken by me.

data.v: लङ्काया दुष्प्रवेशत्वाद्दुस्तरत्वान्महोदधेः । सामर्थ्यादात्मनश्चैव मयैतत्समुदाहृतम् ।।
data.es: "Crossing the ocean and entering Lanka are difficult. But I accomplished it. Hence my proposal.

data.v: इच्छामि त्वां समानेतुमद्यैव रघुबन्धुना । गुरुस्नेहेन भक्त्या च नान्यथा तदुदाहृतम् ।।
data.es: "I offered to take you today itself out of my love and devotion to Rama with a desire to unite you with him and not with any other intention.

data.v: यदि नोत्सहसे यातुं मया सार्धमनिन्दिते । अभिज्ञानं प्रयच्छ त्वं जानीयाद्राघवो हि यत् ।।
data.es: "O blameless lady If you wish not to accompany me you may give me a token of identification to let Rama know about my coming here and seeing you".

data.v: एवमुक्ता हनुमता सीता सुरसुतोपमा । उवाच वचनं मन्दं बाष्पप्रग्रथिताक्षरम् ।।
data.es: Having heard Hanuman, Sita, a child of god, said these words in a low tone. Choked with tears, 'Carry this token of identity to my dear husband':

data.v: इदं श्रेष्ठमभिज्ञानं ब्रूयास्त्वं तु मम प्रियम् । शैलस्य चित्रकूटस्य पादे पूर्वोत्तरे तदा ।।
तापसाश्रमवासिन्याः प्राज्यमूलफलोदके । तस्मिन्सिद्धाश्रमे देशे मन्दाकिन्या अदूरतः ।।
data.es: 'Long ago we were staying at Siddhasrama. This hermitage was situated to the northeast at the foot of Chitrakuta mountain which was not far from the river Mandakini. It had abundant roots, fruits and water. You sported with me in the gardens which were fragrant with many types of flowers and ponds. You sat down on my lap with wet clothes in the hermitage'.

data.v: तस्योपवनषण्डेषु नानापुष्पसुगन्धिषु । विहृत्य सलिलक्लिन्ना तवाङ्के समुपाविशम् ।।
पर्यायेण प्रसुप्तश्च ममाङ्के भरताग्रजः ।।
data.es: 'Totally exhausted I slept on your lap for a long time, and in turn you slept on my lap later.

data.v: ततो मांससमायुक्तो वायसः पर्यतुण्डयत् । तमहं लोष्टमुद्यम्य वारयामि स्म वायसं ।।
data.es: 'Then a crow greedy of flesh began to peck my bossom with its beak. I took a clod of earth and warded him off.

data.v: दारयन्स च मां काकस्तत्रैव परिलीयते । न चाप्युपरमन्मांसाद्भक्षार्थी बलिभोजनः ।।
data.es: 'The crow was an eater of offerings, hungry for food began to peck me again and again for flesh.He did not stop.

data.v: उत्कर्षन्त्यां च रशनां क्रुद्धायां मयि पक्षिणे । स्रंसमाने च वसने ततो दृष्टा त्वया ह्यहम् ।।
data.es: 'My upper cloth was slipping. I was trying to pull up my waist string angrily when you saw me.

data.v: त्वया विहसिता चाहं क्रुद्धा संलज्जिता तदा । भक्ष्य गृद्धेन कालेन दारिता त्वामुपागता ।।
data.es: 'Then you made fun of me, and I became angry. I was abashed. Torn by the voracious bird I sought your shelter.

data.v: आसीनस्य च ते श्रान्ता पुनरुत्सङ्गमाविशम् । क्रुध्यन्ती च प्रहृष्टेन त्वयाहं परिसान्त्विता ।।
data.es: 'Exhausted, I sat on your lap again. Seeing my angry face you pacified me. You were happy (to see me draw close).

data.v: बाष्पपूर्णमुखी मन्दं चक्षुषी परिमार्जती । लक्षिताहं त्वया नाथ वायसेन प्रकोपिता ।।
data.es: 'O lord when I was angered by the crow and my face was filled with tears, you marked me wiping my eyes.

data.v: आशीविष इव क्रुद्धः श्वसान्वाक्यमभाषथाः । केन ते नागनासोरु विक्षतं वै स्तनान्तरम् । कः क्रीडति सरोषेण पञ्चवक्त्रेण भोगिना ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ररयभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: यजतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततत], अज्ञातम् [१२: तसतत]

data.es: 'O Sita with a beautiful lap like an elephant trunk by whom is your bosom wounded? Who is sporting with an angry fivehooded snake?

data.v: वीक्षमाणस्ततस्तं वै वायसं समवैक्षथाः । नखैः सरुधिरैस्तीक्ष्णैर्मामेवाभिमुखं स्थितम् ।।
data.es: 'Then looking around, you saw the crow facing me with sharp, bloodstained claws.

data.v: पुत्रः किल स शक्रस्य वायसः पततां वरः । धरान्तरचरः शीघ्रं पवनस्य गतौ समः ।।
data.es: 'This crow was the best of birds. He was surely Indra's son who had covered a long distance with great speed and his speed was like the Windgod's.

data.v: ततस्तस्मिन्महाबाहुः कोपसंवर्तितेक्षणः । वायसे कृतवान्क्रूरां मतिं मतिमतां वर ।।
data.es: 'Then you, the strongarmed and best among the wise, your eyeballs rolling in fury, made up your mind about the cruel crow.

data.v: स दर्भसंस्तराद्गृह्य ब्रह्मणोऽस्त्रेण योजयः । स दीप्त इव कालाग्निर्जज्वालाभिमुखो द्विजम् ।।
data.es: 'Taking out a blade of darbha grass from your mat, you invoked the weapon of Brahma by reciting the mantra. Then you discharged it which blazed like the fire of death and went spearheading towards the crow.

data.v: चिक्षेपिथ प्रदीप्तां तामिषीकां वायसं प्रति । अनुसृष्टस्तदा कालो जगाम विविधां गतिम् । त्राणकाम इमं लोकं सर्वं वै विचचार ह ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जसयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यमभभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: तरतम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जनतम]

data.es: 'Then that crow flew to many places seeking asylum all over the universe chased by the blade of grass.

data.v: स पित्रा च परित्यक्तः सुरैः सर्वैर्महर्षिभिः । त्रीँल्लोकान्संपरिक्रम्य त्वामेव शरणं गतः ।।
data.es: 'Then the crow went round all the three worlds, having been rejected by his father Indra, including all the sages and gods. Refused by all he came back to Rama seeking shelter.

data.v: तं त्वं निपतितं भूमौ शरण्यः शरणागतम् । वधार्हमपि काकुत्स्थ कृपया पर्यपालयः । न शर्म लब्ध्वा लोकेषु त्वामेव शरणं गतः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: सरजभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरनत], अज्ञातम् [१२: ममनर], अज्ञातम् [१२: तसतत]

data.es: 'Seeing the crow fallen on the ground, O Kakutstha, you who are a saviour of those who seek refuge saved him out of compassion, even though he deserved to be killed.

data.v: परिद्यूनं विषण्णं च स त्वमायान्तमुक्तवान् । मोघं कर्तुं न शक्यं तु ब्राह्ममस्त्रं तदुच्यताम् ।।
data.es: 'Rama, you saw the crow in pain and despondency who returned to you and said that it is not possible to make Brahma's weapon ineffectual.You may tell now. (what should be done.)

data.v: ततस्तस्याक्षि काकस्य हिनस्ति स्म स दक्षिणम् ।।
data.es: 'O Rama since a divine weapon cannot be withdrawn, it did strike his right eye'.

data.v: स ते तदा नमस्कृत्वा राज्ञे दशरथाय च । त्वया वीर विसृष्टस्तु प्रतिपेदे स्वमालयम् ।।
data.es: 'That crow offered salutations to you Rama and king Dasaratha, thereafter took permission and went to his own dwelling.

data.v: मत्कृते काकमात्रेऽपि ब्रह्मास्त्रं समुदीरितम् । कस्माद्यो मां हरत्त्वत्तः क्षमसे तं महीपते ।।
data.es: '(Addressing Rama as though he was present before her, Sita said) 'O lord of the earth for my sake you released the weapon of Brahma on a crow. What makes you excuse him who has abducted me?

data.v: स कुरुष्व महोत्साहं कृपां मयि नरर्षभ । आनृशंस्यं परो धर्मस्त्वत्त एव मया श्रुतः ।।
data.es: 'O bull among men you are so loving to me. I am like an orphan. Be kind to me. She who has found her lord in you stays without a protector.

data.v: जानामि त्वां महावीर्यं महोत्साहं महाबलम् । अपारपारमक्षोभ्यं गाम्भीर्यात्सागरोपमम् । भर्तारं ससमुद्राया धरण्या वासवोपमम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जरजम], अज्ञातम् [१२: मरतम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: मरयत]

data.es: 'O my supreme lord I know you are kind, righteous, valiant, vigroous, mighty. You are boundless, calm and deep like the ocean. You are lord of earth and the seas and compeer of Vasava. I have heard from you that motiveless compassion is the best way to make one righteous.

data.v: एवमस्त्रविदां श्रेष्ठः सत्त्ववान्बलवानपि । किमर्थमस्त्रं रक्षःसु न योजयसि राघव ।।
data.es: 'Even though you are an expert in the use of weapons, truthful and strong. (Yet) why are you not using weapons aganst the demons?'

data.v: न नागा नापि गन्धर्वा नासुरा न मरुद्गणाः । रामस्य समरे वेगं शक्ताः प्रति समाधितुम् ।।
data.es: (Now Sita turns to Hanuman and says) "In war serpents, gandharvas, demons or Marutas cannot withstand the speed of Rama's arrows and hit back.

data.v: तस्या वीर्यवतः कश्चिद्यद्यस्ति मयि संभ्रमः । किमर्थं न शरैस्तीक्ष्णैः क्षयं नयति राक्षसान् ।।
data.es: "Does Rama have a little anxiety about me? If he has, why does he, a disciplined hero, not put an end to the demons with his sharp arrows?

data.v: भ्रातुरादेशमादाय लक्ष्मणो वा परंतपः । कस्य हेतोर्न मां वीरः परित्राति महाबलः ।।
data.es: "Or, why does the mighty hero, Lakshmana, who is a scorcher of enemies, not come to my rescue taking the orders from his brother?

data.v: यदि तौ पुरुषव्याघ्रौ वाय्विन्द्रसमतेजसौ । सुराणामपि दुर्धर्षो किमर्थं मामुपेक्षतः ।।
data.es: "Both Rama and Lakshmana are tigers among men who resemble wind and fire in power and have the unassailability of the gods. Wherefore are they disregarding me?.

data.v: ममैव दुष्कृतं किंचिन्महदस्ति न संशयः । समर्थावपि तौ यन्मां नावेक्षेते परंतपौ ।।
data.es: "Perhaps I must have committed an atrocious sin. There is no doubt. For although both of them are scorchers of enemies, they deliver me not."

data.v: कौसल्या लोकभर्तारं सुषुवे यं मनस्विनी । तं ममार्थे सुखं पृच्छ शिरसा चाभिवादय ।।
data.es: "Bow to Rama and offer salutations on my behalf. Inquiries concerning his welfare should be addressed to Rama, whom virtuous Kausalya bore as a son.

data.v: स्रजश्च सर्वरत्नानि प्रिया याश्च वराङ्गनाः । ऐश्वर्यं च विशालायां पृथिव्यामपि दुर्लभम् ।।
पितरं मातरं चैव संमान्याभिप्रसाद्य च । अनुप्रव्रजितो रामं सुमित्रा येन सुप्रजाः । आनुकूल्येन धर्मात्मा त्यक्त्वा सुखमनुत्तमम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यरयय], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसभम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यमनर], अज्ञातम् [१२: सररत]

data.v: अनुगच्छति काकुत्स्थं भ्रातरं पालयन्वने । सिंहस्कन्धो महाबाहुर्मनस्वी प्रियदर्शनः ।।
पितृवद्वर्तते रामे मातृवन्मां समाचरन् । ह्रियमाणां तदा वीरो न तु मां वेद लक्ष्मणः ।।
वृद्धोपसेवी लक्ष्मीवाञ्शक्तो न बहुभाषिता । राजपुत्रः प्रियश्रेष्ठः सदृशः श्वशुरस्य मे ।।
data.es: "Heroic Lakshmana, did not know while I was borne away. He is prosperous, foremost in serving elders. He is energetic and reserved in his speech like my fatherinlaw. He is a prince dear (to his brother).

data.v: मत्तः प्रियतरो नित्यं भ्राता रामस्य लक्ष्मणः । नियुक्तो धुरि यस्यां तु तामुद्वहति वीर्यवान् ।।
data.es: "Rama's brother Lakshmana is always dear to me. Heroic Lakshmana will discharge whichever responsibility is entrusted to him.

data.v: यं दृष्ट्वा राघवो नैव वृद्धमार्यमनुस्मरत् । स ममार्थाय कुशलं वक्तव्यो वचनान्मम । मृदुर्नित्यं शुचिर्दक्षः प्रियो रामस्य लक्ष्मणः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: मसनम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: मररज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जभतस]

data.es: "He is Lakshmana for whose care and support Rama did not miss the noble king Dasaratha (during exile). Convey him my words of enquiry about his wellbeing.

data.v: इदं ब्रूयाश्च मे नाथं शूरं रामं पुनः पुनः । जीवितं धारयिष्यामि मासं दशरथात्मज । ऊर्ध्वं मासान्न जीवेयं सत्येनाहं ब्रवीमि ते ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यमतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: तससम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरमम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततत]

data.es: "I will hold on to life only for a month. Beyond, I will not survive. I swear by truth. You may tell this to Rama.

data.v: रावणेनोपरुद्धां मां निकृत्या पापकर्मणा । त्रातुमर्हसि वीर त्वं पातालादिव कौशिकीम् ।।
data.es: "O heroic Rama just as Kausik was rescued from the underworld it behoves you to deliver me from imprisonment of wicked Ravana".

data.v: ततो वस्त्रगतं मुक्त्वा दिव्यं चूडामणिं शुभम् । प्रदेयो राघवायेति सीता हनुमते ददौ ।।
data.es: Then Sita took out the exquisite and auspicious Chudamani worn on the head, untied from her clothes and gave it to Hanuman to be presented to Rama.

data.v: प्रतिगृह्य ततो वीरो मणिरत्नमनुत्तमम् । अङ्गुल्या योजयामास न ह्यस्या प्राभवद्भुजः ।।
data.es: Then Hanuman, taking the extraordinary jewel and placed it on his finger as it was not fitting to his arm.

data.v: मणिरत्नं कपिवरः प्रतिगृह्याभिवाद्य च । सीतां प्रदक्षिणं कृत्वा प्रणतः पार्श्वतः स्थितः ।।
data.es: Having recieved the jewel from Sita and circumambulated her, Hanuman offered salutations to her and stood by her.

data.v: हर्षेण महता युक्तः सीतादर्शनजेन सः । हृदयेन गतो रामं शरीरेण तु विष्ठितः ।।
data.es: Hanuman stood there physically, with great joy gazing at Sita, but mentally he was with Rama.

data.v: मणिवरमुपगृह्य तं महार्हं; जनकनृपात्मजया धृतं प्रभावात् । गिरिवरपवनावधूतमुक्तः; सुखितमनाः प्रतिसंक्रमं प्रपेदे ।।
data.es: Having received the most precious jewel from the daughter of Janaka, Hanuman prepared to return like a mountain released from the impact of the wind.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे अष्टत्रिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtyeighth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: मणिं दत्त्वा ततः सीता हनूमन्तमथाब्रवीत् । अभिज्ञानमभिज्ञातमेतद्रामस्य तत्त्वतः ।।
data.es: Sita gave the jewel to Hanuman and said, "This signet ornament is known to Rama very well".

data.v: मणिं तु दृष्ट्वा रामो वै त्रयाणां संस्मरिष्यति । वीरो जनन्या मम च राज्ञो दशरथस्य च ।।
data.es: "Seeing this jewel,Rama will recall three of us, my mother, myself and the king Dasaratha" (as this was given by her mother at her marriage.)

data.v: स भूयस्त्वं समुत्साहे चोदितो हरिसत्तम । अस्मिन्कार्यसमारम्भे प्रचिन्तय यदुत्तरम् ।।
data.es: "Great Hanuman you are enthused now. You may think over the future course of action.

data.v: त्वमस्मिन्कार्यनिर्योगे प्रमाणं हरिसत्तम । तस्य चिन्तय यो यत्नो दुःखक्षयकरो भवेत् ।।
data.es: "O best of monkeys it is your responsibility to carry out this task. O Hanuman think carefully of that. Take the initiative to reduce my suffering. I am confident that you can do it."

data.v: स तथेति प्रतिज्ञाय मारुतिर्भीमविक्रमः । शिरसावन्द्य वैदेहीं गमनायोपचक्रमे ।।
data.es: Having heard Sita, Hanuman endowed with fearsome power placed his folded hands on his head and said this:

data.v: ज्ञात्वा संप्रस्थितं देवी वानरं मारुतात्मजम् । बाष्पगद्गदया वाचा मैथिली वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: The noble lady, Sita, having been fully convinced about Hanuman and realising that he is about to start, her voice was choked with tears. She said these words:

data.v: कुशलं हनुमन्ब्रूयाः सहितौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । सुग्रीवं च सहामात्यं वृद्धान्सर्वांश्च वानरान् ।।
data.es: "O Hanuman the great communicate my welfare to both Rama and Lakshmana, to Sugriva, his ministers, elderly vanaras in righteous order.

data.v: यथा च स महाबाहुर्मां तारयति राघवः । अस्माद्दुःखाम्बुसंरोधात्त्वं समाधातुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: "You must pacify the strongarmed Rama in a manner by which he will help me to cross the ocean of grief and rlieve me.

data.v: जीवन्तीं मां यथा रामः संभावयति कीर्तिमान् । तत्त्वया हनुमन्वाच्यं वाचा धर्ममवाप्नुहि ।।
data.es: "Let the illustrious Rama take me alive. Help me with your (persuasive) words and you will acquire merit.

data.v: नित्यमुत्साहयुक्ताश्च वाचः श्रुत्वा मयेरिताः । वर्धिष्यते दाशरथेः पौरुषं मदवाप्तये ।।
data.es: "On hearing your ever spirited words his manliness to get me back will be charged.

data.v: मत्संदेशयुता वाचस्त्वत्तः श्रुत्वैव राघवः । पराक्रमविधिं वीरो विधिवत्संविधास्यति ।।
सीतायास्तद्वचः श्रुत्वा हनुमान्मारुतात्मजः । शिरस्यञ्जलिमाधाय वाक्यमुत्तरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Hearing the words of Sita who was overwhelmed with grief, the monkey leader Hanuman felt sad and thus spoke comforting her:

data.v: क्षिप्रमेष्यति काकुत्स्थो हर्यृक्षप्रवरैर्वृतः । यस्ते युधि विजित्यारीञ्शोकं व्यपनयिष्यति ।।
data.es: "Kakutstha Rama, accompanied by vanaras and bears will reach here soon and conquer the enemies in war and relieve your grief.

data.v: न हि पश्यामि मर्त्येषु नामरेष्वसुरेषु वा । यस्तस्य वमतो बाणान्स्थातुमुत्सहतेऽग्रतः ।।
data.es: "I do not see any one among humans or demons or even among gods who can face his arrows when released.

data.v: अप्यर्कमपि पर्जन्यमपि वैवस्वतं यमम् । स हि सोढुं रणे शक्तस्तवहेतोर्विशेषतः ।।
data.es: "Indeed, Rama is capable of conquering even the Sungod, or the raingod or Yama (the son of the Sun) specially for your sake.

data.v: स हि सागरपर्यन्तां महीं शासितुमीहते । त्वन्निमित्तो हि रामस्य जयो जनकनन्दिनि ।।
data.es: "Rama is fit to rule the entire earth surrounded by the ocean. O delight of Janaka he will succeed in serving your cause."

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा सम्यक्सत्यं सुभाषितम् । जानकी बहु मेनेऽथ वचनं चेदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: On hearing the truthful, proper, pleasing words by Hanuman whom she held in great esteem, Sita said this:

data.v: ततस्तं प्रस्थितं सीता वीक्षमाणा पुनः पुनः । भर्तुः स्नेहान्वितं वाक्यं सौहार्दादनुमानयत् ।।
data.es: Sita again and again looked at Hanuman who was about to start. She made him understand her words conveying her love for Rama.

data.v: यदि वा मन्यसे वीर वसैकाहमरिंदम । कस्मिंश्चित्संवृते देशे विश्रान्तः श्वो गमिष्यसि ।।
data.es: "O destroyer of enemies if you think of halting for a day you may do so in a solitary location and leave tomorrow.

data.v: मम चेदल्पभाग्यायाः साम्निध्यात्तव वीर्यवान् । अस्य शोकस्य महतो मुहूर्तं मोक्षणं भवेत् ।।
data.es: "Your presence will relieve me of my suffering, if you stay here for a while.

data.v: गते हि हरिशार्दूल पुनरागमनाय तु । प्राणानामपि संदेहो मम स्यान्नात्र संशयः ।।
data.es: "O tiger among vanaras if you leave this place to come again, my life will be uncertain, (if your coming is uncertain). There is no doubt about it.

data.v: तवादर्शनजः शोको भूयो मां परितापयेत् । दुःखाद्दुःखपरामृष्टां दीपयन्निव वानर ।।
data.es: "My agony would be increased further by not seeing you. It would be inflamming my agony and I would be even more pained.

data.v: अयं च वीर संदेहस्तिष्ठतीव ममाग्रतः । सुमहांस्त्वत्सहायेषु हर्यृक्षेषु हरीश्वर ।।
data.es: "O heroic chief of vanaras I am doubtful as to whether vanaras and bears can extend help?

data.v: कथं नु खलु दुष्पारं तरिष्यन्ति महोदधिम् । तानि हर्यृक्षसैन्यानि तौ वा नरवरात्मजौ ।।
data.es: "How can the army of vanaras and bears, for that matter, princes Rama and Lakshmana negotiate the ocean, which is difficult to cross?

data.v: त्रयाणामेव भूतानां सागरस्येह लङ्घने । शक्तिः स्याद्वैनतेयस्य तव वा मारुतस्य वा ।।
data.es: "It is only three beings who have the capacity to leap over this ocean. Garuda, or you or the Windgod.

data.v: तदस्मिन्कार्यनिर्योगे वीरैवं दुरतिक्रमे । किं पश्यसि समाधानं त्वं हि कार्यविदां वरः ।।
data.es: "What means do you, being the foremost hero among the three who are capable performing this difficult task, foresee?

data.v: काममस्य त्वमेवैकः कार्यस्य परिसाधने । पर्याप्तः परवीरघ्न यशस्यस्ते बलोदयः ।।
data.es: "O slayer of enemy heroes if you alone can accomplish this task the fame of doing this will be yours.

data.v: बलैः समग्रैर्यदि मां रावणं जित्य संयुगे । विजयी स्वपुरं यायात्तत्तु मे स्याद्यशस्करम् ।।
data.es: "It would be worthy of Rama if he with his entire army emerges victorious over Ravana in a battle and takes me to his city.

data.v: बलैस्तु संकुलां कृत्वा लङ्कां परबलार्दनः । मां नयेद्यदि काकुत्स्थस्तत्तस्य सदृशं भवेत् ।।
data.es: "If Kakutstha (Rama), slayer of the enemy army fills the entire Lanka with his arrows and takes me, then his action will be worthy of him.

data.v: तद्यथा तस्य विक्रान्तमनुरूपं महात्मनः । भवेदाहव शूरस्य तथा त्वमुपपादय ।।
data.es: "You may make arrangement in such a manner that, that great self, the hero in war makes his victorious march which is worthy of him."

data.v: तदर्थोपहितं वाक्यं सहितं हेतुसंहितम् । निशम्य हनुमाञ्शेषं वाक्यमुत्तरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Having heard the meaningful, courteous and logical words of Sita, Hanuman replied:

data.v: देवि हर्यृक्षसैन्यानामीश्वरः प्लवतां वरः । सुग्रीवः सत्त्वसंपन्नस्तवार्थे कृतनिश्चयः ।।
data.es: "O Devi the lord of monkeys, Sugriva heads the army of vanaras and bears. He is richly endowed with satvaguna and is determined to accomplish your cause and free you from sorrow.

data.v: स वानरसहस्राणां कोटीभिरभिसंवृतः । क्षिप्रमेष्यति वैदेहि राक्षसानां निबर्हणः ।।
data.es: "O Vaidehi Sugriva will reach this place with thousands of crores of vanaras very soon and would kill all the ogres.

data.v: तस्य विक्रमसंपन्नाः सत्त्ववन्तो महाबलाः । मनःसंकल्पसंपाता निदेशे हरयः स्थिताः ।।
data.es: "Valiant, virtuous and powerful vanaras who can leap with the speed of mind are awaiting orders (of Sugriva).

data.v: येषां नोपरि नाधस्तान्न तिर्यक्सज्जते गतिः । न च कर्मसु सीदन्ति महत्स्वमिततेजसः ।।
data.es: "Their course cannot be impeded either upward, or downward or right or left. They are indeed very brilliant and would never fail in any task.

data.v: असकृत्तैर्महोत्सहैः ससागरधराधरा । प्रदक्षिणीकृता भूमिर्वायुमार्गानुसारिभिः ।।
data.es: "They have often circumambulated the earth including its oceans and mountains through the aerial path with great enthusiasm.

data.v: मद्विशिष्टाश्च तुल्याश्च सन्ति तत्र वनौकसः । मत्तः प्रत्यवरः कश्चिन्नास्ति सुग्रीवसंनिधौ ।।
data.es: "The vanaras under Sugriva who move in the forest are more powerful than me or equal to me. None is inferior to me.

data.v: अहं तावदिह प्राप्तः किं पुनस्ते महाबलाः । न हि प्रकृष्टाः प्रेष्यन्ते प्रेष्यन्ते हीतरे जनाः ।।
data.es: "If I have managed to come here, why not the other powerful ones? The superior leaders are not sent (as messengers). Only ordinary ones like me are.

data.v: तदलं परितापेन देवि शोको व्यपैतु ते । एकोत्पातेन ते लङ्कामेष्यन्ति हरियूथपाः ।।
data.es: "O noble lady therefore, give up your agony. Enough of your lamentation. The monkey troops will reach this place in one stride.

data.v: मम पृष्ठगतौ तौ च चन्द्रसूर्याविवोदितौ । त्वत्सकाशं महासत्त्वौ नृसिंहावागमिष्यतः ।।
data.es: "Both the valiant Rama and Lakshmana, lions among men, looking brilliant like Sun and Moon will come to you riding on my back.

data.v: तौ हि वीरौ नरवरौ सहितौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । आगम्य नगरीं लङ्कां सायकैर्विधमिष्यतः ।।
data.es: "Both the heroes, Rama and Lakshmana will come and blow up the city of Lanka with their unfailing arrows.

data.v: सगणं रावणं हत्वा राघवो रघुनन्दनः । त्वामादाय वरारोहे स्वपुरं प्रतियास्यति ।।
data.es: "O beautiful lady Raghava, the delight of the Raghu race would kill Ravana and his kins and return with you to his city৷৷

data.v: तदाश्वसिहि भद्रं ते भव त्वं कालकाङ्क्षिणी । नचिराद्द्रक्ष्यसे रामं प्रज्वजन्तमिवानिलम् ।।
data.es: "Therefore, count the days and rest assured. Let it be auspicious to you. You will shortly see Rama burning like fire.

data.v: निहते राक्षसेन्द्रे च सपुत्रामात्यबान्धवे । त्वं समेष्यसि रामेण शशाङ्केनेव रोहिणी ।।
data.es: "When Ravana is slain, with his sons, ministers and kith and kin, you will reunite with Rama as Rohini unites with the Moon.

data.v: क्षिप्रं त्वं देवि शोकस्य पारं यास्यसि मैथिलि । रावणं चैव रामेण निहतं द्रक्ष्यसेऽचिरात् ।।
data.es: "O queen Mythili you come to the end of your sorrow and will soon see Ravana killed by Rama".

data.v: एवमाश्वस्य वैदेहीं हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । गमनाय मतिं कृत्वा वैदेहीं पुनरब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Having thus consoled Vaidehi, Hanuman, son of the Windgod resolved to depart. Once again he spoke to Vadehi:

data.v: तमरिघ्नं कृतात्मानं क्षिप्रं द्रक्ष्यसि राघवम् । लक्ष्मणं च धनुष्पाणिं लङ्काद्वारमुपस्थितम् ।।
data.es: "Very soon you would see the slayer of foes, who is an accomplished wielder of the bow (Rama) along with Lakshmana at the entrance of Lanka.

data.v: नखदंष्ट्रायुधान्वीरान्सिंहशार्दूलविक्रमान् । वानरान्वारणेन्द्राभान्क्षिप्रं द्रक्ष्यसि संगतान् ।।
data.es: "You will soon see heroic vanaras whose weapons are their teeth, who are like lion and tiger in their valour. They are (mighty) like wellbred elephants.

data.v: शैलाम्बुदनिकाशानां लङ्कामलयसानुषु । नर्दतां कपिमुख्यानामार्ये यूथान्यनेकशः ।।
data.es: "O respectable lady you would see many troops of vanara chiefs who resemble clouds hovering on the mountain peaks of Lankaroaring.

data.v: स तु मर्मणि घोरेण ताडितो मन्मथेषुणा । न शर्म लभते रामः सिंहार्दित इव द्विपः ।।
data.es: "Rama is tormented by the dreadful arrows of the god of love pierced into vitals, like an elephant hit by a lion. He has no happiness in life.

data.v: मा रुदो देवि शोकेन मा भूत्ते मनसोऽप्रियम् । शचीव पथ्या शक्रेण भर्त्रा नाथवती ह्यसि ।।
data.es: "O devi weep no more.Entertain no unpleasant thoughts.You have a great husband, just as Sachi has her lord Indra.

data.v: रामाद्विशिष्टः कोऽन्योऽस्ति कश्चित्सौमित्रिणा समः । अग्निमारुतकल्पौ तौ भ्रातरौ तव संश्रयौ ।।
data.es: "Who is superior to Rama? Who is equal to Lakshmana? Both the brothers are like Fire and Wind. They are your refuge.

data.v: नास्मिंश्चिरं वत्स्यसि देवि देशे; रक्षोगणैरध्युषितोऽतिरौद्रे । न ते चिरादागमनं प्रियस्य; क्षमस्व मत्संगमकालमात्रम् ।।
data.es: "O noble lady You will not stay longer in this country, which is a strong hold of hosts of demons and a dreadful place It will not be very long before you unite with your beloved. Pray, have patience till then.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे एकोनचत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the thirtyninth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: श्रुत्वा तु वचनं तस्य वायुसूनोर्महात्मनः । उवाचात्महितं वाक्यं सीता सुरसुतोपमा ।।
data.es: Sita who was like the daughter of the gods heard the son of the Windgod for her benefit and replied:

data.v: त्वां दृष्ट्वा प्रियवक्तारं संप्रहृष्यामि वानर । अर्धसंजातसस्येव वृष्टिं प्राप्य वसुंधरा ।।
data.es: "O vanara just as the earth feels happy when the half grown crops receive rain, I feel happy after seeing you. You have been speaking pleasing words

data.v: यथा तं पुरुषव्याघ्रं गात्रैः शोकाभिकर्शितैः । संस्पृशेयं सकामाहं तथा कुरु दयां मयि ।।
data.es: "Be kind to me and act in such a manner that I may embrace my lord passionately with my body emaciated with grief.

data.v: अभिज्ञानं च रामस्य दत्तं हरिगणोत्तम । क्षिप्तामीषिकां काकस्य कोपादेकाक्षिशातनीम् ।।
data.es: "O best leader of vanaras remind Rama about the incident of the release of a blade of grass in anger blinding one of the eyes of the crow narrated to you.

data.v: मनःशिलायास्तिकलो गण्डपार्श्वे निवेशितः । त्वया प्रनष्टे तिलके तं किल स्मर्तुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: '(Further remind him), 'When my tilaka mark was erased, you painted tilaka with a stone (manassita pigment) nearby. O Rama you should remember that (incident).

data.v: स वीर्यवान्कथं सीतां हृतां समनुमन्यसे । वसन्तीं रक्षसां मध्ये महेन्द्रवरुणोपम ।।
data.es: 'Rama you are like Indra and Varuna in valiance. How are you tolerating Sita seized, dwelling among the demons?

data.v: एष चूडामणिर्दिव्यो मया सुपरिरक्षितः । एतं दृष्ट्वा प्रहृष्यामि व्यसने त्वामिवानघ ।।
data.es: "O sinless Rama this wonderful Chudamani of mine has been carefully safeguarded. Seeing this is like seeing you when I am in distress.

data.v: एष निर्यातितः श्रीमान्मया ते वारिसंभवः । अतः परं न शक्ष्यामि जीवितुं शोकलालसा ।।
data.es: "I am sending you this (Chudamani) born of the sea. O glorious Rama and now engrossed in grief it is not possible for me to live.

data.v: असह्यानि च दुःखानि वाचश्च हृदयच्छिदः । राक्षसीनां सुघोराणां त्वत्कृते मर्षयाम्यहम् ।।
data.es: "I am tolerating this unbearable grief, and the words of the dreadful ogresses piercing my heart. Only for you.

data.v: धारयिष्यामि मासं तु जीवितं शत्रुसूदन । मासादूर्ध्वं न जीविष्ये त्वया हीना नृपात्मज ।।
data.es: "O subduer of enemies O prince I will hold on to life only for a month. I will not survive beyond a month in your absence.

data.v: घोरो राक्षसराजोऽयं दृष्टिश्च न सुखा मयि । त्वां च श्रुत्वा विपद्यन्तं न जीवेयमहं क्षणम् ।।
data.es: "The demon king is frightful. He looks at me with immoral (lusty) eyes. I do not wish to live even for a moment after hearing about the adversities (you have faced)."

data.v: वैदेह्या वचनं श्रुत्वा करुणं साश्रुभाषितम् । अथाब्रवीन्महातेजा हनुमान्मारुतात्मजः ।।
data.es: The brilliant son of the Windgod, Hanuman, whose senses were overwhelmed with worries, regained his senses in a short while and got up.

data.v: त्वच्छोकविमुखो रामो देवि सत्येन ते शपे । रामे शोकाभिभूते तु लक्ष्मणः परितप्यते ।।
data.es: "O godlike lady Rama is not averse to your misery. On my word this is true. Rama is immersed in sorrow. Even Lakshmana wails.

data.v: दृष्टा कथंचिद्भवती न कालः परिशोचितुम् । इमं मुहूर्तं दुःखानामन्तं द्रक्ष्यसि भामिनि ।।
data.es: "I could find you with difficulty. This is not the time to wail. O blameless lady take it, your sorrow has come to an end at this moment.

data.v: तावुभौ पुरुषव्याघ्रौ राजपुत्रावनिन्दितौ । त्वद्दर्शनकृतोत्साहौ लङ्कां भस्मीकरिष्यतः ।।
data.es: "Both the mighty brothers, tigers among men, are eager to see you. Both the princes will reduce this Lanka into ashes.

data.v: हत्वा तु समरे क्रूरं रावणं सह बान्धवम् । राघवौ त्वां विशालाक्षि स्वां पुरीं प्रापयिष्यतः ।।
data.es: "O largeeyed lady cruel Ravana along with his relatives will be killed by Rama in war and Rama will return to his city with you.

data.v: यत्तु रामो विजानीयादभिज्ञानमनिन्दिते । प्रीतिसंजननं तस्य भूयस्त्वं दातुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: "O unimpeachable lady give one more identification which would make him more happy".

data.v: साब्रवीद्दत्तमेवेह मयाभिज्ञानमुत्तमम् । एतदेव हि रामस्य दृष्ट्वा मत्केशभूषणम् । श्रद्धेयं हनुमन्वाक्यं तव वीर भविष्यति ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यभभभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतभत], अज्ञातम् [१२: मरयत], अज्ञातम् [१२: ररभम]

data.es: "I have already given the best identification. When you hand this jewel used on my hair to him, he will believe what you tell him".

data.v: स तं मणिवरं गृह्य श्रीमान्प्लवगसत्तमः । प्रणम्य शिरसा देवीं गमनायोपचक्रमे ।।
data.es: The illustrious vanara held the ornament, prostrated to Sita and prepared to depart.

data.v: तमुत्पातकृतोत्साहमवेक्ष्य हरिपुंगवम् । वर्धमानं महावेगमुवाच जनकात्मजा । अश्रुपूर्णमुखी दीना बाष्पगद्गदया गिरा ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जसयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसभभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यतभर]

data.es: Seeing Hanuman eager to leap, enlarging his body quickly, she appeared pitiable with her face filled with tears and throat choked.

data.v: हनूमन्सिंहसंकाशौ भ्रातरौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । सुग्रीवं च सहामात्यं सर्वान्ब्रूया अनामयम् ।।
data.es: "O Hanuman the great communicate my welfare to both Rama and Lakshmana, to Sugriva, his ministers, elderly vanaras in righteous order.

data.v: यथा च स महाबाहुर्मां तारयति राघवः । अस्माद्दुःखाम्बुसंरोधात्तत्समाधातुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: "You must pacify the strongarmed Rama in a manner by which he will help me to cross the ocean of grief and rlieve me.

data.v: इमं च तीव्रं मम शोकवेगं; रक्षोभिरेभिः परिभर्त्सनं च । ब्रूयास्तु रामस्य गतः समीपं; शिवश्च तेऽध्वास्तु हरिप्रवीर ।।
data.es: "Foremost vanara tell Rama about my intense grief as well as the threats of the demons. May your journey be happy.

data.v: स राजपुत्र्या प्रतिवेदितार्थः; कपिः कृतार्थः परिहृष्टचेताः । तदल्पशेषं प्रसमीक्ष्य कार्यं; दिशं ह्युदीचीं मनसा जगाम ।।
data.es: Hanuman understood the message of princess Sita and felt delighted at heart at his accomplishment. Considering the small task yet to be accomplished he reached the northern shore mentally (He thought of Rama who waited in Kishkinda which is in the northern direction).इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे चत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortieth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: स च वाग्भिः प्रशस्ताभिर्गमिष्यन्पूजितस्तया । तस्माद्देशादपक्रम्य चिन्तयामास वानरः ।।
data.es: Having been honoured and praised by Sita's words, Hanuman prepared to depart from Sita's presence.

data.v: अल्पशेषमिदं कार्यं दृष्टेयमसितेक्षणा । त्रीनुपायानतिक्रम्य चतुर्थ इह दृश्यते ।।
न साम रक्षःसु गुणाय कल्पते; न दनमर्थोपचितेषु वर्तते । न भेदसाध्या बलदर्पिता जनाः; पराक्रमस्त्वेष ममेह रोचते ।।
data.es: 'With demons, negotiation is of no use. They are wealthy, they need no gifts. Proud of their stregth, the demons will not yield to dissension. I think only by using power it can be done.

data.v: न चास्य कार्यस्य पराक्रमादृते; विनिश्चयः कश्चिदिहोपपद्यते । हृतप्रवीरास्तु रणे हि राक्षसाः; कथंचिदीयुर्यदिहाद्य मार्दवम् ।।
data.es: 'Other than power, there is no way to accomplish the task of ascertaining their strength. If I slay a few strong ogres somehow they may soften a little and yield.

data.v: कार्ये कर्मणि निर्दिष्टो यो बहून्यपि साधयेत् । पूर्वकार्यविरोधेन स कार्यं कर्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: 'He, who can perform tasks in addition to the objective accomplished without affecting it, is really worthy.

data.v: न ह्येकः साधको हेतुः स्वल्पस्यापीह कर्मणः । यो ह्यर्थं बहुधा वेद स समर्थोऽर्थसाधने ।।
data.es: 'There are ways more than one even to perform a small work. And the capable know it.

data.v: इहैव तावत्कृतनिश्चयो ह्यहं; यदि व्रजेयं प्लवगेश्वरालयम् । परात्मसंमर्द विशेषतत्त्ववि;त्ततः कृतं स्यान्मम भर्तृशासनम् ।।
data.es: 'If I ascertain the difference in the strength of enemies and vanaras in war here itself and return to Kishkinda, the abode of vanaras, then I would have executed the orders of my lord properly.

data.v: कथं नु खल्वद्य भवेत्सुखागतं; प्रसह्य युद्धं मम राक्षसैः सह । तथैव खल्वात्मबलं च सारव;त्समानयेन्मां च रणे दशाननः ।।
data.es: 'How can I have enduring war with the ogres today? How will my visit to this place end in happy return? Only in a combat this tenheaded Ravana will guage his strength and mine

data.v: इदमस्य नृशंसस्य नन्दनोपममुत्तमम् । वनं नेत्रमनःकान्तं नानाद्रुमलतायुतम् ।।
data.es: 'This Ashoka garden of Ravana filled with different kinds of trees and creepers is a feast to the eyes and mind. It is an excellent garden like the Nandana garden of Indra.

data.v: इदं विध्वंसयिष्यामि शुष्कं वनमिवानलः । अस्मिन्भग्ने ततः कोपं करिष्यति स रावणः ।।
data.es: 'I will devastate this garden, just as fire destroys a dried up forest. This will enrage Ravana.

data.v: ततो महत्साश्वमहारथद्विपं; बलं समानेष्वपि राक्षसाधिपः । त्रिशूलकालायसपट्टिशायुधं; ततो महद्युद्धमिदं भविष्यति ।।
data.es: 'Then the demon king will order the horses, chariots and elephants and army equipped with tridents and spears to march against me. A great war will take place.

data.v: अहं तु तैः संयति चण्डविक्रमैः; समेत्य रक्षोभिरसंगविक्रमः । निहत्य तद्रावणचोदितं बलं; सुखं गमिष्यामि कपीश्वरालयम् ।।
data.es: 'I will fight with the ogres sent by Ravana, endowed with fierce strength and irresistible valour. After destroying their army I will go to the abode of vanaras happily'.

data.v: ततो मारुतवत्क्रुद्धो मारुतिर्भीमविक्रमः । ऊरुवेगेन महता द्रुमान्क्षेप्तुमथारभत् ।।
data.es: Furious Maruti endowed with fierce valour started uprooting the trees with the speed sprung from his thighs like the Windgod.

data.v: ततस्तद्धनुमान्वीरो बभञ्ज प्रमदावनम् । मत्तद्विजसमाघुष्टं नानाद्रुमलतायुतम् ।।
data.es: Then Hanuman felled a variety of trees and vines inhabited by intoxicated birds in the beautiful garden meant for womenfolk.

data.v: तद्वनं मथितैर्वृक्षैर्भिन्नैश्च सलिलाशयैः । चूर्णितैः पर्वताग्रैश्च बभूवाप्रियदर्शनम् ।।
data.es: That garden looked ugly with uprooted trees, breached ponds and powdered mountain peaks.

data.v: लतागृहैश्चित्रगृहैश्च नाशितै;र्महोरगैर्व्यालमृगैश्च निर्धुतैः । शिलागृहैरुन्मथितैस्तथा गृहैः; प्रनष्टरूपं तदभून्महद्वनम् ।।
data.es: The great garden lay disfigured, with the arbours and the picture galleries ruined, huge serpents and wild animals scattered, with stone houses and sheds destroyed.

data.v: स तस्य कृत्वार्थपतेर्महाकपि;र्महद्व्यलीकं मनसो महात्मनः । युयुत्सुरेको बहुभिर्महाबलैः; श्रिया ज्वलंस्तोरणमाश्रितः कपिः ।।
data.es: The great vanara having perpetrated mischief, rousing anger in the mind of the great lord of wealth, stood at the exit doorway ready to combat singlehanded with many warriors in that mighty army blazing in glory.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे एकचत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortyfirst sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: ततः पक्षिनिनादेन वृक्षभङ्गस्वनेन च । बभूवुस्त्राससंभ्रान्ताः सर्वे लङ्कानिवासिनः ।।
data.es: The residents of Lanka panicked at the shrieking sounds of birds and cracking sounds of trees.

data.v: विद्रुताश्च भयत्रस्ता विनेदुर्मृगपक्षुणः । रक्षसां च निमित्तानि क्रूराणि प्रतिपेदिरे ।।
data.es: The frightened beasts and birds ran and flew, screeching in all directions. Fierce portents appeared to the demons.

data.v: ततो गतायां निद्रायां राक्षस्यो विकृताननाः । तद्वनं ददृशुर्भग्नं तं च वीरं महाकपिम् ।।
data.es: Hideouslooking ogresses, awakened from sleep, saw the garden devastated by the heroic Vanara.

data.v: स ता दृष्ट्व महाबाहुर्महासत्त्वो महाबलः । चकार सुमहद्रूपं राक्षसीनां भयावहम् ।।
data.es: When the powerful, mighty and strongarmed Hanuman saw the ogresses he assumed a very huge form in order to strike terror in them.

data.v: ततस्तं गिरिसंकाशमतिकायं महाबलम् । राक्षस्यो वानरं दृष्ट्वा पप्रच्छुर्जनकात्मजाम् ।।
data.es: Then, seeing the huge body of the mighty vanara resembling a mountain the ogresses questioned Janaki about him.

data.v: कोऽयं कस्य कुतो वायं किंनिमित्तमिहागतः । कथं त्वया सहानेन संवादः कृत इत्युत ।।
data.es: "Who is he? By whom has he been sent? From where and why did he come here? What dialogue did you have with him?

data.v: आचक्ष्व नो विशालाक्षि मा भूत्ते सुभगे भयम् । संवादमसितापाङ्गे त्वया किं कृतवानयम् ।।
data.es: "O lovely, largeeyed lady O auspicious one have no fear. What conversation did he have with you? Tell us".

data.v: अथाब्रवीत्तदा साध्वी सीता सर्वाङ्गशोभना । रक्षसां कामरूपाणां विज्ञाने मम का गतिः ।।
data.es: Chaste and beautiful Sita said, "How do I know about the ogresses who assume many fierce forms?"

data.v: यूयमेवास्य जानीत योऽयं यद्वा करिष्यति । अहिरेव अहेः पादान्विजानाति न संशयः ।।
data.es: "You alone can know about who he is and what he is about. A serpent alone knows the movement (footprints) of another serpent. There is no doubt about it.

data.v: अहमप्यस्य भीतास्मि नैनं जानामि कोऽन्वयम् । वेद्मि राक्षसमेवैनं कामरूपिणमागतम् ।।
data.es: "I am also scared of him. I do not know who he is. I think he is a demon, who came here assuming a form of his choice.

data.v: वैदेह्या वचनं श्रुत्वा राक्षस्यो विद्रुता द्रुतम् । स्थिताः काश्चिद्गताः काश्चिद्रावणाय निवेदितुम् ।।
data.es: LIstening to Vaidehi's words the ogresses divided themselves and fled in all directions. While some stood there, others went to report to Ravana.

data.v: रावणस्य समीपे तु राक्षस्यो विकृताननाः । विरूपं वानरं भीममाख्यातुमुपचक्रमुः ।।
data.es: The uglyfaced ogresses went to the presence of Ravana and reported about the frightening form of the vanara.

data.v: अशोकवनिका मध्ये राजन्भीमवपुः कपिः । सीतया कृतसंवादस्तिष्ठत्यमितविक्रमः ।।
data.es: "Your majesty an extremely powerful and frightening Vanara had a dialogue with Sita. He is stationed in the midst of Ashoka garden.

data.v: न च तं जानकी सीता हरिं हरिणलोचणा । अस्माभिर्बहुधा पृष्टा निवेदयितुमिच्छति ।।
data.es: "The deereyed Sita is not willing to disclose to us his identity even when we questioned her.

data.v: वासवस्य भवेद्दूतो दूतो वैश्रवणस्य वा । प्रेषितो वापि रामेण सीतान्वेषणकाङ्क्षया ।।
data.es: "He may be an envoy of Indra or Kubera or of Rama sent with an intent to trace Sita.

data.v: तेन त्वद्भूतरूपेण यत्तत्तव मनोहरम् । नानामृगगणाकीर्णं प्रमृष्टं प्रमदावनम् ।।
data.es: "Your beautiful pleasure garden filled with a variety of beasts has been ruined by this wonderful figure.

data.v: न तत्र कश्चिदुद्देशो यस्तेन न विनाशितः । यत्र सा जानकी सीता स तेन न विनाशितः ।।
data.es: There is not a single place that has not been ruined by him there. Only the place where Janaka's daughter, Sita is resting has not been touched.

data.v: जानकीरक्षणार्थं वा श्रमाद्वा नोपलभ्यते । अथ वा कः श्रमस्तस्य सैव तेनाभिरक्षिता ।।
data.es: "It is not clear whether he spared that place for protecting Janakai or he stopped due to exhaustion. What is fatigue for him? It must be to save her that she is spared by him.

data.v: चारुपल्लवपत्राढ्यं यं सीता स्वयमास्थिता । प्रवृद्धः शिंशपावृक्षः स च तेनाभिरक्षितः ।।
data.es: "He has spared the simsupa tree with lovely, tender leaves and flowers which is a chosen resort by Sita.

data.v: तस्योग्ररूपस्योग्रं त्वं दण्डमाज्ञातुमर्हसि । सीता संभाषिता येन तद्वनं च विनाशितम् ।।
data.es: "Your highness should take severe action on that person of fierce appearance with whom Sita dared to speak, and by whom the garden is ruined.

data.v: मनःपरिगृहीतां तां तव रक्षोगणेश्वर । कः सीतामभिभाषेत यो न स्यात्त्यक्तजीवितः ।।
data.es: "O lord of the demon clan Who dares to talk to Sita if he has not given up all hope of life, since she is desired by you".

data.v: राक्षसीनां वचः श्रुत्वा रावणो राक्षसेश्वरः । हुतागिरिव जज्वाल कोपसंवर्तितेक्षणः ।।
data.es: On listening to the report of the ogresses, Ravana, the lord of demons flared up like blazing flame of a sacrificial fire, his eyeballs rolling in rage.

data.v: आत्मनः सदृशाञ्शूरान्किंकरान्नाम राक्षसान् । व्यादिदेश महातेजा निग्रहार्थं हनूमतः ।।
data.es: Then powerful Ravana commanded heroic demons called kinkaras who vied in strength to catch Hanuman.

data.v: तेषामशीतिसाहस्रं किंकराणां तरस्विनाम् । निर्ययुर्भवनात्तस्मात्कूटमुद्गरपाणयः ।।
data.es: Eighty thousand powerful kinkaras (a clan of demons), largebellied, with large teeth and of dreadful appearance, swift in action, armed with hammers and clubs marched from there, resolved to capture Hanuman.

data.v: महोदरा महादंष्ट्रा घोररूपा महाबलाः । युद्धाभिमनसः सर्वे हनूमद्ग्रहणोन्मुखाः ।।
data.es: Eighty thousand powerful kinkaras (a clan of demons), largebellied, with large teeth and of dreadful appearance, swift in action, armed with hammers and clubs marched from there, resolved to capture Hanuman.

data.v: ते कपिं तं समासाद्य तोरणस्थमवस्थितम् । अभिपेतुर्महावेगाः पतङ्गा इव पावकम् ।।
data.es: The kinkaras rushed towards the leader of vanaras who stood near the archway like the moths rushing towards the flame.

data.v: ते गदाभिर्विचित्राभिः परिघैः काञ्चनाङ्गदैः । आजघ्नुर्वानरश्रेष्ठं शरैरादित्यसंनिभैः ।।
data.es: They assailed Hanuman with iron maces, crowbars edged with gold and shining arrows resembling the Sun.

data.v: हनूमानपि तेजस्वी श्रीमान्पर्वतसंनिभः । क्षितावाविध्य लाङ्गूलं ननाद च महास्वनम् ।।
data.es: Gigantic Hanuman, illustrious and brilliant, roared and waved his tail striking it with force on the ground causing loud sound.

data.v: तस्य संनादशब्देन तेऽभवन्भयशङ्किताः । ददृशुश्च हनूमन्तं संध्यामेघमिवोन्नतम् ।।
data.es: Terrified on hearing the roar, the kinkaras looked at the towering Hanuman who seemed like a cloud in twilight (red in colour).

data.v: स्वामिसंदेशनिःशङ्कास्ततस्ते राक्षसाः कपिम् । चित्रैः प्रहरणैर्भीमैरभिपेतुस्ततस्ततः ।।
data.es: Obeying their king's commnad, putting aside their fear, the kinkaras freely attacked the vanara from all directions with dreadful weapons.

data.v: स तैः परिवृतः शूरैः सर्वतः स महाबलः । आससादायसं भीमं परिघं तोरणाश्रितम् ।।
data.es: Extremely powerful Hanuman surrounded by heroes all over, on his part went to the archway and picked up a terrific iron beam.

data.v: स तं परिघमादाय जघान रजनीचरान् ।।
स पन्नगमिवादाय स्फुरन्तं विनतासुतः । विचचाराम्बरे वीरः परिगृह्य च मारुतिः ।।
data.es: Hanuman, the mighty hero, seized the iron beam and struck the kinkaras, just as Garuda, the son of Vinata shoots up a struggling serpent and starts taking strides in the sky with the weapon in his hand (like Indra with his thunderbolt did with demons).

data.v: स हत्वा राक्षसान्वीरः किंकरान्मारुतात्मजः । युद्धाकाङ्क्षी पुनर्वीरस्तोरणं समुपस्थितः ।।
data.es: The great Windgod's son killed the kinkaras, and returned to the archway desiring further combat.

data.v: ततस्तस्माद्भयान्मुक्ताः कतिचित्तत्र राक्षसाः । निहतान्किंकरान्सर्वान्रावणाय न्यवेदयन् ।।
data.es: Then a few surviving ogres took to their heels after getting over that shock and reported to Ravana of the destruction of the kinkaras in the combat

data.v: स राक्षसानां निहतं महाबलं; निशम्य राजा परिवृत्तलोचनः । समादिदेशाप्रतिमं पराक्रमे; प्रहस्तपुत्रं समरे सुदुर्जयम् ।।
data.es: The mighty demon king having heard about the killing of the formidable army of ogres, his eyes rolling in rage, commanded the son of Prahasta, who is difficult to conquer and matchless in war.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे द्विचत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortysecond sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: ततः स किंकरान्हत्वा हनूमान्ध्यानमास्थितः । वनं भग्नं मया चैत्यप्रासादो न विनाशितः । तस्मात्प्रासादमप्येवमिमं विध्वंसयाम्यहम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जरतम], अज्ञातम् [१२: मसयम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरतत] अथ वा अज्ञातसमवृत्त [१२: जरतम] (? २ एव पादाः युक्ताः)

data.es: Having slain the kinkaras, Hanuman stood and reflected, ' I have ruined the garden and not the palatial buildings that are like temples (Chaityas)'. Then Hanuman, son of the Windgod, decided in his mind to show his strength and jumped on to the top of the palatial building that appeared like the peak of mount Meru.

data.v: इति संचिन्त्य हनुमान्मनसा दर्शयन्बलम् । चैत्यप्रासादमाप्लुत्य मेरुशृङ्गमिवोन्नतम् । आरुरोह हरिश्रेष्ठो हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: रसयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: सभजज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जमतत]

data.es: Having slain the kinkaras, Hanuman stood and reflected, ' I have ruined the garden and not the palatial buildings that are like temples (Chaityas)'. Then Hanuman, son of the Windgod, decided in his mind to show his strength and jumped on to the top of the palatial building that appeared like the peak of mount Meru.

data.v: संप्रधृष्य च दुर्धर्षश्चैत्यप्रासादमुन्नतम् । हनूमान्प्रज्वलँल्लक्ष्म्या पारियात्रोपमोऽभवत् ।।
data.es: Having destroyed the fine palace building, the indomitable Hanuman was blazing with glory like the mountain Pariyatra. (one of the seven Kula mountains viz., Mahendra, Malaya, Sahya, Shuktiman, Riksha, Vindhya and Pariyatra)

data.v: स भूत्वा तु महाकायो हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । धृष्टमास्फोटयामास लङ्कां शब्देन पूरयन् ।।
data.es: Hanuman, son of Maruti, enlarged his body to a huge size and patted himself wildly making loud noise that echoed the entire Lanka.

data.v: तस्यास्फोटितशब्देन महता श्रोत्रघातिना । पेतुर्विहंगा गगनादुच्चैश्चेदमघोषयत् ।।
data.es: By the highly frightening sound caused by Hanuman patting, the birds from the sky fell down making a loud noise and Hanuman proclaimed in a loud voice as follows:

data.v: जयत्यतिबलो रामो लक्ष्मणश्च महाबलः । राजा जयति सुग्रीवो राघवेणाभिपालितः ।।
data.es: "Victory to Rama, the mighty and powerful, Victory to Lakshmana. Victory to king Sugriva who is ruled by Rama."

data.v: दासोऽहं कोसलेन्द्रस्य रामस्याक्लिष्टकर्मणः । हनुमाञ्शत्रुसैन्यानां निहन्ता मारुतात्मजः ।।
data.es: "I, son of the Windgod, destroyer of hostile armies, am a servant of Rama, the lord of Kosala kingdom, a man of unwearied action.

data.v: न रावणसहस्रं मे युद्धे प्रतिबलं भवेत् । शिलाभिस्तु प्रहरतः पादपैश्च सहस्रशः ।।
data.es: Even a thousand Ravanas will not match me in strength when I pound stones and trees in a thousand ways.

data.v: अर्दयित्वा पुरीं लङ्कामभिवाद्य च मैथिलीम् । समृद्धार्थो गमिष्यामि मिषतां सर्वरक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: "I shall destroy the city of Lanka and pay my respects to Mythili right under the nose of all demons. I will return with my purpose accomplished.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा विमानस्थश्चैत्यस्थान्हरिपुंगवः । ननाद भीमनिर्ह्रादो रक्षसां जनयन्भयम् ।।
data.es: Having made proclamations that way from the top of the Vimana (palace) the monkey leader roared making terrific sound frightening the ogres.

data.v: तेन शब्देन महता चैत्यपालाः शतं ययुः । गृहीत्वा विविधानस्त्रान्प्रासान्खड्गान्परश्वधान् । विसृजन्तो महाक्षया मारुतिं पर्यवारयन् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: मरजय], अज्ञातम् [१२: रभयय], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरभम], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततर]

data.es: Hearing the terrific sound, a hundred gigantic guards of the palace set forth, holding different kinds of weapons like darts, swords and axes and hurled at Maruti surrounding him.

data.v: आवर्त इव गङ्गायास्तोयस्य विपुलो महान् । परिक्षिप्य हरिश्रेष्ठं स बभौ रक्षसां गणः ।।
data.es: The demons surrounding the great monkey looked like a big whirlpool of the water of the river Ganga.

data.v: ततो वातात्मजः क्रुद्धो भीमरूपं समास्थितः ।।
प्रासादस्य महांस्तस्य स्तम्भं हेमपरिष्कृतम् । उत्पाटयित्वा वेगेन हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । ततस्तं भ्रामयामास शतधारं महाबलः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जमयत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यरजम], अज्ञातम् [१२: मसमत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यनतर]

data.es: Thereupon the infuriated son of the Windgod, assumed a fearsome form, uprooted a pillar of the palace decked with gold and holding that hundred edged pillar whirled it round swiftly.

data.v: स राक्षसशतं हत्वा वज्रेणेन्द्र इवासुरान् । अन्तरिक्षस्थितः श्रीमानिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Glorious and mighty Hanuman quickly went into her mouth and got out and stood in the sky and said:.

data.v: मादृशानां सहस्राणि विसृष्टानि महात्मनाम् । बलिनां वानरेन्द्राणां सुग्रीववशवर्तिनाम् ।।
data.es: "Thousands of huge and mighty monkeys, equal to me, loyal to king Sugriva, are coming under the orders and have been recruited from the entire earth. They are the best among monkeys.

data.v: शतैः शतसहस्रैश्च कोटीभिरयुतैरपि । आगमिष्यति सुग्रीवः सर्वेषां वो निषूदनः ।।
data.es: "Sugriva will come here with hundreds of thousands of crores of vanaras who would be fighting with their teeth and nails as weapons.

data.v: नेयमस्ति पुरी लङ्का न यूयं न च रावणः । यस्मादिक्ष्वाकुनाथेन बद्धं वैरं महात्मना ।।
data.es: "You have established great enmity with the noble lord of Ikshvaku dynasty. Neither this Lanka will endure nor you, nor even Ravana will be traced.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे त्रिचत्वारिशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortythird sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: संदिष्टो राक्षसेन्द्रेण प्रहस्तस्य सुतो बली । जम्बुमाली महादंष्ट्रो निर्जगाम धनुर्धरः ।।
रक्तमाल्याम्बरधरः स्रग्वी रुचिरकुण्डलः । महान्विवृत्तनयनश्चण्डः समरदुर्जयः ।।
धनुः शक्रधनुः प्रख्यं महद्रुचिरसायकम् । विस्फारयाणो वेगेन वज्राशनिसमस्वनम् ।।
तस्य विस्फारघोषेण धनुषो महता दिशः । प्रदिशश्च नभश्चैव सहसा समपूर्यत ।।
data.es: All directions including the intermediate directions and the sky were filled with that loud sound produced by his twang.

data.v: रथेन खरयुक्तेन तमागतमुदीक्ष्य सः । हनूमान्वेगसंपन्नो जहर्ष च ननाद च ।।
data.es: Seeing him coming in a chariot drawn by donkeys, Hanuman who was swift to act was glad (to have an opportunity to fight) and made a loud noise.

data.v: तं तोरणविटङ्कस्थं हनूमन्तं महाकपिम् । जम्बुमाली महाबाहुर्विव्याध निशितैः शरैः ।।
data.es: Strongarmed Jambumali with his sharp arrows hit great Hanuman who stood on top of the exit archway.

data.v: अर्धचन्द्रेण वदने शिरस्येकेन कर्णिना । बाह्वोर्विव्याध नाराचैर्दशभिस्तं कपीश्वरम् ।।
data.es: Jambumali released a crescentshaped arrow on the face, one earshaped (barbed) arrow on the head and ten iron arrows into the arms of the lord of monkeys.

data.v: तस्य तच्छुशुभे ताम्रं शरेणाभिहतं मुखम् । शरदीवाम्बुजं फुल्लं विद्धं भास्कररश्मिना ।।
data.es: His red face struck by an arrow appeared like a fullblown lotus in autumn season hit by the rays of the Sun.

data.v: चुकोप बाणाभिहतो राक्षसस्य महाकपिः । ततः पार्श्वेऽतिविपुलां ददर्श महतीं शिलाम् ।।
data.es: Struck by the shafts of the ogre, the great monkey was enraged and happened to see a huge, heavy rock lying beside him on the ground.

data.v: तरसा तां समुत्पाट्य चिक्षेप बलवद्बली । तां शरैर्दशभिः क्रुद्धस्ताडयामास राक्षसः ।।
data.es: Powerful Hanuman with all vehemence lifted the rock and hurled it at the giant which he angrily smashed with ten arrows.

data.v: विपन्नं कर्म तद्दृष्ट्वा हनूमांश्चण्डविक्रमः । सालं विपुलमुत्पाट्य भ्रामयामास वीर्यवान् ।।
data.es: Hanuman, a strong, powerful and fierce warrior pulled out a sala tree and whirled it. Seeing that his attempt has failed.

data.v: भ्रामयन्तं कपिं दृष्ट्वा सालवृक्षं महाबलम् । चिक्षेप सुबहून्बाणाञ्जम्बुमाली महाबलः ।।
data.es: Gigantic Jambumali seeing the mighty Hanuman whirling the sala tree fired many arrows at him.

data.v: सालं चतुर्भिर्चिच्छेद वानरं पञ्चभिर्भुजे । उरस्येकेन बाणेन दशभिस्तु स्तनान्तरे ।।
data.es: He struck the sala tree with four arows, the arm of Hanuman with five arrows, chest with one, the hollow of the chest with ten more arrows.

data.v: स शरैः पूरिततनुः क्रोधेन महता वृतः । तमेव परिघं गृह्य भ्रामयामास वेगितः ।।
data.es: Hanuman filled with arrows all over his body, seized an iron spear (which he made use of in the initial battle) and impetuously spun it in intense anger.

data.v: अतिवेगोऽतिवेगेन भ्रामयित्वा बलोत्कटः । परिघं पातयामास जम्बुमालेर्महोरसि ।।
data.es: Hanuman of immeasurable strength hurled the iron spear after turning it round and round at high speed on the broad chest of Jambumali.

data.v: तस्य चैव शिरो नास्ति न बाहू न च जानुनी । न धनुर्न रथो नाश्वास्तत्रादृश्यन्त नेषवः ।।
data.es: Neither his head could be discerned nor his arms, knees, nor bow, chariot nor donkeys. Nothing was seen.

data.v: स हतस्तरसा तेन जम्बुमाली महारथः । पपात निहतो भूमौ चूर्णिताङ्गविभूषणः ।।
data.es: Mighty Jambumali killed by that blow dropped down dead at once with his ornaments reduced to powder.

data.v: जम्बुमालिं च निहतं किंकरांश्च महाबलान् । चुक्रोध रावणः श्रुत्वा कोपसंरक्तलोचनः ।।
data.es: Ravana's eyes became bloodshot in anger when he heard about the death of Jambumali and of the strong army of kinkaras.

data.v: स रोषसंवर्तितताम्रलोचनः; प्रहस्तपुत्रे निहते महाबले । अमात्यपुत्रानतिवीर्यविक्रमा;न्समादिदेशाशु निशाचरेश्वरः ।।
data.es: When the mighty son of Prahasta was killed, infuriated Ravana, his eyes red and rolling, commanded the highly valiant sons of ministers.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे चतुश्चत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortyfourth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: ततस्ते राक्षसेन्द्रेण चोदिता मन्त्रिणः सुताः । निर्ययुर्भवनात्तस्मात्सप्त सप्तार्चिवर्चसः ।।
महाबलपरीवारा धनुष्मन्तो महाबलाः । कृतास्त्रास्त्रविदां श्रेष्ठाः परस्परजयैषिणः ।।
हेमजालपरिक्षिप्तैर्ध्वजवद्भिः पताकिभिः । तोयदस्वननिर्घोषैर्वाजियुक्तैर्महारथैः ।।
तप्तकाञ्चनचित्राणि चापान्यमितविक्रमाः । विस्फारयन्तः संहृष्टास्तडिद्वन्त इवाम्बुदाः ।।
जनन्यस्तास्ततस्तेषां विदित्वा किंकरान्हतान् । बभूवुः शोकसंभ्रान्ताः सबान्धवसुहृज्जनाः ।।
data.es: Their mothers and relatives and their friends were struck with grief when they learnt about the kinkaras killed.

data.v: ते परस्परसंघर्षास्तप्तकाञ्चनभूषणाः । अभिपेतुर्हनूमन्तं तोरणस्थमवस्थितम् ।।
data.es: The barnished golden ornaments worn by them were shining as they brushed shoulders with one another (eager to fight first) to attack Hanuman who stood waiting at the main archway.

data.v: सृजन्तो बाणवृष्टिं ते रथगर्जितनिःस्वनाः । वृष्टिमन्त इवाम्भोदा विचेरुर्नैरृतर्षभाः ।।
data.es: They went roaring with their chariots rattling, sending forth torrents of arrows like the stormy clouds thundering.

data.v: अवकीर्णस्ततस्ताभिर्हनूमाञ्शरवृष्टिभिः । अभवत्संवृताकारः शैलराडिव वृष्टिभिः ।।
data.es: Later, Hanuman covered with showers of arrows scattered all over appeared like the king of mountains shot with showers of rain.

data.v: स शरान्वञ्चयामास तेषामाशुचरः कपिः । रथवेगांश्च वीराणां विचरन्विमलेऽम्बरे ।।
data.es: Then the monkey moving fast in the clear sky rendered the arrows of the giant heroes and speeding chariots futile.

data.v: स तैः क्रीडन्धनुष्मद्भिर्व्योम्नि वीरः प्रकाशते । धनुष्मद्भिर्यथा मेघैर्मारुतः प्रभुरम्बरे ।।
data.es: Sporting in the sky with the giants who held bows in their hands, Hanuman shone like the powerful Windgod sporting in the sky surrrounded by rambling dark clouds.

data.v: स कृत्वा निनदं घोरं त्रासयंस्तां महाचमूम् । चकार हनुमान्वेगं तेषु रक्षःसु वीर्यवान् ।।
data.es: Valiant Hanuman making terrific sound and frightening the army of ogres marched swiftly.

data.v: तलेनाभिहनत्कांश्चित्पादैः कांश्चित्परंतपः । मुष्टिनाभ्यहनत्कांश्चिन्नखैः कांश्चिद्व्यदारयत् ।।
data.es: The scorcher of enemies, Hanuman hit some ogres with his palm, some with his feet and some with his fist and pierced some with his nails.

data.v: प्रममाथोरसा कांश्चिदूरुभ्यामपरान्कपिः । केचित्तस्यैव नादेन तत्रैव पतिता भुवि ।।
data.es: The monkey strangled some with his chest and some between his thighs. A few fell down dead on the ground hearing his roaring noise.

data.v: ततस्तेष्ववपन्नेषु भूमौ निपतितेषु च । तत्सैन्यमगमत्सर्वं दिशो दशभयार्दितम् ।।
data.es: Struck by fear on seeing Hanuman, the seven sons of ministers dropped down dead on the ground, and their army fled in all the ten directions.

data.v: विनेदुर्विस्वरं नागा निपेतुर्भुवि वाजिनः । भग्ननीडध्वजच्छत्रैर्भूश्च कीर्णाभवद्रथैः ।।
data.es: The elephants trumpeted discordantly out of fear, the horses fell down on the ground and even the chariots with seats, parasols and flag staffs broken were strewn all over the ground.

data.v: स तान्प्रवृद्धान्विनिहत्य राक्षसा;न्महाबलश्चण्डपराक्रमः कपिः । युयुत्सुरन्यैः पुनरेव राक्षसै;स्तदेव वीरोऽभिजगाम तोरणम् ।।
data.es: Having killed the ogres who were old and strong, the valiant and mighty Hanuman, wishing to slay the other ogres advanced towards the archway.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे पञ्चचत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortyfifth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: हतान्मन्त्रिसुतान्बुद्ध्वा वानरेण महात्मना । रावणः संवृताकारश्चकार मतिमुत्तमाम् ।।
data.es: Coming to know that the seven sons of the ministers were slain by the great vanara, Ravana, who had concealed his feelings of agony thought of a good plan.

data.v: स विरूपाक्षयूपाक्षौ दुर्धरं चैव राक्षसं । प्रघसं भासकर्णं च पञ्चसेनाग्रनायकान् ।।
data.es: The tenheaded Ravana, eager to capture Hanuman, commanded his five army Generals called Virupaksha, Yupaksha, Durdhara, Praghasa and Bhaskarna, who were great warriorstatesmen valiant and, equal to wind in speed.

data.v: संदिदेश दशग्रीवो वीरान्नयविशारदान् । हनूमद्ग्रहणे व्यग्रान्वायुवेगसमान्युधि ।।
data.es: The tenheaded Ravana, eager to capture Hanuman, commanded his five army Generals called Virupaksha, Yupaksha, Durdhara, Praghasa and Bhaskarna, who were great warriorstatesmen valiant and, equal to wind in speed.

data.v: यात सेनाग्रगाः सर्वे महाबलपरिग्रहाः । सवाजिरथमातङ्गाः स कपिः शास्यतामिति ।।
data.es: "O Army generals march with a large, strong army with horses, chariots and elephants and punish the vanara.

data.v: यत्तैश्च खलु भाव्यं स्यात्तमासाद्य वनालयम् । कर्म चापि समाधेयं देशकालविरोधितम् ।।
data.es: "Go to that forestdweller and make all efforts to impose on him punishment appropriate to time and place (keeping in view the harm he has done).

data.v: न ह्यहं तं कपिं मन्ये कर्मणा प्रतितर्कयन् । सर्वथा तन्महद्भूतं महाबलपरिग्रहम् । भवेदिन्द्रेण वा सृष्टमस्मदर्थं तपोबलात् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जततम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यजतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: ररमज], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसजम]

data.es: "Judging again and again from all actions, I do not think he is an ordinary monkey. He is a being endowed with great strength.

data.v: सनागयक्षगन्धर्वा देवासुरमहर्षयः । युष्माभिः सहितैः सर्वैर्मया सह विनिर्जिताः ।।
तैरवश्यं विधातव्यं व्यलीकं किंचिदेव नः । तदेव नात्र संदेहः प्रसह्य परिगृह्यताम् ।।
नावमन्यो भवद्भिश्च हरिः क्रूरपराक्रमः । दृष्टा हि हरयः शीघ्रा मया विपुलविक्रमाः ।।
वाली च सह सुग्रीवो जाम्बवांश्च महाबलः । नीलः सेनापतिश्चैव ये चान्ये द्विविदादयः ।।
data.es: "Earlier I have seen monkeys of immense prowess, like Vali and Sugriva as well as Jambavan, the bear. Also I have seen the army general, Nila, Dvivida and others. They do not have such tremendous splendour or movement valour, intellect and strength and energy. They did not have such ability to change form at their will.

data.v: नैव तेषां गतिर्भीमा न तेजो न पराक्रमः । न मतिर्न बलोत्साहो न रूपपरिकल्पनम् ।।
महत्सत्त्वमिदं ज्ञेयं कपिरूपं व्यवस्थितम् । प्रयत्नं महदास्थाय क्रियतामस्य निग्रहः ।।
data.es: "It should be understood that he has taken the form of a monkey. You have to put in extraordinary effort to capture him by acting in a suitable manner.

data.v: कामं लोकास्त्रयः सेन्द्राः ससुरासुरमानवाः । भवतामग्रतः स्थातुं न पर्याप्ता रणाजिरे ।।
data.es: "Even Indra, suras, asuras and humans and the three worlds together are incompetent to stand before you in a battlefield.

data.v: तथापि तु नयज्ञेन जयमाकाङ्क्षता रणे । आत्मा रक्ष्यः प्रयत्नेन युद्धसिद्धिर्हि चञ्चला ।।
data.es: "Even then, you should safeguard yourself with great effort adopting warstrategies in an intelligent manner to be victorious, for success in war is uncertain.

data.v: ते स्वामिवचनं सर्वे प्रतिगृह्य महौजसः । समुत्पेतुर्महावेगा हुताशसमतेजसः ।।
data.es: Taking King's order, the strong and swift warriors, resplendent as the flame of sacrificial fire sallied forth with their army on chariots, on the back of rutting elephants, some on swift horses equipped with sharp weapons of many kinds.

data.v: रथैश्च मत्तैर्नागैश्च वाजिभिश्च महाजवैः । शस्त्रैश्च विविधैस्तीक्ष्णैः सर्वैश्चोपचिता बलैः ।।
data.es: Taking King's order, the strong and swift warriors, resplendent as the flame of sacrificial fire sallied forth with their army on chariots, on the back of rutting elephants, some on swift horses equipped with sharp weapons of many kinds.

data.v: ततस्तं ददृशुर्वीरा दीप्यमानं महाकपिम् । रश्मिमन्तमिवोद्यन्तं स्वतेजोरश्मिमालिनम् ।।
data.es: The heroic giants caught sight of the vanara, who was blazing encircled as though he was by the rays of his own glory, looking like the rising Sun. He was endowed with extraordinary agility, intelligence, and tremendous strength standing, waiting at the archway.

data.v: तोरणस्थं महावेगं महासत्त्वं महाबलम् । महामतिं महोत्साहं महाकायं महाबलम् ।।
तं समीक्ष्यैव ते सर्वे दिक्षु सर्वास्ववस्थिताः । तैस्तैः प्रहरणैर्भीमैरभिपेतुस्ततस्ततः ।।
data.es: Having observed the tremendous strength, intelligence and swiftness in action of Hanuman, the generals of the army positioned at all directions and assailed him with dreadful weapons.

data.v: तस्य पञ्चायसास्तीक्ष्णाः सिताः पीतमुखाः शराः । शिरस्त्युत्पलपत्राभा दुर्धरेण निपातिताः ।।
data.es: Durdhara pierced into the head of Hanuman with five sharp arrows and polished steel shafts with yellow tips (gold) shining like red lotus petals. They were like petals of lilies thrown on the head of Hanuman (causing no pain).

data.v: स तैः पञ्चभिराविद्धः शरैः शिरसि वानरः । उत्पपात नदन्व्योम्नि दिशो दश विनादयन् ।।
data.es: With five arrows pierced in the head of the vanara, Hanuman leaped into the sky with terrible roar, which resounded in all the ten directions.

data.v: ततस्तु दुर्धरो वीरः सरथः सज्जकार्मुकः । किरञ्शरशतैर्नैकैरभिपेदे महाबलः ।।
data.es: Then the powerful, hero, Durdhara, mounted on his chariot, fastened his bowstring and hit Hanuman with hundreds of sharp arrows.

data.v: स कपिर्वारयामास तं व्योम्नि शरवर्षिणम् । वृष्टिमन्तं पयोदान्ते पयोदमिव मारुतः ।।
data.es: The great monkey kept away the showering arrows like the wind prevents raincloud from showering rain drops at the end of monsoon.

data.v: अर्द्यमानस्ततस्तेन दुर्धरेणानिलात्मजः । चकार निनदं भूयो व्यवर्धत च वेगवान् ।।
data.es: When the son of the Windgod was attacked by Durdhara, he again grew in size

data.v: स दूरं सहसोत्पत्य दुर्धरस्य रथे हरिः । निपपात महावेगो विद्युद्राशिर्गिराविव ।।
data.es: Hanuman suddenly leaped far off into the air at high speed and fell on Durdhara's chariot just like a thunderous lightning falls on a mountain.

data.v: ततस्तं मथिताष्टाश्वं रथं भग्नाक्षकूवरम् । विहाय न्यपतद्भूमौ दुर्धरस्त्यक्तजीवितः ।।
data.es: Having lost his chariot, the horses yoked to it killed, its axle and pole broken to pieces, Durdhara fell down dead from the chariot.

data.v: तं विरूपाक्षयूपाक्षौ दृष्ट्वा निपतितं भुवि । संजातरोषौ दुर्धर्षावुत्पेततुररिंदमौ ।।
data.es: Seeing the body of Durdhara fallen on the ground, enraged Virupaksha and Yupaksha, the unassailable crushers of enemies leaped towards him.

data.v: स ताभ्यां सहसोत्पत्य विष्ठितो विमलेऽम्बरे । मुद्गराभ्यां महाबाहुर्वक्षस्यभिहतः कपिः ।।
data.es: As the strongarmed vanara stood stationed in the clear white sky both the generals leaped into the sky and hit him all of a sudden with two iron hammers.

data.v: तयोर्वेगवतोर्वेगं विनिहत्य महाबलः । निपपात पुनर्भूमौ सुपर्णसमविक्रमः ।।
data.es: Powerful Hanuman, an equal to Garuda in valour fell down while resisting the swift generals.

data.v: स सालवृक्षमासाद्य समुत्पाट्य च वानरः । तावुभौ राक्षसौ वीरौ जघान पवनात्मजः ।।
data.es: Then the son of the Windgod seized a sala tree uprooted it, lifted it and smashed the two giant generals with it.

data.v: ततस्तांस्त्रीन्हताञ्ज्ञात्वा वानरेण तरस्विना । अभिपेदे महावेगः प्रसह्य प्रघसो हरिम् ।।
data.es: Finding all the three generals dead, swift Praghasa advanced towards the Vanara and attacked him. Valiant Bhasakarna also lifted a trident and attacked him. Both were famous for swift and violent action in war

data.v: भासकर्णश्च संक्रुद्धः शूलमादाय वीर्यवान् । एकतः कपिशार्दूलं यशस्विनमवस्थितौ ।।
पट्टिशेन शिताग्रेण प्रघसः प्रत्यपोथयत् । भासकर्णश्च शूलेन राक्षसः कपिसत्तमम् ।।
data.es: Praghasa fought back the glorious tiger among vanaras with a sharp crowbar on one side and Bhaskarana attacked with a spear from the other.

data.v: स ताभ्यां विक्षतैर्गात्रैरसृग्दिग्धतनूरुहः । अभवद्वानरः क्रुद्धो बालसूर्यसमप्रभः ।।
data.es: Attacked by both the generals, the fur on the vanara's body was smeared with blood from his wounded limbs, shining like the rising Sun smeared with blood became furious.

data.v: समुत्पाट्य गिरेः शृङ्गं समृगव्यालपादपम् । जघान हनुमान्वीरो राक्षसौ कपिकुञ्जरः ।।
data.es: Hanuman, a courageous and mighty elephant among the monkeys uprooted a mountain peak along with its animals, serpents and trees and killed both the demon generals.

data.v: ततस्तेष्ववसन्नेषु सेनापतिषु पञ्चसु । बलं तदवशेषं तु नाशयामास वानरः ।।
data.es: When the five army chiefs were killed, Hanuman began to destoy the remaining army force.

data.v: अश्वैरश्वान्गजैर्नागान्योधैर्योधान्रथै रथान् । स कपिर्नाशयामास सहस्राक्ष इवासुरान् ।।
data.es: The vanara pitted horses against horses, elephants against elephants, warriors against warriors and chariots against chariots as Indra destroyed demons.

data.v: हतैर्नागैश्च तुरगैर्भग्नाक्षैश्च महारथैः । हतैश्च राक्षसैर्भूमी रुद्धमार्गा समन्ततः ।।
data.es: There was no path (one could not move forward) with elephants, and horses killed and with broken axles of great chariots and smashed chariots spread all over the way.

data.v: ततः कपिस्तान्ध्वजिनीपतीन्रणे; निहत्य वीरान्सबलान्सवाहनान् । तदेव वीरः परिगृह्य तोरणं; कृतक्षणः काल इव प्रजाक्षये ।।
data.es: Then the heroic monkey having killed the army generals and their army and destroyed their vehicles in war came back to the archway after reviewing and stood like the timespirit bent upon the destruction of humanity.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे षट्चत्वारिंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fortysixth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: सेनापतीन्पञ्च स तु प्रमापिता;न्हनूमता सानुचरान्सवाहनान् । समीक्ष्य राजा समरोद्धतोन्मुखं; कुमारमक्षं प्रसमैक्षताक्षतम् ।।
data.es: Hearing the sad news of death of the five army generals including their followers and destruction of their vehicles, King (Ravana) gave a suggestive look at prince Aksha who was inclined to fight the war.

data.v: स तस्य दृष्ट्यर्पणसंप्रचोदितः; प्रतापवान्काञ्चनचित्रकार्मुकः । समुत्पपाताथ सदस्युदीरितो; द्विजातिमुख्यैर्हविषेव पावकः ।।
data.es: Spurred by the mere glance of Ravana, the glorious Aksha with his wonderful bow inlaid with gold sprang up from the royal assembly just as flame rises from firesanctuary when oblations are poured in by reputed brahmins.

data.v: ततो महद्बालदिवाकरप्रभं; प्रतप्तजाम्बूनदजालसंततम् । रथां समास्थाय ययौ स वीर्यवा;न्महाहरिं तं प्रति नैरृतर्षभः ।।
