data.es: Coming to know that the two princes were sighing in relief, Hanuman presented the token of identification given by Sita to Rama, after having communicated in full the messsage of Sita in an orderly manner.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे पञ्चषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtyfifth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: एवमुक्तो हनुमता रामो दशरथात्मजः । तं मणिं हृदये कृत्वा प्ररुरोद सलक्ष्मणः ।।
data.es: Thus addressed by Hanuman, Rama held the token (Chudamani) against his bosom and wept with Lakshmana.

data.v: तं तु दृष्ट्वा मणिश्रेष्ठं राघवः शोककर्शितः । नेत्राभ्यामश्रुपूर्णाभ्यां सुग्रीवमिदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Seeing the precious jewel, Rama's eyes were filled with tears. Overwhelmed with grief, he spoke to Sugriva.

data.v: यथैव धेनुः स्रवति स्नेहाद्वत्सस्य वत्सला । तथा ममापि हृदयं मणिरत्नस्य दर्शनात् ।।
data.es: "Just as a cow fond of its calf begins to distil milk from its teats at the sight of the calf, so does my heart melt at the sight of this excellent jewel.

data.v: मणिरत्नमिदं दत्तं वैदेह्याः श्वशुरेण मे । वधूकाले यथा बद्धमधिकं मूर्ध्नि शोभते ।।
अयं हि जलसंभूतो मणिः प्रवरपूजितः । यज्ञे परमतुष्टेन दत्तः शक्रेण धीमता ।।
data.es: "This was found in water and was bestowed by Indra out of great joy on Janaka who had performed a grand sacrificial ceremony. So it was worshipped by elders of the family.

data.v: इमं दृष्ट्वा मणिश्रेष्ठं तथा तातस्य दर्शनम् । अद्यास्म्यवगतः सौम्य वैदेहस्य तथा विभोः ।।
data.es: "O noble Sugriva now when I see this excellent jewel, I get direct sight of my father and king of Videha (in the same way as I obtained the sight of Sita).

data.v: अयं हि शोभते तस्याः प्रियाया मूर्ध्नि मे मणिः । अद्यास्य दर्शनेनाहं प्राप्तां तामिव चिन्तये ।।
data.es: "This jewel was shining on the head of my beloved. Now its mere look makes me feel that I am seeing her.

data.v: किमाह सीता वैदेही ब्रूहि सौम्य पुनः पुनः । परासुमिव तोयेन सिञ्चन्ती वाक्यवारिणा ।।
data.es: "O handsome Hanuman Sita is like water for a thirsty person. Tell me again and again what Sita said to you. Sprinkle on me (lifegiving) water of her words in the form of message.

data.v: इतस्तु किं दुःखतरं यदिमं वारिसंभवम् । मणिं पश्यामि सौमित्रे वैदेहीमागतं विना ।।
data.es: "O Saumitri I see this jewel born (formed) under water but not her. What can be more sorrowful to me?

data.v: चिरं जीवति वैदेही यदि मासं धरिष्यति । क्षणं सौम्य न जीवेयं विना तामसितेक्षणाम् ।।
नय मामपि तं देशं यत्र दृष्टा मम प्रिया । न तिष्ठेयं क्षणमपि प्रवृत्तिमुपलभ्य च ।।
data.es: "Take me to the place you saw my beloved. Knowing where she is I cannot stay here even for a moment.

data.v: कथं सा मम सुश्रोणि भीरु भीरुः सती तदा । भयावहानां घोराणां मध्ये तिष्ठति रक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: "She is always very timid. How can my fairhipped beloved remain in the midst of dreadful and fearsome demons?

data.v: शारदस्तिमिरोन्मुखो नूनं चन्द्र इवाम्बुदैः । आवृतं वदनं तस्या न विराजति राक्षसैः ।।
data.es: "Her face resembling the autumnal Moon bereft of its stain, though covered with rainclouds does not shine so bright.

data.v: किमाह सीता हनुमंस्तत्त्वतः कथयस्व मे । एतेन खलु जीविष्ये भेषजेनातुरो यथा ।।
data.es: "O Hanuman Tell me now truly what has been told by her. I am eager to know. Indeed, it will keep me alive just as medicne does. (I shall survive on the strength of her message)

data.v: मधुरा मधुरालापा किमाह मम भामिनी । मद्विहीना वरारोहा हनुमन्कथयस्व मे । दुःखाद्दुःखतरं प्राप्य कथं जीवति जानकी ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ससयत], अज्ञातम् [१२: यसभर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततम], अज्ञातम् [१२: ससतभ]

data.es: That lovely Sita who speaks sweetly, that fairhipped beautiful one who has been separated from me, my beloved, what did she say? Please narrate.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे षट्षष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtysixth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु हनुमान्राघवेण महात्मना । सीताया भाषितं सर्वं न्यवेदयत राघवे ।।
data.es: Thus asked by Sri Rama, Hanuman repeated everything spoken by Sita to Rama.

data.v: इदमुक्तवती देवी जानकी पुरुषर्षभ । पूर्ववृत्तमभिज्ञानं चित्रकूटे यथा तथम् ।।
data.es: "O bull among men queen Janaki related to me as a token of identification an incident that had taken place at Chitrakuta in the past.

data.v: सुखसुप्ता त्वया सार्धं जानकी पूर्वमुत्थिता । वायसः सहसोत्पत्य विरराद स्तनान्तरे ।।
data.es: "When she was lying on your lap happily she awoke early and a crow came swiftly and scratched on her breast.

data.v: पर्यायेण च सुप्तस्त्वं देव्यङ्के भरताग्रज । पुनश्च किल पक्षी स देव्या जनयति व्यथाम् ।।
data.es: "O Bharata's brother, when Sita awoke from sleep you slept on her lap. The same crow again hurt her.

data.v: ततः पुनरुपागम्य विरराद भृशं किल । ततस्त्वं बोधितस्तस्याः शोणितेन समुक्षितः ।।
वायसेन च तेनैव सततं बाध्यमानया । बोधितः किल देव्यास्त्वं सुखसुप्तः परंतप ।।
data.es: "O scorcher of enemies pained by the crow hurting her repeatedly, while you were sleeping happily, she woke you up and informed you about it.

data.v: तां तु दृष्ट्वा महाबाहो रादितां च स्तनान्तरे । आशीविष इव क्रुद्धो निःश्वसन्नभ्यभाषथाः ।।
data.es: 'O strongarmed Rama, seeing my torn breasts, you became angry like a hissing serpent and hissing said :

data.v: नखाग्रैः केन ते भीरु दारितं तु स्तनान्तरम् । कः क्रीडति सरोषेण पञ्चवक्त्रेण भोगिना ।।
data.es: 'O Sita with a beautiful lap like an elephant trunk by whom is your bosom wounded? Who is sporting with an angry fivehooded snake?

data.v: निरीक्षमाणः सहसा वायसं समवैक्षताः । नखैः सरुधिरैस्तीक्ष्णैर्मामेवाभिमुखं स्थितम् ।।
data.es: 'Then looking around, you saw the crow facing me with sharp, bloodstained claws.

data.v: सुतः किल स शक्रस्य वायसः पततां वरः । धरान्तरचरः शीघ्रं पवनस्य गतौ समः ।।
data.es: 'This crow was the best of birds. He was surely Indra's son who had covered a long distance with great speed and his speed was like the Windgod's.

data.v: ततस्तस्मिन्महाबाहो कोपसंवर्तितेक्षणः । वायसे त्वं कृत्वाः क्रूरां मतिं मतिमतां वर ।।
data.es: 'Then you, the strongarmed and best among the wise, your eyeballs rolling in fury, made up your mind about the cruel crow.

data.v: स दर्भं संस्तराद्गृह्य ब्रह्मास्त्रेण न्ययोजयः । स दीप्त इव कालाग्निर्जज्वालाभिमुखः खगम् ।।
data.es: 'Taking out a blade of darbha grass from your mat, you invoked the weapon of Brahma by reciting the mantra. Then you discharged it which blazed like the fire of death and went spearheading towards the crow.

data.v: स त्वं प्रदीप्तं चिक्षेप दर्भं तं वायसं प्रति । ततस्तु वायसं दीप्तः स दर्भोऽनुजगाम ह ।।
data.es: 'Then you threw the burning darbha grass at the crow and it chased him in the sky.

data.v: स पित्रा च परित्यक्तः सुरैः सर्वैर्महर्षिभिः । त्रीँल्लोकान्संपरिक्रम्य त्रातारं नाधिगच्छति ।।
data.es: 'Then the crow went round all the three worlds, having been rejected by his father Indra, including all the sages and gods. Refused by all he came back to Rama seeking shelter.

data.v: तं त्वं निपतितं भूमौ शरण्यः शरणागतम् । वधार्हमपि काकुत्स्थ कृपया परिपालयः ।।
data.es: 'Seeing the crow fallen on the ground, O Kakutstha, you who are a saviour of those who seek refuge saved him out of compassion, even though he deserved to be killed.

data.v: मोघमस्त्रं न शक्यं तु कर्तुमित्येव राघव । ततस्तस्याक्षिकाकस्य हिनस्ति स्म स दक्षिणम् ।।
data.es: 'O Rama since a divine weapon cannot be withdrawn, it did strike his right eye'.

data.v: राम त्वां स नमस्कृत्वा राज्ञो दशरथस्य च । विसृष्टस्तु तदा काकः प्रतिपेदे खमालयम् ।।
data.es: 'That crow offered salutations to you Rama and king Dasaratha, thereafter took permission and went to his own dwelling.

data.v: एवमस्त्रविदां श्रेष्ठः सत्त्ववाञ्शीलवानपि । किमर्थमस्त्रं रक्षःसु न योजयसि राघव ।।
data.es: 'Even though you are an expert in the use of weapons, truthful and strong. (Yet) why are you not using weapons aganst the demons?'

data.v: न नागा नापि गन्धर्वा नासुरा न मरुद्गणाः । तव राम मुखे स्थातुं शक्ताः प्रतिसमाधितुम् ।।
data.es: (Now Sita turns to Hanuman and says) "In war serpents, gandharvas, demons or Marutas cannot withstand the speed of Rama's arrows and hit back.

data.v: तव वीर्यवतः कच्चिन्मयि यद्यस्ति संभ्रमः । क्षिप्रं सुनिशितैर्बाणैर्हन्यतां युधि रावणः ।।
data.es: 'If you have any anxiety about me, you will certainly slay Ravana in the battle immediately with your sharp arrows'.

data.v: भ्रातुरादेशमादाय लक्ष्मणो वा परंतपः । स किमर्थं नरवरो न मां रक्षति राघवः ।।
data.es: "Or, why does the mighty hero, Lakshmana, who is a scorcher of enemies, not come to my rescue taking the orders from his brother?

data.v: शक्तौ तौ पुरुषव्याघ्रौ वाय्वग्निसमतेजसौ । सुराणामपि दुर्धर्षौ किमर्थं मामुपेक्षतः ।।
data.es: "Both Rama and Lakshmana are tigers among men who resemble wind and fire in power and have the unassailability of the gods. Wherefore are they disregarding me?.

data.v: ममैव दुष्कृतं किंचिन्महदस्ति न संशयः । समर्थौ सहितौ यन्मां नापेक्षेते परंतपौ ।।
data.es: "Perhaps I must have committed an atrocious sin. There is no doubt. For although both of them are scorchers of enemies, they deliver me not."

data.v: वैदेह्या वचनं श्रुत्वा करुणं साश्रुभाषितम् । पुनरप्यहमार्यां तामिदं वचनमब्रुवम् ।।
data.es: Hearing the piteous words of Vaidehi and beholding her eyes filled with tears, the Windgod's son, lustrous Hanuman replied thus:.

data.v: त्वच्छोकविमुखो रामो देवि सत्येन ते शपे । रामे दुःखाभिभूते च लक्ष्मणः परितप्यते ।।
data.es: "O godlike lady Rama is not averse to your misery. On my word this is true. Rama is immersed in sorrow. Even Lakshmana wails.

data.v: कथंचिद्भवती दृष्टा न कालः परिशोचितुम् । इमं मुहूर्तं दुःखानामन्तं द्रक्ष्यसि भामिनि ।।
data.es: "I could find you with difficulty. This is not the time to wail. O blameless lady take it, your sorrow has come to an end at this moment.

data.v: तावुभौ नरशार्दूलौ राजपुत्रावरिंदमौ । त्वद्दर्शनकृतोत्साहौ लङ्कां भस्मीकरिष्यतः ।।
data.es: "Both the mighty brothers, tigers among men, are eager to see you. Both the princes will reduce this Lanka into ashes.

data.v: हत्वा च समरे रौद्रं रावणं सह बान्धवम् । राघवस्त्वां महाबाहुः स्वां पुरीं नयते ध्रुवम् ।।
data.es: "O largeeyed lady cruel Ravana along with his relatives will be killed by Rama in war and Rama will return to his city with you.

data.v: यत्तु रामो विजानीयादभिज्ञानमनिन्दिते । प्रीतिसंजननं तस्य प्रदातुं तत्त्वमर्हसि ।।
data.es: "O unimpeachable lady give one more identification which would make him more happy".

data.v: साभिवीक्ष्य दिशः सर्वा वेण्युद्ग्रथनमुत्तमम् । मुक्त्वा वस्त्राद्ददौ मह्यं मणिमेतं महाबल ।।
data.es: "O mighty Rama, she glanced at all directions and untied the end of her garment in which she had this best jewel worn on her hair preserved and gave it to me.

data.v: प्रतिगृह्य मणिं दिव्यं तव हेतो रघूत्तम । शिरसा संप्रणम्यैनामहमागमने त्वरे ।।
data.es: "O foremost among the Raghus I took that wonderful gem for your sake from the noble lady and offered her salutations, bowing my head, and returned quickly৷৷

data.v: गमने च कृतोत्साहमवेक्ष्य वरवर्णिनी । विवर्धमानं च हि मामुवाच जनकात्मजा । अश्रुपूर्णमुखी दीना बाष्पसंदिग्धभाषिणी ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: ससभभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरयस], अज्ञातम् [१२: जसयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: यततर]

data.es: Seeing Hanuman eager to leap, enlarging his body quickly, she appeared pitiable with her face filled with tears and throat choked.

data.v: हनुमन्सिंहसंकाशौ तावुभौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । सुग्रीवं च सहामात्यं सर्वान्ब्रूया अनामयम् ।।
data.es: "O Hanuman the great communicate my welfare to both Rama and Lakshmana, to Sugriva, his ministers, elderly vanaras in righteous order.

data.v: यथा च स महाबाहुर्मां तारयति राघवः । अस्माद्दुःखाम्बुसंरोधात्तत्समाधातुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: "You must pacify the strongarmed Rama in a manner by which he will help me to cross the ocean of grief and rlieve me.

data.v: इमं च तीव्रं मम शोकवेगं; रक्षोभिरेभिः परिभर्त्सनं च । ब्रूयास्तु रामस्य गतः समीपं; शिवश्च तेऽध्वास्तु हरिप्रवीर ।।
data.es: "Foremost vanara tell Rama about my intense grief as well as the threats of the demons. May your journey be happy.

data.v: एतत्तवार्या नृपराजसिंह; सीता वचः प्राह विषादपूर्वम् । एतच्च बुद्ध्वा गदितं मया त्वं; श्रद्धत्स्व सीतां कुशलां समग्राम् ।।
data.es: "O lion among kings noble Sita has spoken these words in grief: 'Make him know all this and tell him that Sita is faithful and safe in all respects.'इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे सप्तषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtyseventh sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: अथाहमुत्तरं देव्या पुनरुक्तः ससंभ्रमम् । तव स्नेहान्नरव्याघ्र सौहार्यादनुमान्य च ।।
data.es: "O tiger among men In view of her regards for me and and her love for you she was confident and once again addressed me:

data.v: एवं बहुविधं वाच्यो रामो दाशरथिस्त्वया । यथा मामाप्नुयाच्छीघ्रं हत्वा रावणमाहवे ।।
data.es: 'You may appeal to Rama, the son of Dasaratha in many ways, that he should come quickly and slay Ravana in the battle and get me back.

data.v: यदि वा मन्यसे वीर वसैकाहमरिंदम । कस्मिंश्चित्संवृते देशे विश्रान्तः श्वो गमिष्यसि ।।
data.es: "O destroyer of enemies if you think of halting for a day you may do so in a solitary location and leave tomorrow.

data.v: मम चाप्यल्पभाग्यायाः साम्निध्यात्तव वानर । अस्य शोकविपाकस्य मुहूर्तं स्याद्विमोक्षणम् ।।
data.es: "Your presence will relieve me of my suffering, if you stay here for a while.

data.v: गते हि त्वयि विक्रान्ते पुनरागमनाय वै । प्राणानामपि संदेहो मम स्यान्नात्र संशयः ।।
data.es: "O tiger among vanaras if you leave this place to come again, my life will be uncertain, (if your coming is uncertain). There is no doubt about it.

data.v: तवादर्शनजः शोको भूयो मां परितापयेत् । दुःखाद्दुःखपराभूतां दुर्गतां दुःखभागिनीम् ।।
data.es: "My agony would be increased further by not seeing you. It would be inflamming my agony and I would be even more pained.

data.v: अयं तु वीरसंदेहस्तिष्ठतीव ममाग्रतः । सुमहांस्त्वत्सहायेषु हर्यृक्षेषु असंशयः ।।
data.es: "O heroic chief of vanaras I am doubtful as to whether vanaras and bears can extend help?

data.v: कथं नु खलु दुष्पारं तरिष्यन्ति महोदधिम् । तानि हर्यृक्षसैन्यानि तौ वा नरवरात्मजौ ।।
data.es: "How can the army of vanaras and bears, for that matter, princes Rama and Lakshmana negotiate the ocean, which is difficult to cross?

data.v: त्रयाणामेव भूतानां सागरस्यास्य लङ्घने । शक्तिः स्याद्वैनतेयस्य वायोर्वा तव वानघ ।।
data.es: "It is only three beings who have the capacity to leap over this ocean. Garuda, or you or the Windgod.

data.v: तदस्मिन्कार्यनियोगे वीरैवं दुरतिक्रमे । किं पश्यसि समाधानं ब्रूहि कार्यविदां वर ।।
data.es: "What means do you, being the foremost hero among the three who are capable performing this difficult task, foresee?

data.v: काममस्य त्वमेवैकः कार्यस्य परिसाधने । पर्याप्तः परवीरघ्न यशस्यस्ते बलोदयः ।।
data.es: "O slayer of enemy heroes if you alone can accomplish this task the fame of doing this will be yours.

data.v: बलैः समग्रैर्यदि मां हत्वा रावणमाहवे । विजयी स्वां पुरीं रामो नयेत्तत्स्याद्यशस्करम् ।।
data.es: "It would be worthy of Rama if he with his entire army emerges victorious over Ravana in a battle and takes me to his city.

data.v: यथाहं तस्य वीरस्य वनादुपधिना हृता । रक्षसा तद्भयादेव तथा नार्हति राघवः ।।
data.es: 'Tell valiant Rama not to take me back the way Ravana, the demon abducted me out of fear. Which is not right.

data.v: बलैस्तु संकुलां कृत्वा लङ्कां परबलार्दनः । मां नयेद्यदि काकुत्स्थस्तत्तस्य सदृशं भवेत् ।।
data.es: "If Kakutstha (Rama), slayer of the enemy army fills the entire Lanka with his arrows and takes me, then his action will be worthy of him.

data.v: तद्यथा तस्य विक्रान्तमनुरूपं महात्मनः । भवत्याहवशूरस्य तथा त्वमुपपादय ।।
data.es: "You may make arrangement in such a manner that, that great self, the hero in war makes his victorious march which is worthy of him."

data.v: तदर्थोपहितं वाक्यं प्रश्रितं हेतुसंहितम् । निशम्याहं ततः शेषं वाक्यमुत्तरमब्रुवम् ।।
data.es: Having heard the meaningful, courteous and logical words of Sita, Hanuman replied:

data.v: देवि हर्यृक्षसैन्यानामीश्वरः प्लवतां वरः । सुग्रीवः सत्त्वसंपन्नस्तवार्थे कृतनिश्चयः ।।
data.es: "O Devi the lord of monkeys, Sugriva heads the army of vanaras and bears. He is richly endowed with satvaguna and is determined to accomplish your cause and free you from sorrow.

data.v: तस्य विक्रमसंपन्नाः सत्त्ववन्तो महाबलाः । मनःसंकल्पसंपाता निदेशे हरयः स्थिताः ।।
data.es: "Valiant, virtuous and powerful vanaras who can leap with the speed of mind are awaiting orders (of Sugriva).

data.v: येषां नोपरि नाधस्तान्न तिर्यक्सज्जते गतिः । न च कर्मसु सीदन्ति महत्स्वमिततेजसः ।।
data.es: "Their course cannot be impeded either upward, or downward or right or left. They are indeed very brilliant and would never fail in any task.

data.v: असकृत्तैर्महाभागैर्वानरैर्बलसंयुतैः । प्रदक्षिणीकृता भूमिर्वायुमार्गानुसारिभिः ।।
data.es: "They have often circumambulated the earth including its oceans and mountains through the aerial path with great enthusiasm.

data.v: मद्विशिष्टाश्च तुल्याश्च सन्ति तत्र वनौकसः । मत्तः प्रत्यवरः कश्चिन्नास्ति सुग्रीवसंनिधौ ।।
data.es: "The vanaras under Sugriva who move in the forest are more powerful than me or equal to me. None is inferior to me.

data.v: अहं तावदिह प्राप्तः किं पुनस्ते महाबलाः । न हि प्रकृष्टाः प्रेष्यन्ते प्रेष्यन्ते हीतरे जनाः ।।
data.es: "If I have managed to come here, why not the other powerful ones? The superior leaders are not sent (as messengers). Only ordinary ones like me are.

data.v: तदलं परितापेन देवि मन्युर्व्यपैतु ते । एकोत्पातेन ते लङ्कामेष्यन्ति हरियूथपाः ।।
data.es: "O noble lady therefore, give up your agony. Enough of your lamentation. The monkey troops will reach this place in one stride.

data.v: मम पृष्ठगतौ तौ च चन्द्रसूर्याविवोदितौ । त्वत्सकाशं महाभागे नृसिंहावागमिष्यतः ।।
data.es: "Both the valiant Rama and Lakshmana, lions among men, looking brilliant like Sun and Moon will come to you riding on my back.

data.v: अरिघ्नं सिंहसंकाशं क्षिप्रं द्रक्ष्यसि राघवम् । लक्ष्मणं च धनुष्पाणिं लङ्का द्वारमुपस्थितम् ।।
data.es: "Very soon you would see the slayer of foes, who is an accomplished wielder of the bow (Rama) along with Lakshmana at the entrance of Lanka.

data.v: नखदंष्ट्रायुधान्वीरान्सिंहशार्दूलविक्रमान् । वानरान्वानरेन्द्राभान्क्षिप्रं द्रक्ष्यसि संगतान् ।।
data.es: "You will soon see heroic vanaras whose weapons are their teeth, who are like lion and tiger in their valour. They are (mighty) like wellbred elephants.

data.v: शैलाम्बुदन्निकाशानां लङ्कामलयसानुषु । नर्दतां कपिमुख्यानामचिराच्छोष्यसे स्वनम् ।।
data.es: "O respectable lady you would see many troops of vanara chiefs who resemble clouds hovering on the mountain peaks of Lankaroaring.

data.v: निवृत्तवनवासं च त्वया सार्धमरिंदमम् । अभिषिक्तमयोध्यायां क्षिप्रं द्रक्ष्यसि राघवम् ।।
data.es: 'You will soon see Rama, the slayer of enemies crowned as king of Ayodhya with you, having duly completed the term of exile in the forest'.

data.v: ततो मया वाग्भिरदीनभाषिणी; शिवाभिरिष्टाभिरभिप्रसादिता । जगाम शान्तिं मम मैथिलात्मजा; तवापि शोकेन तथाभिपीडिता ।।
data.es: "Sita though afflicted heard from me that you were also in excessive grief on account of separation from her and from my soothing, auspicious and welcome words, she derived comfort and remained quiet"৷৷इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे अष्टषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtyeighth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: श्रुत्वा हनुमतो वाक्यं यथावदभिभाषितम् । रामः प्रीतिसमायुक्तो वाक्यमुत्तरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Having heard Hanuman's words, full of love, Rama replied.

data.v: कृतं हनुमता कार्यं सुमहद्भुवि दुष्करम् । मनसापि यदन्येन न शक्यं धरणीतले ।।
data.es: "Hanuman You have performed a mighty task indeed, which is difficult even to think of in this world and not possible for any one else on this earth."

data.v: न हि तं परिपश्यामि यस्तरेत महार्णवम् । अन्यत्र गरुणाद्वायोरन्यत्र च हनूमतः ।।
data.es: "None else than Garuda or Vayu have I seen to have crossed this great ocean crossed by you, Hanuman."

data.v: देवदानवयक्षाणां गन्धर्वोरगरक्षसाम् । अप्रधृष्यां पुरीं लङ्कां रावणेन सुरक्षिताम् ।।
data.es: "Indeed, who has the strength to return alive after entering that city highly protected by Ravana. It is unimaginable even for devas, danavas, yakshas, gandharvas, uragas and rakshasas to cross."

data.v: प्रविष्टः सत्त्वमाश्रित्य जीवन्को नाम निष्क्रमेत् । को विशेत्सुदुराधर्षां राक्षसैश्च सुरक्षिताम् । यो वीर्यबलसंपन्नो न समः स्याद्धनूमतः ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यभतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जतभम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यररम], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसयभ]

data.es: "Except for Hanuman, who is abounding in valour and strength, it is not possible for others to enter the inaccessible Lanka highly protected by rakshasas."

data.v: भृत्यकार्यं हनुमता सुग्रीवस्य कृतं महत् । एवं विधाय स्वबलं सदृशं विक्रमस्य च ।।
data.es: "Hanuman, with his mighty form and valour not only carried out a great task assigned by Sugriva but also what had to be done as duty."

data.v: यो हि भृत्यो नियुक्तः सन्भर्त्रा कर्मणि दुष्करे । कुर्यात्तदनुरागेण तमाहुः पुरुषोत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "He, who carries out a formidable task entrusted to him by the master, with love is said to be the best among men."

data.v: नियुक्तो नृपतेः कार्यं न कुर्याद्यः समाहितः । भृत्यो युक्तः समर्थश्च तमाहुः पुरुषाधमम् ।।
data.es: An efficient servant does not only do what is asked but also does the work dear to the king. One who does not do so is said to be mediocre.

data.v: तन्नियोगे नियुक्तेन कृतं कृत्यं हनूमता । न चात्मा लघुतां नीतः सुग्रीवश्चापि तोषितः ।।
data.es: "Having done the task assigned to him, Hanuman carried out what had to be done and accomplished without difficulty. This made Sugriva also happy."

data.v: अहं च रघुवंशश्च लक्ष्मणश्च महाबलः । वैदेह्या दर्शनेनाद्य धर्मतः परिरक्षिताः ।।
data.es: "On Hanuman finding Vaidehi, I and, mighty Lakshmana and the whole of Raghu dynasty are now rightfully protected."

data.v: इदं तु मम दीनस्या मनो भूयः प्रकर्षति । यदिहास्य प्रियाख्यातुर्न कुर्मि सदृशं प्रियम् ।।
data.es: "On the other hand, it is a pity that I am not able to please such a person who has spoken pleasing words. Further this causes grief to me."

data.v: एष सर्वस्वभूतस्तु परिष्वङ्गो हनूमतः । मया कालमिमं प्राप्य दत्तस्तस्य महात्मनः ।।
data.es: "To such a great one who attained success at this time, everything can be given. I give my embrace."

data.v: सर्वथा सुकृतं तावत्सीतायाः परिमार्गणम् । सागरं तु समासाद्य पुनर्नष्टं मनो मम ।।
data.es: "By all means good work was done in searching for Sita. On the contrary, having succeeded, my mind is once again agitated when I think of (crossing) the ocean."

data.v: कथं नाम समुद्रस्य दुष्पारस्य महाम्भसः । हरयो दक्षिणं पारं गमिष्यन्ति समाहिताः ।।
data.es: "How will all the monkeys together be able to cross to the southern shore of the vast ocean? It is difficult to cross."

data.v: यद्यप्येष तु वृत्तान्तो वैदेह्या गदितो मम । समुद्रपारगमने हरीणां किमिवोत्तरम् ।।
data.es: "This has been told to me by Vaidehi. How will the monkeys cross the ocean(enquired Vaidehi)."

data.v: इत्युक्त्वा शोकसंभ्रान्तो रामः शत्रुनिबर्हणः । हनूमन्तं महाबाहुस्ततो ध्यानमुपागमत् ।।
data.es: Agitated with sorrow, mighty armed Rama, the destroyer of enemies approached Hanuman and reflected (about the crossing of the ocean).

data.v: तं तु शोकपरिद्यूनं रामं दशरथात्मजम् । उवाच वचनं श्रीमान्सुग्रीवः शोकनाशनम् ।।
data.es: Glorious Sugriva spoke such words of advice to remove the agony of Rama,son of Dasaratha, who was filled with sorrow.

data.v: किं त्वं संतप्यसे वीर यथान्यः प्राकृतस्तथा । मैवं भूस्त्यज संतापं कृतघ्न इव सौहृदम् ।।
data.es: "Heroic Rama Why are you grieving like a common man? Give up your grief just like an ungrateful one gives up friendship."

data.v: संतापस्य च ते स्थानं न हि पश्यामि राघव । प्रवृत्तावुपलब्धायां ज्ञाते च निलये रिपोः ।।
data.es: "Raghava Having secured the information (of Sita) and known the location of the enemy's residence, I do not see the reason for your mourning."

data.v: धृतिमाञ्शास्त्रवित्प्राज्ञः पण्डितश्चासि राघव । त्यजेमां पापिकां बुद्धिं कृत्वात्मेवार्थदूषणीम् ।।
data.es: "Raghava You are an intellectual, well versed in Sastras, wise and learned. Give up this sinful thought just as the one who is efficient gives up the one who violates subtle truth."

data.v: समुद्रं लङ्घयित्वा तु महानक्रसमाकुलम् । लङ्कामारोहयिष्यामो हनिष्यामश्च ते रिपुम् ।।
data.es: "If we cross over that ocean infested with huge crocodiles and ascend the fortress of Lanka, know that the enemy is killed."

data.v: निरुत्साहस्य दीनस्य शोकपर्याकुलात्मनः । सर्वार्था व्यवसीदन्ति व्यसनं चाधिगच्छति ।।
data.es: "One who is despondent, dejected and overwhelmed with grief, will be dispirited in all matters. Not only that with worry he will meet with disaster."

data.v: इमे शूराः समर्थाश्च सर्वे नो हरियूथपाः । त्वत्प्रियार्थं कृतोत्साहाः प्रवेष्टुमपि पावकम् ।।
data.es: All these vanara leaders and heroes are highly capable and for your happiness they are even ready to enter fire. I know this from their joy and I even infer that it is certain (to happen).

data.v: एषां हर्षेण जानामि तर्कश्चास्मिन्दृढो मम । विक्रमेण समानेष्ये सीतां हत्वा यथा रिपुम् ।।
सेतुरत्र यथा वध्येद्यथा पश्येम तां पुरीम् । तस्य राक्षसराजस्य तथा त्वं कुरु राघव ।।
data.es: "Raghava You think that we will be building a bridge and then seeing that city of the king of Rakshasas."

data.v: दृष्ट्वा तां हि पुरीं लङ्कां त्रिकूटशिखरे स्थिताम् । हतं च रावणं युद्धे दर्शनादुपधारय ।।
data.es: "If the city of Lanka situated on top of Trikuta mountain is seen, you can be sure that Ravana is killed."

data.v: सेतुबद्धः समुद्रे च यावल्लङ्का समीपतः । सर्वं तीर्णं च वै सैन्यं जितमित्युपधार्यताम् ।।
data.es: "On building a bridge over the large ocean up to Lanka, when all my army of vanaras can cross over, you may consider that you have won. These vanaras are heroic in war and can assume any form at will."

data.v: इमे हि समरे शूरा हरयः कामरूपिणः । तदलं विक्लवा बुद्धी राजन्सर्वार्थनाशनी ।।
पुरुषस्य हि लोकेऽस्मिञ्शोकः शौर्यापकर्षणः । यत्तु कार्यं मनुष्येण शौण्डीर्यमवलम्बता । शूराणां हि मनुष्याणां त्वद्विधानां महात्मनाम् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: तसयत], अज्ञातम् [१२: ससमम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यततर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जततत]

data.v: विनष्टे वा प्रनष्टे वा शोकः सर्वार्थनाशनः । त्वं तु बुद्धिमतां श्रेष्ठः सर्वशास्त्रार्थकोविदः ।।
मद्विधैः सचिवैः सार्थमरिं जेतुमिहार्हसि । न हि पश्याम्यहं कंचित्त्रिषु लोकेषु राघव ।।
गृहीतधनुषो यस्ते तिष्ठेदभिमुखो रणे । वानरेषु समासक्तं न ते कार्यं विपत्स्यते ।।
अचिराद्द्रक्ष्यसे सीतां तीर्त्वा सागरमक्षयम् । तदलं शोकमालम्ब्य क्रोधमालम्ब भूपते ।।
निश्चेष्टाः क्षत्रिया मन्दाः सर्वे चण्डस्य बिभ्यति । लङ्गनार्थं च घोरस्य समुद्रस्य नदीपतेः ।।
सहास्माभिरिहोपेतः सूक्ष्मबुद्धिर्विचारय । इमे हि समरे शूरा हरयः कामरूपिणः ।।
तानरीन्विधमिष्यन्ति शिलापादपवृष्टिभिः । कथंचित्परिपश्यामस्ते वयं वरुणालयम् ।।
किमुक्त्वा बहुधा चापि सर्वथा विजयी भवान् ।।
data.es: "Of what use is speaking many words. By all means you will be victorious. I see signs of it and feel highly delighted in my mind."।।इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेद्वितीयस्सर्गः।।This is the end of the second Sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic,the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: सुग्रीवस्य वचः श्रुत्वा हेतुमत्परमार्थवित् । प्रतिजग्राह काकुत्स्थो हनूमन्तमथाब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Rama the scion of Kakuthsa dynasty having accepted the wellmeaning words of Sugriva, who spoke the truth with deep understanding, turned to Hanuman and said.

data.v: तरसा सेतुबन्धेन सागरोच्छोषणेन वा । सर्वथा सुसमर्थोऽस्मि सागरस्यास्य लङ्घने ।।
data.es: "By austerity or by drying up the ocean or by any other means, I am capable of crossing the ocean."

data.v: कति दुर्गाणि दुर्गाया लङ्कायास्तद्ब्रवीहि मे । ज्ञातुमिच्छामि तत्सर्वं दर्शनादिव वानर ।।
data.es: "O Vanara How many forts are in Lanka? You may tell me whatever you have seen. I wish to know all that."

data.v: बलस्य परिमाणं च द्वारदुर्गक्रियामपि । गुप्ति कर्म च लङ्काया रक्षसां सदनानि च ।।
data.es: "Tell me in detail about the strength and size of the army, the number of gateways that are difficult to enter, the way in which the entrances have been protected by the rakshasas, and their dwellings in Lanka. Indeed you are aware of all aspects and are also capable."

data.v: यथासुखं यथावच्च लङ्कायामसि दृष्टवान् । सरमाचक्ष्व तत्त्वेन सर्वथा कुशलो ह्यसि ।।
data.es: "Tell me in detail about the strength and size of the army, the number of gateways that are difficult to enter, the way in which the entrances have been protected by the rakshasas, and their dwellings in Lanka. Indeed you are aware of all aspects and are also capable."

data.v: श्रुत्वा रामस्य वचनं हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । वाक्यं वाक्यविदां श्रेष्ठो रामं पुनरथाब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Hanuman the son of Maruti, the foremost among those who are good at speech, having heard Rama's words again said to Rama.

data.v: श्रूयतां सर्वमाख्यास्ये दुर्गकर्मविधानतः । गुप्ता पुरी यथा लङ्का रक्षिता च यथा बलैः ।।
data.es: "I will relate the way in which the city of Lanka is fortified, the way in which it is protected by secret forces, everything you wish to hear."

data.v: परां समृद्धिं लङ्कायाः सागरस्य च भीमताम् । विभागं च बलौघस्य निर्देशं वाहनस्य च ।।
data.es: Hanuman, the foremost of the vanaras said that he will truly point out everything in Lanka:"Ravana's power, the affection of rakshasas to Ravana, his prosperity, the terrifying ocean, the divisions of the army such as chariots, elephants, horses and soldiers."

data.v: प्रहृष्टा मुदिता लङ्का मत्तद्विपसमाकुला । महती रथसंपूर्णा रक्षोगणसमाकुला ।।
data.es: "The people in the vast island of Lanka are very delighted. Lanka is filled with chariots and innumerable rakshasas."

data.v: दृढबद्धकवाटानि महापरिघवन्ति च । द्वाराणि विपुलान्यस्याश्चत्वारि सुमहान्ति च ।।
data.es: "Lanka is endowed with lofty wide courtyards, entrances with doors that are fixed with metal fixtures and large iron bars."

data.v: वप्रेषूपलयन्त्राणि बलवन्ति महान्ति च । आगतं परसैन्यं तैस्तत्र प्रतिनिवार्यते ।।
data.es: "The doors are fitted with powerful machines which retaliate by discharging darts and stones on the enemy's army and kill them."

data.v: द्वारेषु संस्कृता भीमाः कालायसमयाः शिताः । शतशो रोचिता वीरैः शतघ्न्यो रक्षसां गणैः ।।
data.es: At the entrances are troops of terrific looking guards kept ready with a hundred sharpened stones studded with iron spikes.

data.v: सौवर्णश्च महांस्तस्याः प्राकारो दुष्प्रधर्षणः । मणिविद्रुमवैदूर्यमुक्ताविचरितान्तरः ।।
data.es: "Its lofty golden boundary wall encrusted here and there with gems, corals, Vaiduryas and pearls is difficult to assail."

data.v: सर्वतश्च महाभीमाः शीततोया महाशुभाः । अगाधा ग्राहवत्यश्च परिखा मीनसेविताः ।।
data.es: All round it (boundary wall) are very splendid moats filled with frighteningcold water inhabited by fish and crocodiles.

data.v: द्वारेषु तासां चत्वारः संक्रमाः परमायताः । यन्त्रैरुपेता बहुभिर्महद्भिर्दृढसंधिभिः ।।
data.es: At the entrance of the gateways around the moats are four road ways. Huge engines are fixed to move the bridges when people approach. There are rows of houses (for the guards) at the gateways.

data.v: त्रायन्ते संक्रमास्तत्र परसैन्यागमे सति । यन्त्रैस्तैरवकीर्यन्ते परिखासु समन्ततः ।।
data.es: "When the enemy arrives, the engines all over the moats lift the bridges making entry impossible for enemy armies."

data.v: एकस्त्वकम्प्यो बलवान्संक्रमः सुमहादृढः । काञ्चनैर्बहुभिः स्तम्भैर्वेदिकाभिश्च शोभितः ।।
data.es: "One of the road ways is very strong and steady, shining with unshakeable golden pillars and altars."

data.v: स्वयं प्रकृतिसंपन्नो युयुत्सू राम रावणः । उत्थितश्चाप्रमत्तश्च बलानामनुदर्शने ।।
data.es: "O Rama Ravana, who is hostile in his intentions, assuming his natural tendency which is eagerness to combat, is always very alert and looks after the army."

data.v: लङ्का पुरी निरालम्बा देवदुर्गा भयावहा । नादेयं पार्वतं वन्यं कृत्रिमं च चतुर्विधम् ।।
data.es: "Lanka is difficult to access even for devatas located on high peaks of the mountain. It is fierce to onlookers, surrounded by four kinds of forts, like rivers, mountains, forests and artificial fortresses."

data.v: स्थिता पारे समुद्रस्य दूरपारस्य राघव । नौपथश्चापि नास्त्यत्र निरादेशश्च सर्वतः ।।
data.es: "O Raghava Lanka is located on the other shore of the ocean. Passage through the sea is not possible. It is away from all and there is nothing around."

data.v: शैलाग्रे रचिता दुर्गा सा पूर्देवपुरोपमा । वाजिवारणसंपूर्णा लङ्का परमदुर्जया ।।
data.es: "It is inaccessible like the abode of devatas as it is on the peak of the mountain. It is difficult to conquer for any one as it is full of horses and elephants."

data.v: परिघाश्च शतघ्न्यश्च यन्त्राणि विविधानि च । शोभयन्ति पुरीं लङ्कां रावणस्य दुरात्मनः ।।
data.es: "Evil minded Ravana's city of Lanka is shining with moats and missiles of many kinds and machinery."

data.v: अयुतं रक्षसामत्र पश्चिमद्वारमाश्रितम् । शूलहस्ता दुराधर्षाः सर्वे खड्गाग्रयोधिनः ।।
data.es: "There(in Lanka) ten thousand warriors are garrisoned at the eastern gate way holding tridents, and those who are unassailable in war stand in front with swords."

data.v: नियुतं रक्षसामत्र दक्षिणद्वारमाश्रितम् । चतुरङ्गेण सैन्येन योधास्तत्राप्यनुत्तमाः ।।
data.es: At the southern gate also one lakh of rakshasas are garrisoned with four divisions of army. They are also the best warriors.

data.v: प्रयुतं रक्षसामत्र पूर्वद्वारं समाश्रितम् । चर्मखड्गधराः सर्वे तथा सर्वास्त्रकोविदाः ।।
data.es: "There(in Lanka) ten thousand warriors are garrisoned at the eastern gate way holding tridents, and those who are unassailable in war stand in front with swords."

data.v: अर्बुदं रक्षसामत्र उत्तरद्वारमाश्रितम् । रथिनश्चाश्ववाहाश्च कुलपुत्राः सुपूजिताः ।।
data.es: At the northern gate(of Lanka) are garrisoned one hundred crores of rakshasas constituting, charioteers, horse riding and elephant riding ogres born of noble families, respected and trustworthy (for Ravana).

data.v: शतं शतसहस्राणां मध्यमं गुल्ममाश्रितम् । यातुधाना दुराधर्षाः साग्रकोटिश्च रक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: "Hundreds and thousands of warriors who are unassailable are collected in the center(of Lanka) in multitudes of crores."

data.v: ते मया संक्रमा भग्नाः परिखाश्चावपूरिताः । दग्धा च नगरी लङ्का प्राकाराश्चावसादिताः ।।
data.es: "I have destroyed some of those roadways, even filled up the moats, burnt parts of the city of Lanka, smashed the boundary walls and killed part of the powerful army."

data.v: येन केन तु मार्गेण तराम वरुणालयम् । हतेति नगरी लङ्कां वानरैरवधार्यताम् ।।
data.es: "If by whatever means the passage of ocean can be crossed by vanaras it can be taken for granted that the city of Lanka is destroyed."

data.v: अङ्गदो द्विविदो मैन्दो जाम्बवान्पनसो नलः । नीलः सेनापतिश्चैव बलशेषेण किं तव ।।
प्लवमाना हि गत्वा तां रावणस्य महापुरीम् । सप्रकारां सभवनामानयिष्यन्ति मैथिलीम् ।।
एवमाज्ञापय क्षिप्रं बलानां सर्वसंग्रहम् । मुहूर्तेन तु युक्तेन प्रस्थानमभिरोचय ।।
data.es: "You may command the total army this way."Quickly start at an opportune time towards Lanka (said Hanuman to Rama)" commanded Hanuman."।।इत्यार्षेवाल्मीकीयेश्रीमद्रामायणेआदिकाव्येयुद्धकाण्डेतृतीयस्सर्गः।।This is the end of the third Sarga of Yuddha Kanda of the first epic, the holy Ramayana composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: श्रुत्वा हनूमतो वाक्यं यथावदनुपूर्वशः । ततोऽब्रवीन्महातेजा रामः सत्यपराक्रमः ।।
data.es: Glorious Rama, of truthful valour, having heard Hanuman in the aforesaid manner, there after spoke (to Hanuman).

data.v: यां निवेदयसे लङ्कां पुरीं भीमस्य रक्षसः । क्षिप्रमेनां वधिष्यामि सत्यमेतद्ब्रवीमि ते ।।
data.es: I will destroy immediately that Lanka of fierce rakshasa, you are telling. I am telling you, this is the truth.

data.v: अस्मिन्मुहूर्ते सुग्रीव प्रयाणमभिरोचये । युक्तो मुहूर्तो विजयः प्राप्तो मध्यं दिवाकरः ।।
data.es: I desire to journey at this opportune time. The Sun has reached the mid position and so a good time for victory.

data.v: उत्तरा फल्गुनी ह्यद्य श्वस्तु हस्तेन योक्ष्यते । अभिप्रयाम सुग्रीव सर्वानीकसमावृताः ।।
data.es: Today Uttaraphalguni constellation is on the ascent and for me born in Punarvasu star, Hasta, will be in conjunction with the moon. Sugriva You may assemble all the army as I desire to start the journey (as it is auspicious for me).

data.v: निमित्तानि च धन्यानि यानि प्रादुर्भवन्ति मे । निहत्य रावणं सीतामानयिष्यामि जानकीम् ।।
data.es: I also see manifestations of good omens to start (the journey). I shall get Janaka's daughter Sita on killing Ravana.

data.v: उपरिष्टाद्धि नयनं स्फुरमाणमिदं मम । विजयं समनुप्राप्तं शंसतीव मनोरथम् ।।
data.es: My upper eyelids are twitching thus indicating victory and it strikes me that my desire will be fulfilled.

data.v: अग्रे यातु बलस्यास्य नीलो मार्गमवेक्षितुम् । वृतः शतसहस्रेण वानराणां तरस्विनाम् ।।
data.es: "Let Nila go leading in front with his courageous and hundred thousand army looking at the way (said Rama)".

data.v: फलमूलवता नील शीतकाननवारिणा । पथा मधुमता चाशु सेनां सेनापते नय ।।
data.es: "O Nila, the chief of the army Go fast with the army along the way which has plenty of fruits and roots, shady forests and cool water and sweet smelling honey".

data.v: दूषयेयुर्दुरात्मानः पथि मूलफलोदकम् । राक्षसाः परिरक्षेथास्तेभ्यस्त्वं नित्यमुद्यतः ।।
data.es: "Evilminded one, the lord of rakshasas will spoil the roots, fruits and water (on the way). Be ever alert and protect them".

data.v: निम्नेषु वनदुर्गेषु वनेषु च वनौकसः । अभिप्लुत्याभिपश्येयुः परेषां निहतं बलम् ।।
data.es: "O Vanaras You should even look for (the rakshasas) in the low lying lands, in inaccessible water sources, in forests and also beyond sight leaping up to the sky".

data.v: सागरौघनिभं भीममग्रानीकं महाबलाः । कपिसिंहा प्रकर्षन्तु शतशोऽथ सहस्रशः ।।
data.es: "These hundreds and thousands of lionlike vanaras would walk in groups leading the army like the fierce tides of the ocean".

data.v: गजश्च गिरिसंकाशो गवयश्च महाबलः । गवाक्षश्चाग्रतो यान्तु गवां दृप्ता इवर्षभाः ।।
data.es: "Gaja who is like a mountain in form, Gavaya, the mighty strong and Gavaksha would go like proud bulls that lead the cows".

data.v: यातु वानरवाहिन्या वानरः प्लवतां पतिः । पालयन्दक्षिणं पार्श्वमृषभो वानरर्षभः ।।
data.es: "Let the vanara called Rshaba the foremost among the leaping vanaras, take charge of the right side of the army".

data.v: गन्धहस्तीव दुर्धर्षस्तरस्वी गन्धमादनः । यातु वानरवाहिन्याः सव्यं पार्श्वमधिष्ठितः ।।
data.es: "Let Gandhamadana, the unassailable and powerful vanara resembling the elephant in rut take charge of the left portion of the army".

data.v: यास्यामि बलमध्येऽहं बलौघमभिहर्षयन् । अधिरुह्य हनूमन्तमैरावतमिवेश्वरः ।।
data.es: "Like the lord of gods riding on Iravatam I would mount on Hanuman and reach the centre of the army encouraging the army."

data.v: अङ्गदेनैष संयातु लक्ष्मणश्चान्तकोपमः । सार्वभौमेण भूतेशो द्रविणाधिपतिर्यथा ।।
data.es: "Let Lakshmana who is like Anthaka (one who excels death) ride on Angada, like the lord of wealth (Kubera) rides on the elephant Saarvabhauma (the elephant that guards the four quarters)".

data.v: जाम्बवांश्च सुषेणश्च वेगदर्शी च वानरः । ऋक्षराजो महासत्त्वः कुक्षिं रक्षन्तु ते त्रयः ।।
data.es: "Let Rksharaja the mighty strong Jambavan and Sushena even Vegadarsi protect the rear side (of the army)".

data.v: राघवस्य वचः श्रुत्वा सुग्रीवो वाहिनीपतिः । व्यादिदेश महावीर्यान्वानरान्वानरर्षभः ।।
data.es: Sugriva the bull among vanaras having heard the words of Raghava ordered the heroic vanaras (to start).

data.v: ते वानरगणाः सर्वे समुत्पत्य युयुत्सवः । गुहाभ्यः शिखरेभ्यश्च आशु पुप्लुविरे तदा ।।
data.es: Then all the heroic monkeys who were eager for combat jumped down from the caves, mountain peaks and trees.

data.v: ततो वानरराजेन लक्ष्मणेन च पूजितः । जगाम रामो धर्मात्मा ससैन्यो दक्षिणां दिशम् ।।
data.es: There after righteous Rama who is well respected by the king of vanaras and also by Lakshmana, who is wellversed in polity once again spoke.

data.v: शतैः शतसहस्रैश्च कोटीभिरयुतैरपि । वारणाभिश्च हरिभिर्ययौ परिवृतस्तदा ।।
data.es: Protected by hundreds and thousands, even crores of vanaras and surrounded by a myriad of vanaras Rama went.
